name: Eye Bento Bouncy Eyeshadow Trio
about: What it is: A stacked, creamy, powder eyeshadow in curated trios of shimmers or combinations of matte and shimmer shades...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and phthalates. Kaja is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know:These bouncy eyeshadows come packaged in bite-sized shimmer stacks or trios of matte and shimmer pigments that apply effortlessly with your fingertips. Kaja’s Glitter Arrangement Technology delivers uniform shimmer in every swipe—perfect for quick, easy eye looks on-the-go...
ingredients: White Chocolate:.Talc, Mica (Ci 77019), Silica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Magnesium Myristate, Magnesium Stearate, Methylpropanediol, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol Stearate, Propanediol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007)...Rosy Velvet:.Talc, Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Silica, Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Magnesium Myristate, Magnesium Stearate, Methylpropanediol, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Dimethicone, Propanediol, Dimethiconol Stearate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Methicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)...Brownie Bite:.Talc, Mica (Ci 77019), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Silica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Octyldodecanol, Methylpropanediol, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Dimethicone, Magnesium Stearate, Propanediol, Dimethiconol Stearate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Methicone, Aqua/Water/Eau, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply with fingers to create your own custom look..-Make a statement with a single shade or layer multiple for bold, multidimensional color.

reviews.review_text: I was planning to use this eyeshadow trio for traveling, so the very small size was perfect. I was very disappointed, however, with Neutral Moment. This trio is described as matte, but the two darker shades have shimmer. Unfortunately, I will have to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This little shadow gadget is perfect for for everyday quick and easy eye looks. I have almost every shade.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet Dream - white chocolate, rosy velvet, & brownie bite

reviews.review_text: Don’t get me wrong, the eyeshadows are beautiful! HOWEVER, I don’t think the quality is so incredible to cost $35. The matte is very good but shimmer ones are easy to get the sparkles all over on under the eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have almost all of the Kaja trios because I love them so much. All of them are gorgeous, blendable, long lasting shadows. Whether the glitter, the mattes, the chromes, they are amazing. I have so many eyeshadow palettes but I find myself reaching for these. Plus travel is easy. I can't say enough; they are just excellent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are a mess - as I'm writing this review my face, hands and counter are covered in glitter fallout. I'm really disappointed - definitely would recommend not buying this. The concept is cute but the quality is not there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Kaja eyeshadow trios. They are so velvety on the eyes. The glitter works for me beautifully. I want to collect all of the trios. Seriously. I like them better than the Natasha Denona's mini eyeshadows.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stacked Eyeshadow Trio in the color Neutral Moment. It is my favorite, I love that it is compact and that it comes with 3 different shadows. You can create a subtle and quick look or even a night look. The pigmentation of the shadows: excellent. The lightest color I like to seal my eyeshadow primer. It's a product that you can carry in your cosmetic bag because it is very small! you definitely need it. Gifted By Kaja Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy to blend . I think is very convenient in the way it’s packaged , you can create very effortless and pretty looks with it and build it up . Overall it a yes for me and I do recommend it . Even if you are a beginner ! giftedbykajabeauty

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip

reviews.review_text: Perfect colors, texture, and long lasting. Convenient, packaging, and sizing. Great for taking along in your purse, without having it be a mess.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Kaja for consideration but all opinions are my own. The Kaja Eye Bento Eyeshadow Trio is great for on-the-go makeup. I was nervous they'd be shattered in my bag but so far it's held up great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Needed a small eyeshadow set that doesn't take much room in my luggage. I feel like the shape (vs flat case) also makes it less prone to damage. This is not what I would usually go for - I like matte eyeshadow, but I'm so pleasantly surprised! The lightest one is very shimmery and allows you to create an evening look. I feel it's the type of color combo that would look great on everybody.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this trio of eyeshadows and is perfect for on the go and traveling! Such a perfect combination for a soft natural eye look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little compact trio of eyeshadows! Perfect combination for blue eyed girlies!

reviews.review_title: Color does not last even with primers and setters
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors in the pan and they have a wonderful, soft shimmering hilight effect. But after swatching and testing, the colors (which are already quite soft) faded quickly including the darkest. Within an hour, all that was left was shimmer. I tested with primer and even setting spray. Same outcome. I’m so disappointed.

reviews.review_title: The trio I’ve been searching for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the exact eyeshadow palette I’ve been looking for—a basic set of three matte neutrals from a cruelty-free brand. I’m so tired of massive palettes full of colors I won’t ever use. This is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so travel friendly and easy to use! It gives a beautiful shimmer whilst enhancing the eyes. I love to use it with my fingers, but it also blends seamlessly with a brush. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the trio glitter eyeshadow so much, and it has the shimmers detail, the beige detail glitter and also the matte color too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very cute and I love the sparkle! The shades are nice.

reviews.review_title: My favorite eye shadow for traveling and on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite eye shadow for traveling and on the road! The eye shadow itself is great! Nice and dense and does not easily cake a part and goes a long way. The tiny packaging allows for quick on the go touch up. I have several shade combos and switch it up depending on the mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To be 100% honest I was unsure of these shadows and the price…but I caved in and let me tell you I absolutely love this bento, every hue is super pigmented, just wish you would get more product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bought this as a gift for someone, and it’s so so cute but for the price it’s so tiny. it’s better off to find a small palette with similar shades to at least have more shades to use for same price

reviews.review_title: Taro Bubble Tea - pretty colors, terrible formulas
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been waiting for Kaja to release true cool toned trios so I bought Taro Bubble Tea when it launched and while the shades are pretty, I'm not impressed with the formulas.  The matte shade is pigmented but quite dry and can become patchy when blending and the shimmer is actually the best of the three but it's more sheer than it appears in photos and even with glitter glue, I often end up with more sparkles on my face than eyes. The glitter formula is terrible; just big pieces of plastic glitter with no back pigment that doesn't translate to more than a few rogue pieces on the lids until they also migrate to my cheeks. All in all, the pretty color can't make up for the bad formulas and I will not be keeping it.

reviews.review_title: Little package with a big punch
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This little bundle has it going on. A little bit goes a long way. Pigment is amazing. And super easy to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful but not for me. I don’t like the shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: million stars outta 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I use it every single day, the blush is perfect, it blends amazing on my skin and omg the GLITTER is so pigmented, you just need a mini pinch and that’s more than enough. Also the middle one is perfect for highlighter. I’ll definitely restock when I’m out of it😝

Pretty buttery smooth glitters. I’m obsessed with the colors it come with but the only problem I have with it is like many glitter shadows it’s very hard to get off and I’ve found glitters on my eyes for days after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m was looking for this eyeshadow because the concept is different than other brands and when I try it, it was awesome! You don’t need a lot of product to see the glitter effect, I love it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to eyeshadow. All three shades work perfectly together, making this the perfect eyeshadow trio to throw in your everyday makeup bag. I have sensitive eyelids and it has caused no irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav eyeshadow and i love how compact it is!! Perfect for all occasions and specifically wedding makeup! Love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically avoid doing my eyeshadow because I am not the best at it. However, this eyeshadow is so easy to apply and blends onto the eyelid seamlessly. It is the perfect way to elevate any makeup look and add a beautiful but subtle sparkle!

reviews.review_title: Sephora sold me an already opened eyeshadow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow trio! I mostly just use the middle eyeshadow the peachy glittery one it  looks beautiful especially with brown skin tone🤩😍✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the colors are super cute! the perfect size for travelling! a bit pricey but I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just different colored shimmer. Doesn’t have much pigmentation. I would put it on top of eyeshadow but not on its own. Pretty overall. I got it on sale so I’m okay with it but wouldn’t purchase for full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting a lot from this eyeshadow but let me tell you it is fantastic! Easy to carry in my purse. I appreciate the size and the stacked effect. Very pigmented and does not settle in my eye wrinkles. It also doesn't budge and no fall out! My new favorite thing!

reviews.review_title: Great... if you like glitter in your eyeballs.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Toasted Caramel: Crazy fall out, dry, patchy shadows, glitter in my eyes resulting in irritation. Terrible product. The shades gold dust and sunny amber had no base pigment - they were just chunky glitter. The shade gilded chocolate could have been lovely, a nice shadow that blended out HOWEVER even using my fingers to apply it had a massive amount of fall out resulting in glitter ALL OVER my face and, as mentioned above, in my eyes. My eyes are still very irritated as I write this.   Shade Glowing Guava: This is a commentary on Sephora's order fulfillment and not the actual shade: I ordered this shade on Dec 26 and it arrived Dec 29. I did not have a chance to try it because arrived OPENED and was EXPIRED as of 2023-12-02. Disgusting. Obviously returned without issue.   Overall, very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I wish I could give this 0 STARS!!!! It’s so TERRIBLE!!! When I first received it, it was okay, I didn’t really like the colors as they were way too shiny and childish, and in the next week or so, it was completely demolished! The eyeshadow was all over the mirror, and the other shadows just broke down.  Don’t get this, you are wasting your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly dry and not pigmented. Also I used my 500 points for a discount I can’t get back and Sephora sent me expired eyeshadows…. Yeah expired. So ick.

reviews.review_title: Love the copper and brown--hate the white
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The copper and brown shades are beautiful. The white is a totally different consistency and is terrible to apply. The chunkiness of the white shade guarantees an uneven application. I never use the white. That being said, I love how compact and clever the packaging is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldnt pay more than $5 for this product. Very dry and flaky, hard to get the powder off the pallet, and hard to get it on eyelid. Big no no

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful on the eyes! Great pigment. Little fall out. Made my green eyes pop!

reviews.review_title: A good complement to pair with other eyeshadows
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such pretty colours, but the three included in this Rosewater set are all more like sheer glitter toppers, and not really good on their own. There is not much pigment and there is a lot of fall-out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this product, it's a joke, it's like play makeup for kids, flakes off and has no pigmentation and the glitter flakes off allover everywhere and m your face. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought because the colors looked very pigmented and shimmery but the white barely shows and is extremely flaky/does not stay on eyelids when applying. The coral needs multiple layers to be seen, the brown again, needs multiple layers. Save your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These trios are amazing. This color story is really beautiful on brown eyes

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Coral Sunrise - white aurora (light coral glitter) , coral starlight (coral peach matte), Flaming Sunset (neutral peach brown matte)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dry and so annoying. Looks like play makeup. I unno bow anyone can take it seriiously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the cutest eyeshadow ever! It's a bit pricy for the amount of product you get but I am willing to spend for this formula! I always get compliments when I wear this eyeshadow (especially the middle one!)

reviews.review_title: Colors Are Darker Than They Appear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: False advertising. The colors are WAY WAY WAY darker in person than shown on the website. Can we stop blowing out the photos to be so bright they look nothing like what you're getting? I thought I was getting a bright light pink, a magenta pink, and a mauvy pink. What I got was brown, browner, and brownest with whispers of pink undertones.  I can't wear these... I'll look like a DV victim.

reviews.review_title: White doesn’t work well, flakes sparkles all over.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted a nice sparkly white shadow. The white is the only color that doesn’t really show. It flakes off and adds sparkles all over your face instead. The other colors are quite pigmented and work well but I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift from my aunt and fell in love with the color since the beginning. I use this everyday to highlight my inner corner eye, nose and eyeshadow. It stays on all day, blends well and color is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t as pigmented. You need a lot of eyeshadow for it to show. The product is in a tiny box and I bought this only because it was on sale. Isn’t worth the original price. The hype isn’t real.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so convenient! It is so easy for touch-ups and I can not wait to take it with me when I travel. The colors are so good and I'm definitely going to buy it in different colors. I definitely recommend the shimmer with the matte for the most flexibility with what you can do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have almost all these beauty bentos and lately they are all i use when getting ready for work. they are so convenient, 3 colors for a simple eyeshadow look. the formula is also really nice its pigmented and blends easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute packaging and great glitters. Colors true to picture. Applies easily to the eyelid and lasts all day. No fallout. I don’t use any primers and I have oily skin. This is great. Minimal effort for pretty results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I did not have a good experience with this product. About 2-3 weeks after having this, the product started to break down. The mirror got full of eyeshadow, and all 3 eyeshadows BROKE! For no reason. I would not recommend buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a cute and convenient little thing. it’s easy to use, I don’t even use a brush, just my fingertips. It glides on so smooth and the colours go together without needing to blend much at all, eliminating the “i always run out of 4 shades from a palette of 12” issue

reviews.review_title: Perfect for the special occasion I bought it for.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this for a special occasion. Love the colors! Got compliments on my look too. Removal of high glitter product was a bit tedious but the rest came off after showering. I still will use this trio again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for a more natural feeling makeup look. Blends like a dream so is also great for a more smokey-eye look. Also perfect for those that like to keep a minimal makeup bag—it’s very small and takes up hardly any room!! New must-have for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: The matte shadows are amazing, soft, and easy to blend. The glitters can be a bit patchy.

reviews.review_title: very pretty but not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the shades when I first swiped them and applied them. The only thing is they did not last and they seemed to not only disappear on me once they shadow faded, they creased within 30 minutes. It's not a bad formula just not made for oily skin or oily eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you travel and don't have much space for your skincare and makeup stuffs, this is the perfect palette size. It's so compact and easy to just leave in your purse for a quick makeup/ touch up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was great eyeshadow, the only thing was it was SO SMALL and easily breakable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I took this eye shadow trio to me for Montreal solo trip. It was small and easy for me to use. The shimmer was great! All of my photos showed my eyes very pretty and shimmery, even though I am a newbie at makeup. I would definitely recommend it. The shades were very versatile for me and went with all of my outfits, so I didn't need to pack extra eye shadows lol

reviews.review_title: Fine, but wish I spent the money elsewhere
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The neutral moment stack was fine, but not great. The lightest shade is very pigmented so it is stark against my skin tone. The middle shade has a heavy sheen, which i wasn’t expecting. the darkest shade doesn’t stay very well. I would pack it on and it just wouldn’t stick. Just eh.

reviews.review_title: A must in my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! love it, gives me a nice shimmery matte Korean shadow look! Would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this product its so cool on the go i love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love kaja, I bought 3 shades. Is easy for travel and so pigmented. I recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is very nice and travel friendly! All the shimmers could be a tad more pigmented but it is manageable. All the shimmers look nice on my skin tone and would totally recommend and re purchase in the future!! I just wish the price tag was lowered down a bit.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet Dream - white chocolate, rosy velvet, & brownie bite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good quality product and nice color combo. Would buy again in other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this a 3.75 if I could. I love the non-glitter shadow it comes with, but the two others are too similar. Also, the very glittery one doesn't really stay on and doesn't have good coverage. I love the small packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color payoff of Chocolate Dahlia and Velvet Dream was not great. I returned both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this primarily for travel and have no regrets. Excellent neutrals, crack-resistant packaging, trim size. I find myself reaching for it at home, too. A good buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This felt EXTREMELY overhyped. Perhaps I purchased a lackluster trip but this was a new release shade (forest night) so I assumed if anything the formula would be getting even better with time. I’m simply whelmed.  It’s not horrible but it’s not the heavenly ethereal goodness I was promised in YouTube and Tik Tok reviews. The mattes were also those crappy sequin shades. Won’t be repurchasing a bento again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The glitters in the pallet are just not it. The chunky glitter is glittery but in all the wrong ways. It actually kind of hurts to put on because the chunks are so large and sharp. Loved the dark brown but couldn’t justify the price for only being able to use one color out of the three ￼

reviews.review_title: New staple in my daily makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a must. Blends so beautifully for a soft natural daily look. It lasts all day without creasing. The packaging is compact for easy essential cosmetic case space. I will definitely be purchasing this product in other colours.

reviews.review_title: In Love, Coming back for more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous. Love the packaging. Perfect for travel. No thought needed bc all colors look great together. Blends easily, nice pigment, no glitter fall out. Outperformed more expensive shadows, but I do use eyelid primer and quality brushes. Definitely looking at buying more.

reviews.review_title: Love the compacted size and colors
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These bento pots of shadow are FAB!  Perfect for traveling. Blends very well and this particular shade is perfect for everyday and buildable for an evening look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product blends beautifully, it produces a very pigmented smooth look. However I wish the middle glitter shade appeared more glittery on my eyelid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! One of my favourite copper shades the shimmer is superrr pretty and the dark brown shade is the perfect colour to deepen the look. It complements it well. I will say tho, that the first shade is wayyy too light to use and it doesn’t show up

reviews.review_title: Not exactly what I was expecting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, it was really small, only about 2.5 cm tall and having a diameter of 4 cm, but the quality of the product was good, however the cocoa dip didn't have too much pigmentation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet Dream - white chocolate, rosy velvet, & brownie bite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was a lot smaller than I expected… I wish it was a bit more bigger. However the shade is kinda light on my skintone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the new Forest Night trio and oh my gosh the colors are so pretty and sparkly. This is the only eyeshadow I’ll be needing on my vacation this summer. The packaging is super tiny so that may be a good or a bad thing for you, but I really like that. The top shade is pretty chunky, and does have a lot of glitter and a little fall out, which I don’t mind too much because the color is blinding. Overall I do highly recommend, this color story is all I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Chocolate Dahlia for a quick set to use when I'm travelling or don't feel like doing much with my eyes. These are really pretty. The color pay off could be a bit better, but they're not terrible. I do struggle a little with the glitter in getting it to stay. Usually with shimmer/glitters I just use my finger to apply to the lid and it sticks, but this one takes me a few tries to get it to show. I don't know that I'd buy more of these since I don't think they are anything special and there are better alternatives out there, but they are handy if you're travelling or in a quick pinch and need to get out the door.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very pretty but very small . And not that it bothers my eyes the glitter pieces do . But the colors were beautiful . And I buy all my products so this is a honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’d been waiting waiting waiting for this to come back in stock because I’d been looking for a perfect pink eyeshadow.    My search, unfortunately, continues.   The colors are darker in person than they appear here…dark enough that they were no longer the pinky pink shades I sought.    I also get quite a bit of fall-out, especially in the lightest shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So quick and easy to grab and so functional as well and the formula is so buttery smooth soft and the glitter in this trio is to die for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The matte shadows blend easily, and the shimmer shines the right amount, all without fallout. I was worried this stack would be too warm-toned for my light neutral skin, but no, it’s just right. I’m very happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful shimmer. Buttery mattes. Perfect to travel with. Kaja is my favorite eyeshadow brand.  This trio, I need to use a face highlighter for innwr corner and brow bone highlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful and buttery. I had to her them all. When new shades launch, have to get these. These trio's can out preform luxury shadows. My photo was taken outside.

reviews.review_title: Not pigmented and does not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice small packaging but minimal color payoff in these shadows and the glitter/shimmer shade did NOT last through the day and had fall out over my cheek by the end of day. Not impressed and returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only other Kaja stack I own is Orange Blossom which has been removed from Sephora, and I think reformulated to be this Coral Sunrise color story. The 2nd shade the coral glittery shade is almost identical to the 2nd shade in Orange Blossom which really disappoints me! It’s a hair more pink than red in comparison. The top shade is chunky like a bad thick way. The bottom matte has the same orange glitter as the 2nd shade. Overall it looks like kids makeup to me. returning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this shadow, but not as vibrant as I thought. I do love the glitter tho, and it seems to last pretty long as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is quite possibly the worst eyeshadow I've ever used. It's chunky glitter, but not in a fun way. The glitter immediately gets all over your face. This is trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very high quality long lasting eyeshadows.  I have been looking for shimmer for the longest time and have finally found the perfect one .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So cute and easy to apply! The coral shade is beautiful and light for Fair Skin and the second shade is nice and light and a sweet nude Shimmer! The top shade is a little to chunky for me, but it’s still a nice confetti shimmer! 💅✨

reviews.review_title: If it’s on sale, something is going on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought two of the EYESHADOW bento box in a different shade, just days prior their expiration date, I find it completely irresponsible to expose someone to catch an eye infection due to this    expiration dates are meaningless in some cases, but if it’ts something that’s gonna affect your vision think twice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the idea of having this for my gym bag and travel, but the eyeshadow pigments aren’t great. You have to use so much for it to show at all and it doesn’t stay on well even with a great eye primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are so cute and the glitter is beautiful! I love how easy they are to use and they’re great as a eyeshadow topper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors  Terrible fallout from the glitter shadow  Unwearable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these. I have these in several shades and the formulas are delightful. The mattes blend really really nicely if you are looking for a light wash of color, but they build really well for a bigger color payoff too. The shimmer shades are gorgeous, the chunkier ones have a little fall out but not more than other brands.  Im as happy to use these as I am any of my Natasha Denona. Each stack can do a completely look, but each shade stands alone nicely. The packaging is cute, it's a good quality, travel friendly, always a joy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how neutral these colors are and how smooth they blend. Just a few swipes and it blended!!! Stayed all day and look good on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this eyeshadow trio for travelling with. It's so small and compact but the shadows have really good colour payoff. This colour palette does turn out more orange-y pink on my skin tone (I'm fair skinned with cool/neutral undertones). They're still beautiful though and the 3 colours are beautiful for blending with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Way too small! The size of sample!! I have not tried the powder yet I was so disappointed over the size. !!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product! Main slot gacor!!! Spade88 loves it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product in a seasonal colour (on sale) and did return it.  The packaging was a cute pleasure to use, and the formula was great.  I’d buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Chunky and less buildable than the others
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I own 6 of the Kaja Bento Bouncy Eyeshadow Trios and added Mauve Bouquet to my collection this week. This one is a big disappointment. I expected a light, slightly flaky texture for the shimmers and a smooth, easily buildable matte shade. The gold shade (Wedding Champagne) is a chunky mess and the pink shade (mauve veil) is deeper than the matte shade and appears much deeper than the ads/promos. The matte shade (Velvet Carpet) is lighter than expected and not as blendable/buildable as Kaja mattes usually are (patchy). It also started to fade after 4 hours which isn't a problem I usually encounter with Kaja mattes.  I can't use this trio as a stand alone which is disappointing. Wedding Champagne looks terrible with Mauve Veil and overpowers Velvet Carpet. Mauve Veil is deeper than Velvet Carpet but they aren't a tonal miss. I just need a darker/deeper shade.  I reach for a trio on days when I want a quick eye look. It's the convenience and love for the shimmers that have kept me reaching for the trios (and purchasing more). I can't see myself reaching for Mauve Bouquet. I can't complete an eye look with just this trio and a basic (chunky) gold, pink shimmer and mid-tone plummy brown aren't unique in my collection. Wish I could rate this 0 stars as it isn't worth even 1.

reviews.review_title: Must have and I use it everyday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for over a year. Color pigment is great and I get tons of compliments when I wear it. Great product. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these eyeshadow trios. I've bought Peach Madeline & Neutral Moment. I'm not great at creating eye makeup/ looks, but these are helpful, giving you enough colors to create a look you like

reviews.review_title: Orange blossom eyeshadow trio is where it’s at!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore the orange blossom eye bento eyeshadow trio, and the rose gold-ish shimmery shade in the middle is the best one! Great staying power, and I have gotten several other trios that are great also. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: good but not sure I would buy again
reviews.review_text: I thought this would be a little bigger but it’s exactly what the description says. Much more shimmery than I expected based on the images.

I'm not sure why I thought they would be bigger...but it's pretty small. I don't have huge hands but it's not exactly easy to open. I find myself fumbling with it.  I really love the colors though. The pigmentation is lovely. It goes on smoothly with just your finger. I am not exactly that great with layering or blending, but I found that this eyeshadow does both quite well. I would purchase again, even with the packaging.
These eye shadows are amazing very compact and a great variety of colors i purchased all of them i can take them all for traveling they don’t take much space the quality is great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow is nice enough but the colour is NOTHING like either the picture or the description. It says Mauvy-Pink, and it's more dark and brown. The colours are pretty but very inaccurately described.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've literally bought 3 of these because I keep using them up. I have also bought bigger eyeshadow palettes, but for some reason I keep gravitating towards this one only.  Perfect for every day. Totally worth it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive eyelids and this does not irritate them at all. The colors are beautiful and the product doesn't crease. No fallout either.

reviews.review_title: FALLOUT IS NUCLEAR LEVEL -- DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fallout from these shadows is the worst I have ever seen.  I used a primer and put them on with my fingers rather than a brush to reduce the potential for this, but I had a lot of fallout when applying.  The worst part, though, is I had more fallout throughout the day.  Glitter all over my face and glasses.  WHAT A MESS!!!  If I could give this product less than one star, I would.  Am definitely returning, and maybe they'll use it to decorate a Christmas tree somewhere instead.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Mauve Bouquet - wedding champagne, mauve veil, velvet carpet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly don't get the hype behind these shadows. I will say, the matte shade is very nice...it's not too pigmented and blends easily. it's a mauvey brown shade that looks really nice. the other shades are very dry and chunky feeling. The middle shade looks gorgeous in the pan but even when I apply with a finger it mainly just looks like a pink sparkle with barely any base pigment. The top shade is very thick and looks textured on the eyes. These 2 shades have a ton of glitter fallout, so you definitely have to do your eyes before your face makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet Dream - white chocolate, rosy velvet, & brownie bite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much!! I’ve been using it for a year already and it still hasn’t given out on me. They’re very beginner friendly and are such beautiful colors

reviews.review_title: Must have for girls who like being on the go!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it is easy to carry these! These are my go to when i need to carry my makeup with me😊

reviews.review_title: I bought another Eye Bento, because duh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are more neutral than they appear on screen, and I've watched videos of people using them, so I felt okay buying the Chocolate Dahlia Bento. This one consists of two lovely, smooth mattes, and just one glitter, which makes it feel laid back compared to Orange Blossom (ALL glitter) and Mauve Bouquet (my favorite so far). But I'm definitely out here recommending Chocolate Dahlia to all my eyeshadow-phobic friends because it's such an easy, intuitive color combination. I'd probably wear this one to work if I ever left myself enough time for makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to everyday eyeshadow! Whether I want a natural look or something a little more dramatic it is perfect! I use the middle colour as my solid base and the bottom as a shadow eyeliner which blends and works gorgeously. If I am looking for a dramatic look I'll pop the glitter shade on my lid.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but will be returning.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but the glitter is so big that it irritates my eyelid. Luckily I bought the Neutral Moments too and loved it but I will return this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is beautiful! I was worried that it would be dull but it creates a very easy and classy eye look. Sadly I bought another with this one but the glitter really bothered my eyes. Fingers crossed that they comeout with more like this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gave it 2 stars for packaging (clever design on stacked shadows) and the color. Had to return since the colors are not pigmented enough. Can buy drugstore brands for equivalent quality and much cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While these shadows are pretty, I had so much fallout that my face felt like one big sparkle. I couldn't brush it off and throughout the day there was more fallout. Really bothered my sensitive eyes as product kept falling into them and all over my eyelashes. Not worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the Kaja bento trio shadows, but the Peach Madeline, despite being absolutely beautiful, was just too soft. I buy these trios specifically because they're so travel friendly, but all 3 of these broke on me within a week and a half of use. The shimmer pans lost adhesive and the top shadow fell out first, but the other two just broke from transport.   I have to say, the shades were lovely and the shimmers are opaque and beautiful, with reasonable fall-out (one glittery, one foiled), however, I'm not sure you need two such similar shimmers in one trio. It would have preferred another matte to use as a liner or light peach shade. If you MUST have it, keep it on your vanity. I'm still mourning that foil...

reviews.review_title: Peachy and shimmery in all the best ways!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!! Blends like a dream and is just enough for a light makeup day or a glam day! The bento case is so unique and cute also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this product , long lasting and the compact size makes it perfect for traveling.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Mauve Bouquet - wedding champagne, mauve veil, velvet carpet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Bento is SO PRETTY. The bottom matte color, Velvet Carpet, is a luscious medium-dark lavender brown. One pass with a brush gives enough shadow but isn't DRAMATIC. (I can definitely build saturation if I want to, however.) Middle color Mauve Veil is glittery with enough color behind it that I've happily placed it all over my eyelids without a care. Top color Wedding Champagne is obviously the spangliest glitter, so I use that sparingly on my inner corners and dead center of my lids if I feel like I need extra sparkle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely lovely! Peach madeline is perfect for blue eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: L’image porte à confusion… surtout la couleur plus foncée… je la croyais plus rosée, en fait elle est brune foncée.. Les teintes ne sont pas vraiment opaque, c’est un léger brillant, plutôt à ajouter sur une autre ombre à paupière… en gros un peu déçue…

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed after reading so many great reviews on these Kaia Bentos. Maybe it was just this color story but the middle shimmer was hard pan with very little color. Matte shade was average.  Payoff.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Underwhelmed. Great packaging concept but the eyeshadows are a fail. These are not creamy. Application was patchy. There was also alot of fallout too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are pretty solid topper shades. I mostly use them for the last step in my eyeshadow routine if I'm looking for a more bold look. The method that seems to work best is picking up the glitter on my pointer finger. I go in like I'm going to swatch it, and then pat it on my eyelid. This method seems to yield the best result and it's the one I've had the more success with. One piece of advice, make sure to have a spare brush just to wipe away any of the glitter fallout. I find that the fallout is pretty minimal, however it can be annoying when there are little spots of glitter on your under eyes or cheeks. Having something near you just to wipe it away is helpful. Solid trio, I have invested in other colors, but this one seems to be the one I mostly gravitate towards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmers look like they have pigment but when you put it on the skin its so sheer even with a base it still just barely shows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the packaging is very cute and the product is pigmented and long lasting, a bit overpriced in my opinion but still a good product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I love the concept. Its perfect for traveling it even comes with a mirror. The color payoff is amazing and long lasting, great formula and the shades are gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Gives such a cute mauve look! The glitters are so shiny and have minimal fallout. The matte shade is somewhat sheer but buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this eyeshadow a few days ago and I absolutely love it! These shades also work well for my skin tone and are well pigmented. Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for my every day make up and I think it’s perfect, it’s great for a neutral look. I travel a lot, whether it’s a weekend thing, or month long trip so I try to be careful of the products I buy so as to make the best use of my space. That being said I feel this is a great investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the darker color in this set but the other two glittery shades are a little intense for every day use. A couple hours after trying these shades there were bits of glitter all over my face catching the light. If you love a glittery look this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an eyeshadow that could emulate a sunset look, and the Poppy Champagne trio delivered! I love using the pink color for the outer corner and to deepen the crease, and the orange is good for a quick sweep of color. The shimmer is a beautiful gold, makes my blue eyes stand out! Can't wait to try more colors :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeshadow as an impractical gift to myself but I have found myself reaching for it quite often. Although the two matte shades are very bold ( and well pigmented) the shimmer shade is super cute and pale enough for me to use with a more causal look.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for everyday - and perfect for travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently saw this online and decided to purchase after seeing it in person. I love that the shimmer is subtle and not a glitterfest. It looks very flattering on my aging eyelids. I have a deep tan complexion, but was able to use the lightest color all over my lid and the darkest shade blown out in my crease. I could have easily used the darker color more built up in my outer v. I also love the size - this will be perfect for tossing into my makeup travel bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with a few shades on the Patrick Ta Palette but couldn't justify the price for only 3 shades. This one was a quick dupe on the colours, it is quite loose though and has a lot of fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this trio!  I tend to use the top color the most but all are flattering.  Good pigment too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE the kaja bento boxes but the new chrome formula is next level. I prefer mauve bouquet over peach Madeline but they r both beautiful. I will say the matte shade needs building in the peach one. There is a lot of fallout but I don’t mind because I do my eyes first. I highly recommend these trios but especially mauve bouquet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I wasn't expecting three glitter toppers, but that's essentially what these are. And for that, they each are beautiful. What I was hoping for was more like one glitter and two shimmery shadows designed to work together. I tried wearing all three of the colors together, and it's just waaaaaay too sparkly. However, I'm still excited to experiment with each glitter on its own, or combined with my other matte and satin eyeshadows. The powder formula itself feels very silky, blends easily, and doesn't have too much fall out. And that little compact is just so darn CUTE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented! Love it to elevate my nighttime makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how smooth these matte eyeshadows are and how easy it is for me to work with. I just wish there was an option the purchase some of these shades separately. I am not a glitter person so while I would love to try the matte shades in others I don't want buy something I won't use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super glittery and pigmented! The packaging is really innovative and is quik and easy to use when your on the go. I love this product so much!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these Kaja eyeshadow trios. I have Velvet Dream, Glowing Guava, and Chocolate Dahlia. They go on creamy and are highly pigmented. I use with a shadow primer and they really last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Design and colors are cute but too expensive for only 3 colors. Should be priced at like $15 not $26..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had this saved in my favorites forever and finally took the plunge.  Definitely glad I did - in fact am planning on trying another color.  The packaging is cute and travels well.  The formula applies nicely.  It is very sparkly but I like that.  One thing to note - I didn't really think the pictures of the product in use aligned to how the colors apply IRL. In my opinion they are much truer to how they look in the package.  I have a feeling this is going to be one of my main go-tos for the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not Vegan nor cruelty free and it contains Talc. Misleading

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an unsung hero, I have sensitive eyelid skin post pandemic (from not wearing makeup for a year+ then reintroducing a full face of makeup) this is the most beautifully pigmented eyeshadow which  *knock on wood** never gives me a bad reaction nor swollen lids... these days I always seem to reach for it whether it's for cocktails or a wedding it's on the same level as pat mcgrath, hourglass and Huda; I even find it better than too faced and UD shadows.. so much quality for the low $... the day they come up with a full palette I'm racking up

reviews.review_title: Great colors, doesn't last through day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors and size of this, very compact. Giving it 4 stars since it doesn't have stay power but it is compact enough to touch up in afternoon.

reviews.review_title: amazing but bring back toasted caramel!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing formula and shimmer. Super underrated product. Takes up very little space in your makeup bag but you can create so many different combo looks with the colors.   ONLY complaint is that the Toasted Carmel color is not longer available :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I so badly wanted to love this. Especially give them great reviews. The color swatches are beautiful and the formula is awesome. The package is so cute and portable. Unfortunately I found the shift in the shimmer to be an unflattering yellow. Not a gold shift but a weird yellow. Returned

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Kaja and these shadows are so cute! I have a couple different Bentos but the color Neutral Moment is just a shade too dark for me. Will buy again but in another shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigmented and such cute packaging. I am a fan of the color combination of the spiked ginger-warm honey tones trio. Great for a quick eye look without thinking too hard!

reviews.review_title: everyone tells me they love my eye makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a cute mini eyeshadow palette for my travels but I end up using it every day. Numerous people stop me and tell me how pretty my eyes look before asking where I bought my eyeshadow. It blends beautifully and has warm, flattering colors. 10/10 I recommend it!

reviews.review_title: pretty good, depending on what you’re looking for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find this to be a good product, just not something that I personally will be grabbing too often. I find the two darker shades to be more reddish than they appear in the photo and once I applied it, it was difficult to blend away to lighten it once it set. If you’re looking for a bolder color, I think this would be great for you. It does blend well when first applied, but difficult if you let it set, so be careful with that. I really like that it didn’t crease or fade at all on my lid. My eyelids fold when open, so some shadows will rub off where it creases, but this stays put. I wish there was a more subtle brown palate with no sparkles.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The glitter got into my eye and scratched it! Stay away!

reviews.review_title: Worth your While and $ Eye Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Beauty Trio from Kaja because it applies easily, stays on and you can apply as little or as much as you like. I have used many eye products from Kaja and have been very pleased with their line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try these but the pigment just isn’t there and it’s too hard to blend. These were a waste of money for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: glowing guava is my favorite so far, what's great about them too is you can switch out the pans to creat a trio for travel of colors you want. in the collection. I loved the matte and shimmer trios most but after seeing I can change them out it was a game changer and time for me to collect them all. all of them compliment each other in my opinion too so you can mix and match from any trio. they blend like a dream and are perfect for beginners and people on the go. I am a Kaja fan for sure and everything I've tried so far I am in love with. packaging is so cute and they don't feel or look cheap. I hope and believe this company will be around and become huge as people notice and try the brand as time goes on. I don't just recommend I am begging everyone to at least try this brand. it's worth the money and honestly it is pretty budget friendly. one trio can give you more then one look to create and like I said you can change out colours as you buy more. try them, I can't imagine living without these now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colours pull kind of yellow but they are still nice. Not sure if I'm going to keep it. The shimmer is gorgeous.  Price should be much lower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! I tend to do very simple eye looks with single shadows, so I bought this little trio specifically for that purpose. All three shades are absolutely amazing, that middle pink is my dream shade! I never thought I would love this as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice easy palette to carry with you on quick overnight trips. Natural look, however there is a bit of fallout so be prepared to tap off excess before applying.
It’s first major ingredient is talc. Which has asbestos

reviews.review_title: super cute packaging but the fall out is crazy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this. I thought the idea was great it didn’t take up a lot of space and it’s looked super cute. I have used maybe 5 times trying to like this product and Every time the fallout is ridiculous. What do I mean by a lot u ask I mean A LOT meaning that every time I use this my sink has more of the pigment than I have on my eyes. No I’m not joking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the color trio, but can't give it 5 stars for a few reasons.   The packaging is cute and convenient for travel, but I found it a pain having to snap open/close as I was blending out. It's also comically small.   The colors are pretty but I just don't think the 3 shades are worth the price when you can get other mini palettes with twice as many colors in similar sized pans. They are also inconsistent - the dark shade is super pigmented, the middle shade is mid, and the sparkle shade, like others mentioned, needs to be applied with fingers.   It's definitely a quick and easy eye look, I just wish you got more for your $$$.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this and its pretty cool, i love the colors i use them under my eyes and they shine super pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mattes are buttery and blendable and the shimmer packs a punch! Definitely use your finger to apply the shimmer though, as their shimmers were formulated to be applied with the finger. The shadows lasted all day on me too with some primer! Packaging is adorable and great for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades. Very soft and easy to blend. And the case is so cute and great if you had to pack it. The shimmer shade can have a little fall out but I used my finger to put that on so the sparkles didn’t go all over. And I used a brush for the matte shades.

reviews.review_title: Will definitely repurchase and try more colors!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are excellent for a soft, sheer, neutral look. These colors give me just enough polish without being too much at my fairly conservative office job.  I appreciate how well the powder blends and sheers out, even when I am not using my best brushes to apply. The compact is not just cute, it is sturdy and secure, and stops the colors from mixing or getting dusty.  I have had no issues carrying this compact in my purse or gym bag.  Will definitely repurchase this and try more colors.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colours are gorgeous!! It looks great when swiped on over the lid as an easy one shadow look. Love the convenient packaging too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty shimmering colors, however, a lot of it ends up all over my cheeks during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these little trios. The mattes are so easy to blend & very pigmented. I would give 5 stars, but even with setting spray I had glitter all over my face from the  shimmer shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice bronze tone, love the how this power applies, stays all day, no touch ups required. I plan to only wear Kaja Eyeshadow from now own, LOVE the quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most beautiful shimmers I have ever used and they last beautifully. I will be repurchasing this product in other shades

reviews.review_title: Love the Concept, Hated the Shimmer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the concept of this little stack. It is so small, and adorable, and I thought it would be just perfect for travel. I love the color combo in the Chocolate Dahlia, it would be perfect, if only the top shade wasn’t so glimmery/glittery. I don’t know if it it’s just me, but I feel like so many brands are doing more glittery shimmers instead of just a nice metallic shimmer, and I’m just so sad every time. I know this is a matter of preference, so some people will love it, but sadly it’s just not for me. This trio feels a lot more expensive if you only use 2 of the shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unless you use a base the pigment isn’t that great, the color options are nice but it doesn’t matter if the pigment isn’t there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I looove to add a pop of glitter on my inner corners and lower lashline. The glitter of these eyeshadows are so beautiful! They're not big and chunky. They sparkle in the sun and makes you look like a princess. There's even a cute tiny mirror on the inside. I find that the best way to apply this is with fingers to properly get the glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect neutral set of eyeshadow. I love the matte finish which is preferable for aging skin. It is also in such a convenient format (stacked trio) for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I keep this in my purse just in case of an emergency where I look like garbage. It works amazingly in a quick pinch and gets me compliments without trying! A bit pricey, but honestly it’s so convenient and pretty that It’s worth it to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They are super creamy and pigmented. Great pallet if you’re looking for burnt orangey colors. Cute package and great for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So cute but not pigmented enough for me :( I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigmentation on all three colors and the two mattes are super creamy and lovely. The glitter is a bit chunky for my taste but still pretty. Easy to apply - fingers are totally sufficient and blend well with a brush too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: tried this out the other day and was so surprised! the glitter is beautiful but the mattes were really surprising! i started with the lighter one and it was normal but the dark one was insane! I tapped my brush one time and went to put it on and it was insanely pigmented. a little goes a long way. i’ve tried tons of eyeshadow and the pigment of these compares to natasha denona. kaja!!! come out with a whole palette!! blended beautifully and love how convenient the packaging is. definitely want to buy more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this compact trio. So easy to pack around for trips and touch ups throughout the day. Highly recommend. This is the only trip I’ve tried but definitely plan on getting others!

reviews.review_title: Not as pictured, but ended up liked it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I got this product, I wanted it to be a cute neutral pink pallet for my everyday life. However, unlike the photo, it is not as pink. It is a neutral brown and shimmer. I was a bit upset at first, as I was picturing something else, but I actually grew to like it. I use the 2nd color as the base and then blend in some of the shimmer. I finish off with dark brown as an eyeliner and I think that it looks very cute! It is very pigmented and lasts all day. Would definitely recommend it, but remember, it is NOT a pink pallette.

reviews.review_title: So convenient and colors r great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looooove this product! It’s so convenient to throw into my makeup bag and honestly I don’t mind having to open up the different layers every time to get to all the colors. These shades are beautiful and I’ve been looking for some more neutral, almost cool toned browns and pinks. Been really into a more subtle and simple eye look these days and this is it! I won’t say it’s the most pigmented shadow I’ve ever used but if ur looking for a convenient eyeshadow palette to be able to travel with and give you a more subtle, minimal look this is perfect <3

reviews.review_title: Best eyeshadow set for lazy girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have these in three different colors now and will probably keep buying more! They are so easy to travel with or just throw in your purse, so easy to apply and blend, and the colors are perfect for natural everyday looks with usually one sparkly color in the set for some pop. I took off one star because of staying power. Even with an eyelid primer the colors fade I'd say after 4 hours or so, but it's not that bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS SHADE! I love this little trio. It has everything I need for a quick everyday look and it is absolutely perfect for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so good! I often feel like some browns look kind of orangey on me. The neutral moment goes on so smooth and blendable and is the perfect neutral brown. I’m going to buy another color to add to my collection next time!

reviews.review_title: just as good as it is cute
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy these shadows! they're easy to work with and these colours (alotta colada) compliment my blue eyes :)   I didn't even realize this was scented - you can only smell it if you put your nose up to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it so natural looking I get a lot of complements

reviews.review_title: trios to try if you like glitzy but hate glitter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: toasted carmel and orange blossom trios are to die for. they are everything you dream of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed with my purchase. This shadows are nothing but a chunky glittery mess. Will be returning asap!!
love this sm the shades go together so well they blend well to !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product!! I have collected so many of these Bentos. Love how portable they are and easy to use!! Super pigmented and blendable with fingers. A little bit is all I need. Love the sparkle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is genuinely one of my favourite products of all time. Gorgeous shimmer shades that are buttery and blinding! If you're considering buying one, do it! But I would only really recommend the all shimmer ones.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the trio in Chocolate Dahlia and I love it. High quality formula with good pigmentation that’s also easy to blend and work with ! The neutral tones are very flattering - not too warm and not too cool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this eyeshadow would be like another brand's creamy powder that almost feels spongy when you touch it, but this did not. It would make more sense to use a brush like any other powder. There is hardly any pigment, just three shades of obvious glitter. I was hoping to be able to do an understated wash of color with a bit of shimmer but this reminds me more of my middle school glitter makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have this product in 4 different options - Toasted Caramel, Orange Blossom, Rose Water, and Chocolate Dhalia. These are beautiful! They are pigmented and have both sheen and twinkle which I love. Each of the shades has their own unique dimension and allows for a variety of looks. These are very very pretty and have added something special to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It’s great for a quick touch up and on most days this is all I reach for. The colors are super pigmented and love the formula, it has a buttery/velvety feel to it. I am not a fan of glitter/shimmer, but love how sparkling frose looks on me. This girl is all for the glow!!
