Definitely going to try the other trios.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed with this eye shadow.  Does not go on easily and feels like I have to reapply several times which is not what I was looking for.  I like the colors but I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Peach colors are beautiful on my fair skin. I use my ring finger to apply for better color payoff and less fallout. Great for every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Muy practico, me encantaron los colores, hermosos y para toda ocasión

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I travel a lot and this is a great for packing without taking up space. I love that I can use it for light shimmer or layer it for more glam. I can also use as a highlighter/bronzer as well. Perfect size for purse and convenient for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: -Very sparkly and makes your eyes POP -Stays on quite well with a primer, minimal fallout -Love the compact packaging, good quality   Cons: -The sparkles are fairly large, would've preferred if it was a bit more shimmery rather than glittery personally!

reviews.review_title: Too expensive for the payout and size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The matte colors are nice but sometimes the dark comes off muddy when I try to build up and blend. The glitter has a ton of fallout -- more of a glitter topper than an eyeshadow. It's fine but I don't think it's worth the price. Very little product for a lot of money. I feel like you're paying for the cute packaging.

reviews.review_title: Very happy with this little trio
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute trio, very small but has the perfect color combinations you could ask for. Very easy to use too, it’s designed to use with your fingers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE ONLY EYESHADOW I USE ANYMORE. It’s the perfect neutral browns —not too warm or too cool— and a perfect wet looking shimmer. I have seriously gotten rid of all my palates after finding this because it’s that good. I have chocolate dahlia and it looks nothing like the trio picture. It’s truly neutral browns. Look at the picture of swatches — much more accurate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The mattes are nice and blend well, but the glitter is messy. I use eye primer and it still gets all over my cheeks and face within a few hours. I really like the packaging though, and think it's great for travelling when you don't want to bring a whole bunch of individual shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping I would love this.  I wanted a pigmented neutral matte shadow palette for travel.  The cream shadow (top) and tan shadow (2nd from top didn't show up.  The 3rd shadow (from top) barely showed up.  For reference I am a blonde light, neutral toned gal and the pigment just wasn't there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Super cute packaging and the eyeshadows are amazing they blend nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most overrated product I’ve ever tried. There’s hardly any pigment, it doesn’t blend well the colors are unflattering. Also it pulls warm instead of neutral. Used it twice and never reached for it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented and easy to use, but I was looking for shimmer and got sparkle! If you’re looking for a shimmery eyeshadow, I didn’t find this fit the bill! Perfect as a highlighter or for a glam look though.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Velvet Dream - white chocolate, rosy velvet, & brownie bite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colors are so cute and subtle, they blend really easily and work well with anything. Really cute packaging as well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love it! the glitter doesn’t shift around and isn’t too chunky or too fine that it looks like shimmer — perfect balance, and the matte colours are very flattering on asian skin tones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite eyeshadow trio. I use this 9/10 times I wear eyeshadow and I throw it in my purse for night out occasions and it always comes in handy. It’s super versatile, blend-able, and the sparkle pigmentation is perfect! I’m not one to wear a ton of eyeshadow on a daily basis. I have staple makeup that I can’t live without and this eyeshadow has become apart of my daily makeup routine. Will be repurchasing this once I hit pan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did get this on sale, but I think the pigment, especially of the glitter, is good and blend-able. The packaging is so cute too! Not sure if I would ever repurchase at full price, but I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love these trios. I own spiked ginger, glowing guava and alotta colada. These 3 have a combo of mattes and shimmers which make them awesome for daily use with any one of these. They blend well and the shimmer shade looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect trio for a simple pretty eye look. They blend gorgeously and last all day! The shimmer is stunning and the mattes are so smooth, all you need in one little stack!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning! I was a bit hesitant to purchase just because I thought it was a bit pricy but the glitters are so pretty and I am in love with the palette. If you're on the fence about buying this, totally do it because it's so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect! I always don’t use all the colors when I buy an eyeshadow palette (which was so annoying) & I hated buying single 1 color eyeshadow and have separate ones. This is perfect because the price is so awesome, it is easy to carry around, the quality is good, and it has colors that you usually use so you don’t need to waste money. Awesome product! I will be only using this for my eyeshadow now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colour description rosy is misleading. Velvet Dream consists of 3 matt peachy/terracotta colours, not rosy.  The compact is cute, but a pain to use because you have to open 3 separate lids rather than one lid as is the case for a usual palette.  So 4 stars.  The product is amazing, though, like velvet, blends well, not too dark, perfect for light to light-medium skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this product is amazing if you are considering it just buy it, stays on all day even if you rub your eyes and has such amazing pigment and formula plus feels great on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of this product. I don't have a need for a huge eyeshadow palette. I bought this because I thought I could make a simple look that could look casual or dress it up if I needed. That can be done, but the downside to this product is the top glitter shade. The glitter gets everywhere. I think I would love this little palette if the glitter shade was a more metallic/foiled shade instead. I think that the darkest shade can look a little muddy sometimes too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow. I get so many compliments when I wear it; the gold compliments my green eyes extremely well. I usually apply the middle shade on my lid with my fingers for the every day look. If I use brushes to do a more complete look with these shades, they’re a little more pigmented, but either way they blend really well and go on even.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Moment - modern beige, java jazz, & cocoa dip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for travel and on the go days.   A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty colors, great formula. Unfortunately, the tones are too close together to make a dimensional look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always get compliments when I wear orange blossom! They’re perfect for a shimmery one and done shadow and have so much dimension

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: glitter shadow is very pigmented but over all very good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Easy and quick eyeshadow, it's nice to have the three colors picked out for you so all you need to do is apply it. The shimmer formula is really nice, one of my favorites

reviews.review_title: Another Winning Adorable K-Beauty Must Have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a fan of pretty much anything K-beauty and this adorable little eyeshadow trio by Kaja is no exception!  It was hard to choose which one I wanted but decided on the pretty one named, “Rose Water.” It has three decent sized creamy shadows that leave a beautiful shimmer, and the color story (champagne cream, ballerina pink, deep plum) is perfect. They blend like a dream,  and I find it easier to just apply them with my finger or a silicone brush. You can wear them alone or even layer them on top of one another. And I love the packaging! It’s small, compact, & perfect size to take on the go and even includes a mirror for a no mistake look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute set of colors, great for on the go when you want to touch up your eyes a bit, and it’s nice that it has a tiny mirror in it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light shimmer it gives. It can be worn alone for a lighter look or over darker toned eye shadow to add more sparkle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these so much! I own atleast 4 of these, possibly more, with a variation of shimmers and mattes! I absolutely love the shimmee shades so much, they will elevate any eye look instantly! The tiny reflective pigments are unmatched! The mattes are great too which make them great for travel as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m writing a review for the ALOTTA COLADA shade. This trio is amazing. As an eyeshadow N00b, this cute lil palette has really narrowed it down and simplified how to do a simple eyeshadow look for me. I really don’t know much about eyeshadow and it always would look bad on me before I would use this, but after using this product I somehow manage to come out with a really beautiful eyeshadow look. Also, the yellow shade in this is a GORGEOUS toned down yellow and the shimmer shade on top looks lovely. It is pretty natural looking though.   I think the best thing about these trios is that they are very beginner friendly because they are colors that will definitely work together, and the pictures on the models (along with the little guides) help a lot! It helps me learn about shadow application and I feel like I’m getting better at makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My daily eye makeup is usually some variation of a reddish brown smoky eye. I got the mocha spritz shades because I thought the colors would be dark reddish brown. But in person they aren’t as dark as I hoped they would be, and especially the middle brown shade really isn’t that pigmented. It’s a nice transition shade but again it’s not as dark as I hoped it would be. And then the shimmer shade barely shows up on my skin. So while the shades are pretty and they do blend nicely, they aren’t quite what I hoped they would be. I also hoped with the name “bouncy” they would have a different texture, more of a cream to powder like the Colour Pop Super Shock shadows. If these weren’t so expensive I would probably keep it but $20+ just doesn’t seem worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow trio is amazing! I use it more often than any of the other palettes i have, and it’s great for daily makeup. The colors are all very pigmented, buildable, and easily blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect! So easy to use, great for travel, and beautiful colors!

reviews.review_title: MY FAVORITE EYESHADOW IV’E EVER USED!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many eyeshadows; from dry and patchy to terrible fallout. But this is it! This is the best eyeshadow I have ever seen in my life! The shades are so beautiful and creamy, there is no fallout, the shades blend like a dream and the shimmer is beautiful! Love it so much and would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been looking for a simple palette like this for a while.  Meets my simple needs, I only use the darker shade for a more dramatic look.  Doesn’t have a lot of childish glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Love the pigment on all shades, especially the shimmer. Easy to apply on your eyelids with your finger when you're in a rush. I also sometimes use the bottom shade on my cheeks. I bought this specific shade because it was on sale. Hoping to try the others!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Rosewater shimmers after hearing good things about the Kaja Bento Boxes and I have to say these are my new favorite shimmers. Yes, they are glittery, but for some reason it just works. They go so well with anything and feel so smooth. And they are very easy to work with. I’m probably going to buy a few more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was weary to buy it at first but now it has become a necessity in my makeup bag! Especially if you have a pink undertone, the lightest shade doubles very well as a highlighter and can be placed on top of any color for a pleasant shimmery effect, the second good for pink looks and the third good for neutral looks but it can be used to make looks by itself as well :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love thus shadow trio, I just purchade another. I love that they are compact but great quality shadows. gorgeous colors. shadows are creamy and pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product to use for traveling too since it is small and easy.

reviews.review_title: just fast-trendy makeup / not worth the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m confused about the hype about this product. Yes, the packaging is cute but that’s it. I applied this shadow at 6:00pm, with a primer. I spent a lot of time having to multilayer the shadow so it would show. By 7:30pm most of it had disappeared off my face. I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cute, compact, and very easy to use. If I could change one little thing, I would love for the mirror to be a little better quality. Otherwise, great product and I will likely purchase it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Small but powerful  the mattes have so much pigment and blend well and the sshimmmer is amazing can be applied with finger or brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have over 100 palettes but I keep reaching for these and buying every single one they have available to offer. The shimmers are the real stars here, so unique and beautiful. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: perfect for the girl on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for travel or a quick eye look it has one lid shade one crease shade and a Smokey shade they are easy to blend and pigmented I’m definitely gonna pick up more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These eye shadows are everything! They are very well pigmented last all day and do not disappear from my oily eyes. I am very picky with my eye shadows but these just meet all expectations, I will definitely be purchasing other colors. I seriously love them over any other eye shadows. Super cute and take up less space when traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really likes these eyeshadows. I bought a few different ones and they all preform equally well. I personally find no fallout and that the pigment lasts all day. Definitely would recommend, great product to use for traveling too since they are so small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much — it’s great for travel and is so impactful, yet can also be subtle depending on how you wear it. I love these as toppers or as a one-and-done shadow (though admittedly that is a bit dramatic since they’re so glittery). They aren’t uncomfortable and have very little fallout, so I’m Not finding glitter all over my face like with some topper shadows. I want every color!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flawless performance. Gorgeous colors. Application is buttery. Smart and convenient design. Color story delightful. I want to buy all of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this for my wedding in August. Not big into makeup so I didn't want a whole pallet. This has great coverage and builds very nice. The glitter/shimmer pot is very pigmented and you only need a little bit for it to show.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very pretty and great for travel. the shimmer is more of a sparkly topper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really cute and lovely soft colours. The shimmer is very sparkly but more of a topper shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadows are AMAZING. Very pigmented and beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is absolutely incredible! the colors are beautiful and easy to blend, and the glitter shade is ABSOLUTELY my favorite eyeshadow ever! The shadows are pigmented, but not so much that it's impossible to deal with. If you're looking for a gentle shimmer instead of a little glitter, I would suggest getting one of the matte ones, but be warned, you're missing out! Although it only has 3 colors, they're easy to mix and match, and are very versatile even by themselves. I like to use this one to mix and match with the Naked Cherry palette, but still prefer this one. Highly Highly Reccomend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Warms up my eyes and easy to use. Highly pigmented!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the rosewater shimmer bento after hearing Smokeyglow rave about it on YouTube and oh dear God it is absolutely gorgeous on the eyes. Quite literally the most shimmery and shiney eyeshadow I've had. I went ahead and bought the other three shimmer bentos, and those were just the same. Can't speak on the matte formula, but I can definitely say the shimmer trios are worth it, especially rosewater and orange blossom. They give some fall out but I don't mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shadows are incredibly easy to blend. I always feel overwhelmed with eyeshadow palettes, so I decided to purchase this and it’s possibly my favorite eye shadow. The shimmer is a little more on the glittery side but it’s still super pretty. I noticed they just released new all matte neutral trios so I will definitely be purchasing one of those as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOV it!! Easy to apply and blend, the beautiful colors stays all day! Especially the subtle bling- light up my day!! Will continue to buy BUT this seems last forever- LOL

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because I'm doing an internship for my degree and I'll need something a little easier and more neutral than most of my other palettes, and I'm impressed. Every look I do with these shimmers is beautiful, whether it's using one all over the lid or mixing them with a different palette for a full look. As an independent palette, it's beautiful, and it's a perfect supplemental palette, as well. I love all of these shades so so much! I actually have a really hard time not just using this palette all the time, because it's so easy to do a look- lightest on the inner corner, middle all over the lid, and darkest on the outer corner. I'm absolutely in love with this palette and want to buy more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very smooth. perfect shades. very convenient. Would buy other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing all around. The formula is gorgeous, it is buttery & blendable. Super cute and compact packaging, so great for on the go. The three colours compliment each other perfectly. The only thing I have to say is that the picture sephora has up for the 'Chocolate Dahlia' colour shows it slightly pinker than it is in real life. When it's in front of you, it's more brown tones. Which I loved even more about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in total love with this little palette! If you love sparkle this is it! The top two seem to be duo-chromes but even the bottom one has a shift! They are all just gorgeous!

reviews.review_title: Super convenient, good quality, but expensive.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these eyeshadows. I've had this for a while now and since the you know what, I don't wear full eye looks very often anymore because I work from home.   This makes a very simple neutral eye look so easy! The shimmer is more of a topper which can easily glam up the look. I get a lot of comments when I wear this bento set. It's super compact so would be nice to travel with but overall I like that it's not a clunky palette taking up space.  These are pricey for what is. Nearly $10 per shadow is very expensive. Buying two of these would be the same price as a decent sized, high-end eyeshadow palette. The only plus is that I do wear it almost every time I go out so I get my money's worth.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this because of the convenience of this little pallete and the neutral everyday shades but to me it was underwhelming. The shimmer shade is more of a glitter topper without much pigment, and the matte shades are more of a neutral undertone instead of leaning warm which I would have preferred on my light medium olive skin. The shades are almost exact dupes for shades in the colourpop going coconuts palette and that’s a 9 pan palette for half the cost and maybe even better payoff. I took pictures to compare. I think I would have liked the spiked ginger one better but even those shades can be duped in another cp palette. I would say save your money and get more bang for your buck with one of theirs instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SAVE YOUR MONEY! Don’t get me wrong this product is amazing but I literally found some of mines at Marshall’s for 4 dollars each! Quality is amazing but u can find them cheaper at Marshall’s!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fire. sooo pretty and good formula. i just apply with my finger and it looks great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love taking this with me when travelling since it's so tiny and compact but has all the colors you need for an every day look :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how compact this palette is and loved what it looks like online, but in person this palette is very lack lustre.   I’m a medium neutral skin tone and found the middle shade too cool, looked very dull on my skin tone. The darkest shade isn’t bad but very warm-red. The shimmer shade is more icy looking in person. It leans more champagne/silver than gold and is very chunky/glitter. I was expecting something buttery, easy to work with that would draw the light, but it’s just a very cool shimmer.   I can see this palette working on those with much lighter or medium, tan warm skin tones. It’s very muddy looking on my neutral skin tone and looks nothing like what it shows up as online.   I’m sure it’s sold out for a reason. But didn’t work for me or my skin tone. Both in colour theory and formula. Not a fan. Cute packaging though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shiny, shimmery, compact, and long lasting. What’s not to love? I’ve gotten so many compliments wearing this set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a TON of eyeshadows and palettes. Glowing Guava is one of my favorites because it's not too complicated. Having too many palettes can get overwhelming and glowing guava is one that I reach to the most when I want a quick cute look. I like to do reddish pink eyes that is a popular style in Asia: Apply mattes and top with shimmer. This trio is perfect, compact, and I keep it in my little staples bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous colors, lasts 10+ hours . This is the first product by Kaja that I’ve tried, but it has outperformed any other eyeshadows I’ve tried in the last year or so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: very sheer and more of a topper than an a shimmer shade, but the formula is gorgeous!! the way it sparkles is just so much different than any other eye glitters I have, it's very fine and almost looks wet. the best thing I can compare it to is Fenty's diamond bomb formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3 shades of these - rose water, chocolate dahlia and orange blossom. All three are wearable, give a beautiful pop to the eye. Super easy and portable. If you don’t like shimmer, you obviously won’t like these, but the shimmer in these is so fine and beautiful, you really can’t go wrong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! Would recommend it for new eyeshadow users as it's easy to work with! No issues or whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the colors all seemed to be the same. cute packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmer is just so pretty. I love all three shades. Just the perfect trio for spring and summer!

reviews.review_title: not for me glitter fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this about 3.5 maybe. So the colors are beautiful swatched but i get a ton of glitter fall put in the toasted caramel stack and i use an eye primer and it just disappears on me. I will use as toppers but even then it packs no punch. I am gonna give this to my 11 year old to add to her make up stash this is not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beauty colors, but it is literally just compacted glitter. Not a glittery eyeshadow, just glitter. Again beautiful colors, great staying power but not what I thought I was buying. Also the bento is just slightly bigger than a quarter, so you don’t get much for your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a great set to have for simple looks. The product feels light and soft while the pigment is buildable. However, I do think that looks made with it will need touch-ups for a longer wearing time. The shimmery shade seems to have more staying power versus those that are matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this. It’s great for all the reasons you think it’d be—compact, easy to toss into a bag or travel with, and the “Spiked Ginger” set is a great everyday trio of colors suitable for a range of fair to medium skin tones. (Heads up for people with deeper skin shades—likely this shade set would be too light, but the middle color could be a gorgeous shimmer option on darker skin tones!) I have red hair and fair skin, and was originally thinking that the set would be too warm for my cooler undertones, but I find this set fits so many different needs and is perfect for daily use. Also, you can totally apply with your fingertips if you’re in a pinch!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but it’s just not for me. I think the convenience of the compact packaging is fantastic. And as someone who likes neutrals and only used 1-3 eyeshadow shades on an average day I thought the description of “neutral cocoa” would be perfect for me. I had no trouble blending the 2 matte shades and they were plenty pigmented. My reason for 3 stars is that I felt the middle shade was extremely orange on my fair skin. Based on the photo of the swatch I was expecting a neural light taupe like color.  The darker matte was a little more warm toned than I had thought it would be too. The shimmer shade is pretty true to color but be ware it is glitter. I think the quality and convenience is there, perhaps my skin just has undertones that make the shades appear a bit warmer than expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super pigmented and compact so it’s easy to bring anywhere. I love it so much, 10/10 would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is crazyyyyy pigmented and gorgeous! Will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not long-wearing and I wish they wouldn't advertise it that way. But oh, it is so comfortable and slick on the lips, with perfect pigmentation (fairly sheer but definitely visible). I can kind of smell something if I sniff the bottle, but it's subtle and I definitely don't smell it during application, so I don't think it'd bother anyone who's fragrance sensitive. If they had more shades that suit me, I'd buy them in a heartbeat.

reviews.review_title: Hate the feel, love love love the look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went on a bit of a rollercoaster with this eyeshadow. I was really excited to try it, then when I got it and swatched it was really put out by how dry it feels and how it swatched like it was cheap glitter and would fall everywhere, and then I actually applied it and got excited again. It applies so beautifully, and the middle shade is close to my skin and looks like wet glimmer on the eyes and it's sooo gorgeous. It stayed put all day, never got patchy, had minimal fallout, overall I am thrilled! I'm pretty minimal with eyeshadows and I'd happily let these be the only ones in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The sparkly Kajas combos are incredible and beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shimmer!! I like the middle and deepest shade because it has a different base color than the shimmer which creates a 3d effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is officially my all time favorite everyday eyeshadow trio!! I really wanted an easy eye palette that I could use everyday for work that wasn’t complicated and complemented my eye color. The shade chocolate dahlia is absolutely perfect! The two matte shades are versatile, pigmented, and blendable. The shimmer is definitely best applied with your fingertip, but it goes on so beautifully and almost give it a wet look. Highly recommend and hope this never gets discontinued!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shades are pretty and the kinds of staple colors I’d hoped. Unfortunately the shimmery shade is incredibly messy — it has a ton of fallout. Disappointing for the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great eyeshadow! The colors are super pigmented and easy to apply. Would definitely buy again! It looks small, but definitely lasts a long time.

reviews.review_title: A little fallout - you don't need it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price point, I expected a little more. The shades are pretty and wearable - the mattes are blendable even with fingers, but the glitter shade has a lot of fallout on the face. Less than an hour after applying it, the glitter started falling onto my face. The shade is still really pretty - it look stunning on camera - but you definitely need a glitter glue or some kind of adhesive to keep it on your lid, which isn't worth it to me considering each shadow is almost $10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little guy!  It was one of those impulse purchases from the bins of small-sized products Sephora has near the checkout counter.  And it turns out that I use this more than any other eyeshadow palette that I own!  It’s small and convenient, the colours pop and work well together (and, I’d imagine, on most skin tones).  I can apply with brushes or with a quick finger swipe.  Just really pretty coral/peach tones.  And great quality at a nice price.  I plan to purchase one or two more in other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for shimmery eyeshadow that works for me. I actually have returned the Charlotte Tillbury Marie Antoinette one and the Milk Make Chalk eyeshadow. I just received the Kaja eyeshadow and tbh was prepared to be disappointed. I LOVE IT. It is beautiful and shimmery and looks so beautiful. Highly recommend. LOVE.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have two of these, chocolate dahlia and glowing guava. Great quality. The shimmers are absolutely beautiful and the mattes are easy to work with. I always get complimented on my eye makeup when I wear them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color and texture is amazing! It’s very easy for use and the color stay in the face for very much hours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cute and I like it but the shades are very different than the picture, not pink or rosy at all, rather brown, like I said I do still like it but it’s not as pictured which sucks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have two so far: Hella Azalea and Poppy Champagne. I’ve probably had them for the better part of a year now and I plan to eventually buy more. Perfect for when I want to pack minimal makeup to take along with me. The colors blend out really well. They’re highly pigmented so I don’t have to use much. And the packaging is still in perfect shape. Love the design. The little mirror is nice. I seldom write reviews but I would love to see these continue as a concept forever lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact this trio is, it'd be great for traveling. The trios with two mattes and one shimmer are nicely composed so it's easy to create a coherent look with this. Glowing Guava is gorgeous, I love the muavy pink tones! It gives off a moody yet romantic vibe. The shadows blend in easily and and glitter is super pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this. It's my go-to for when I only have a few minutes to get ready, and I travel with this. I don't even use brushes, only ever fingers and it blends out effortlessly. These have the most beautiful micro glitter. Very sparkly, but I think they're still very much appropriate for everyday wear.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these. I own three of these and they are beautiful and east to use. The shimmers are very refined and the matte shades are very pigmented and easy to blend. Three colors are all I really need for an eye look personally. Also perfect for travel as it is a fraction of the size of a full palette. One thing to note is the Chocolate Dahlia appears more pink/red online when it is much more neutral in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best eyeshadow I've ever used! The formula is smooth, buttery, and doesn't crackle or crease. The colors are so vibrant on any skin tone because it has so much pigment! the quality is amazing! I've dropped these so many times and it hasn't broken. Even the shimmer particles don't transfer throughout an 8 hour work day. The colors brighten my eyes and the shimmer is just fine enough to be glittery, but not obnoxiously large particles on my eyelids. I hope they come out with more colors, and if not I'll just purchase the rest of these

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors (Chocolate Dalia and Glowing Guava) but it is definitely a large sparkle vs a shimmer as stated in the description. Fooled me because the pictures they show of the products look shimmery in the pan and on the arm swatch.  I returned it and got the Ilia warm eye shadow palette as a replacement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow.  They are awesome!  Very nice colors and very pigmented.  I chose the brightest shade of these eyeshadows to match my eye color as I wanted to highlight my eye color.  I am very glad that I chose this particular shade.  But I also want to buy shadows of this brand in other colors)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The quality is so on point. The pigment is amazing. It's a buttery formula and it blends seamlessly and not patchy. The glitter shade go on seamlessly without too much fallout and the pan stays intact. I honestly think Kaja is by far one of my favorite affordable eyeshadows by far. I really want to get more. This eyeshadow trio is so underrated compared to other popular  brands they don't even compare to their formula or performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy I finally tried these out! I love the brand as a whole as they always try to do something unique to set themselves apart and this product is no exception. I have brown eyes so the Glowing Guava shade is super flattering and perfect no matter the season. I like that this one has 2 mattes and 1 glitter shade so you can play around with daytime or nighttime looks. Overall just perfect for on the go and the packaging feels sturdy and solid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! Beautifully pigmented and great shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was sold out when I went into the actual store but after seeing and testing out the sample on display, I knew I HAD to get it. Beautiful colors, really easy application, and when you use primer and setting spray there is VERY minimal fallout from the glitter.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful - but only buy all shimmers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shimmers are comparable to my pat mcgrath shadows, and I DONT use that lightly. They don't have to duo chrome that pat's do, but they do have the glitter and glimmer. Absolutely wonderful and perfect nuanced tones, but I am very fair so idk about everyone. The ones with mattes aren't worth it though, worth trying and recommending otherwise!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! The pigmentation is unreal and it stays for many hours. With all sparkle shadows, there's some fallout but I don't find it to be too much. I put on a cream shadow underneath and then there's barely any fallout. Love this eyeshadow and will be buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of Korean products, as I see this one sephora I freaked out. For those who don't know Kaja is in (G)-Idle's Senorita MV. I had to get this, not only as a Korean makeup fan but as a KPopper. Love it the good pigmentation and how smooth it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are easy to use, beautiful cohesive colors, pigmented and blendable... but unfortunately the shimmer shade has so much fallout that I had it all over my face. I had chocolate dahlia so I can't speak to the others fyi. Every time I'd blink more would rain down. I tried glitter primer and using setting spray over it but still had tons of fallout. These are just too fussy to me for that reason. I also realized after using it once that I think I already have these shades in my smashbox full exposure palette and I switched them side by side and sure enough I found an exact match for all 3 shades.. even the shimmer shade was identical.. and the smashbox ones don't have any fallout at all.. so I returned these and got my $20 back. They were too expensive for what u get anyways I just got drawn in from all the hype. My bad.

reviews.review_title: Great for a beginner or minimalist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I will start by saying that this was a maxxanista find and I paid 3 dollars for it. I would not have paid full price, but using them has changed my mind and will when I hit pan and use them up because I doubt I will be able to find them. I am a novice when it comes to makeup so palettes can be very overwhelming. I currently own two larger palettes and usually stick to a few shades so I find it to be a waste of product. These bento trios take the guess work out for you and can help achieve simple eye looks. I have it in Glowing Guava  as well and love how pigmented they both are and they blend smoothly. There is also nearly no fallout with the shimmer shade. The colors are so pretty that even wearing one by itself looks stunning. My skin tone falls between light and medium and I am neutral. I have oily lids and surprisingly it lasted all day and did not crease and was vibrant with my e.l.f and lancome primer after a day riding the subway and running errands. I also wear contacts and this did not bother my eyes for those that are wondering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I will start by saying that this was a maxxanista find and I paid 3 dollars for it. I would not have paid full price, but using them has changed my mind and will when I hit pan and use them up because I doubt I will be able to find them. I am a novice when it comes to makeup so palettes can be very overwhelming. I currently own two larger palettes and usually stick to a few shades so I find it to be a waste of product. These bento trios take the guess work out for you and can help achieve simple eye looks. I have it in Spiked Ginger as well and love how pigmented they both are and they blend smoothly. There is also nearly no fallout with the shimmer shade. The colors are so pretty that even wearing one by itself looks stunning. My skin tone falls between light and medium and I am neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colours are really pretty, and the blend nicely. However the shimmer had SO MUCH fallout. It barely stayed on my eye

reviews.review_title: so great for so many reasons.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a busy mom on the go and sometimes get overwhelmed by big eyeshadow palettes. This little baby is perfect to give me a little something extra, even when I'm in a hurry and don't have time to think about it. Also, let me tell you about this shimmer formula. it is magical. I couldn't be more impressed with this product. Right now I have chococolate dahlia and orange blossom and will absolutely be buying more shades. highly recommend. trust me when I tell you you need this in your life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeshadow because I thought the small size and neutral colors would be good for travel, but I like it so much that I’m using it for my regular makeup look now. Really easy to apply with your fingertip, and lasts surprisingly well throughout the day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it  Super compact. Easy. Blends nice.  Very happy. I would like to order more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These little stacks are a great way to add a pop of shimmer to any look! i keep them in my travel bag i keep in my car anytime i want to amp up my look I sligtly tap it onto my lids. i do have oily eyelids and these stay on fine with a regular eye primer. I do not get fall out and i love the color story of this one. i want to get more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. The colours look beautiful and I was excited to try them. But oh my goodness! So much glitter!!! It is not a shimmer at all. It is a lovely colour but it looks too much for day wear. Maybe for a party but since lockdown when will that happen again? I have to return :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very compact and easy to carry anywhere. The colours are perfect, my skin is light. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product is honestly okay... but the packaging is tiny and for 20 dollars I definitely wouldn't purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell completely in love with the glitter shades and I thought I could make so many looks with my orange blossom and glowing guava set. the matte shade looks very pink with a warm undertone online but when I saw the shade in person and on my eyes it made me look sick. the shade looked a lot more cool toned and grey upon application and the shades were much darker. aside from the color, the performance is impeccable, especially from the glitters. Every time I put on the glitter shades I get so many compliments and get asked where I got my eyeshadow from. I will be buying all of the glitter sets. I recommend this product only if you see the eye shadow in the store, not online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I suck at doing eyeshadow and this little trio gave me These eyeshadows give you the most perfect blended look! I don’t go crazy with my eyeshadow so this has also been perfect for every day. Love! Got it based on Tony Sevdalis recommendation on YouTube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact this set is. The colours are super shimmery and blend well either together or alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3, and they do add a more unique glittery texture to the lid than your average pressed shadow. I tend to use mine as a topper with a cream shadow base. If you like all the colors I would say they're worth it.

reviews.review_title: great color and small enough in my bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s really natural not strong! It won’t flake or translate to my whole eyes and it’s easy to blend...You can use it no matter you’re going to work or you’re in vacation...I love this color is great pinky and brunette, you can use it four seasons! I love the glitter very much, it makes my eyes bling bling! And it’s small enough so I can take it everywhere when I travel. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shimmers, one swipe and you’re set for the whole day! The pink tones are perfect! If you’re looking for the perfect travel friendly shimmer pallets, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful!!! Only flash and natural light do the shimmers justice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this one (the toasted caramel) first and have  bought three more, since then! These are very tiny and have a little bit of fall out, but the colours are beautiful, they wear great and the packaging is adorable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my go to eyeshadow! It’s easy to carry in my makeup bag and effortless to apply. The shadow doesn’t kick up or have any fallout. I have applied with brushes, sponges or my fingers and it is always nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: pretty shadows not worth 21 dollars but definitely worth the 4 dollars i got them at tjmax

reviews.review_title: glad I didn’t pay the full price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color selection is beautiful, pigmented, but so much fall out all over my face from the sparkly shades. If it were something unique I would continue to use it, but it’s no better than any eyeshadow I have in my collection. Wouldn’t recommend. Spend your money else where.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These trios are perfect for vacation or travel. I'm happy the compact is small and sturdy so no worries about staining your bags. The pigmentation in these little cuties is real! Although you can't create too many looks with just these three shades you still get lots of use out of it. The formula is very creamy and soft to touch. There is little to no fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosewater and toasted caramel, love both sets! The light colors are perfect for my day to look, easy to mix and turn into an evening look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very sparkly and easy to use. I wish it was a little more pigmented but it’s very pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very pigmented.  the product is smaller than I thought.  Very good if you want that natural look.  Colours are very beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because I thought it would be perfect for travel.  It has all the colors I usually use for a simple daytime look, and the two neutral browns looked perfect for my freckles (I typically use eyeshadow to dot on freckles).  I do think this trio is perfect for these two things! And I liked the tone of the shadows on my fair-light skin tone.  I also loved the shimmer on my eye.  My only reservation was that the darkest brown color was pretty patchy on my eye.  While this isnt a problem for my freckles, its a bit annoying to know I can really only use two of the shadows for an eye look.  That being said, I like the product enough to keep it and I'll definitely bring it along with me the next time I travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to trying these. Unfortunately, I will be returning Spiked Ginger. The lightest shade doesn’t show up on my skin, and it’s not worth keeping it to use only 2 shades when I own so many shadows that have better pay off. It was pretty enough but the shimmer shade is pretty lack lustre. I’d recommend this to someone who wants something really simple. It’s a no from me- not enough pigment.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but i returned it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors were much darker on my pale skin than the images. Dark colors bended well and almost no fall out. However, the lightest color left sparkles all over my face.

reviews.review_title: Kaja Shimmer Shadows vs. Hourglass Scattered Light
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are bomb. The texture of the shadow is very similar to the Hourglass Scattered Light shadows, which are 38$! These Kaja shadows are less expensive and you get 3 shades instead of 1. Gotta love the variety. In comparison to the Hourglass Scattered Light Shadows, I personally think that the Kaja shadows are slightly less glittery but they are much much more reflective. Both are great, but I'd go with the Kaja for a true bang for your buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is gorgeous and easy-to-use. They apply well with fingers or brushes and blend easily. The Chocolate Dahlia trio in particular is easy to get a pretty, neutral daytime look or a smokey look. The compact packaging makes it perfect for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love all the shades especially the deep one literally perfect a little small though.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow trio! I ended up buying another one because it was so good. I just love the color combination and the glitter. So pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Kaja bento eyeshadows. They are the perfect size for travel and I love how they apply. The Chocolate Dahlia one looks pink in the pictures on Sephora.com but IRL it's the perfect set of 2 neutral browns and a shimmer shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The poppy champagne was perfect for fall! The glitter did not flake off, and the pigment was strong, lasted all day. I have Asian hooded monolid (the type that makes all eyeliner disappear just by opening my eyes...) and usually the pigment will move around, fade, or crease, but this one stayed put, even the glitter!! Also love that it's compact and great for travel.

reviews.review_title: Perfect size for on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are absolutely perfect and just what I was looking for. I tend to only do a little bit of makeup now on the daily, and I usually do it once I get to work because I get there early. I don't want to bring a lot with me and will typically only bring mini or travel size products. I've been mostly just using a single Colourpop eyeshadow for a wash of color/sparkle. This fits in my makeup bag perfectly and gives me the option of having 3 different shades to choose from and they're all pretty and sparkly. They would be absolutely perfect for traveling as well, I wish I had had them when I went to the UK a few years back! I will definitely be buying a couple more I think!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how cute and small it is. Extremely pigmented, but a bit on the pricey side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful eyeshadow trio. The look these three shades make is very pretty!! It’s perfect to have in your purse or to travel with if you need something for a quick and nice eyeshadow look, but don’t want to bring a huge palette. Would love to try some of the other trios!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are so cute. But they're also a great shadow. The matte and shimmer are both nice and pigmented. They blend really well and wear for quite a while. True to advertised color. I want them all now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much. It’s perfect for on ago quick eye look. Perfect for travelling and school

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure if I would like the brightness of these colors or not, since I'm 64...BUT I really love them!  The soft shimmer slides over the pink & purple & sets off my blue eyes.  You can wear it light or darker, depending on the layers placed.  It is not only for the young!  It is a sturdy compact so very convenient for travel or a purse.  I'm very pleased

reviews.review_title: A Complete Look in this Trio
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect trio of eyeshadows. The highlight shade provides just enough shimmer and the other two shadows are matte; all 3 are easy to work with to apply and blend. I wore these shadows all day yesterday and they did not fade after 8 hours. Highly recommend! I gave it 5 stars for packaging, price, ease of use & longevity.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The sparkle is insane!! Beautiful, soft and pigmented. I use it only on special occasions because of how glamorous it looks...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact this is, making it easy to throw in your bag on the go. I think it’s pigmented and the colors go along great. You can adjust it to what you’re feeling that day! I might buy a couple more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really cute little trio and pretty pigmented! I'll be buying more shades soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to use for such cute eyeshadow looks. I have Chocolate Dahlia as well. They blend pretty easily too and minimal fall out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great shadow. You can apply it with a finger or a brush. I have two, the Glowing Guava and Chocolate Dahlia. Both perform well for day wear and are compact for travel. I wish they made more combinations with matte shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think these are so cute and work wonderful with popping into your purse for quick grab and touch up. Unfortunately the colors are beautiful but the shimmer leave glitter all over your face even if your careful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmery colors are absolutely gorgeous but they get everywhere and I mean everywhere. I tried using glue on my eyes hoping it would help but still ended up with beautiful flakes of glitter all over my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmer is ok but it gets everywhere. I still love it aside from that!

reviews.review_title: Colors do not match the photo but still love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Kaja Bentos are always awesome but this photo makes it seem brighter and pinker than they are, more mauve and brownish instead. For fair skin, I'd use these for nighttime or darker looks personally. The glitter is super pretty and is that kinda wet formula Kaja uses for their glitters. They are great but travel everywhere somehow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely stunning! I have been wearing this trio non-stop ALL summer. I get compliments and asked what I’m wearing on my eyes almost every time I wear it. I not only love the product itself but the packaging is amazing. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it's a nice product but it is SO tiny...... i should've been cautious when the size wasn't listed on the website. photo for reference with snapple cap and the kaja blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it everyday since I got it! So natural and easy to use, love the color, great for no makeup makeup.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how compact this is and how it has a mini mirror inside. Amazing to have in a small makeup bag. The mattes are really good and are super long wearing. Don't need a primer and doesn't fade at all. Super bendable and creamy with great colour pay off. At the end of the day, the eyeshadow still looks like I just put it on. Great neutrals. Only reason for taking a star off is because I thought the glitter was a little chunkier than I'd prefer, probably because I'd rather it be a shimmer. Would be open to the other shades. I'd buy an all matte version in a heartbeat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not expect to love this product as much as I do! Since I have tan skin I have always found it hard to find neutral eyeshadows that don’t look ashy or orange on me (for reference I am double wear 3w1.5 fawn). I wanted something that would contour and bring a little bit of shadowing and definition to my eyes and Chocolate Dahlia does just that! Don’t let the picture fool you, it’s not so pink looking in real life. It truly is a neutral cocoa shade range. Perfect everyday natural eyeshadow trio. And the packaging is great and cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite everyday go to palette.  Love the colors, super flattering.  The glitter is beautiful and I always get compliments.  You can dress up or down and it being compact is even better!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good product. Beautiful pigment and extremely blend able. I was a little hesitant because the packaging looks so young :( but non the less a great product. I wish they would come out with more nite raps

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this! Perfect neutral color palette, perfect size.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My product just arrived today and I am so excited! I will say it is smaller than I expected but that’s not a negative- just didn’t realize it when ordering. It states the sizes so I can’t be mad about that and I’m definitely not. It is the perfect size to put in a purse or makeup bag/to travel with without having to take an entire palette. Of course it’s only three colors but you can create some to die for looks with these! I got the “poppy champagne” trio and will be ordering more! There’s a reason these shimmers won Allure’s Beauty award. Pigmented and long lasting. I used Urban Decay’s primer potion so I can’t speak on its use without primer but with, my shadow looked freshly applied a good 8-10 hours later and counting. Giving 4 stars instead of 5 because it did take a little bit of effort to build up the color but that’s just what happens sometimes so by no means is that a deal breaker. Still would recommend the product to anyone on the fence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigmentation and long lasting colour! I can’t wait to get the other combos.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is dreamy...absolutely stunning on my eyes!!

reviews.review_title: Spiked Ginger is different from the others
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have 4 of these bento boxes (chocolate dahlia, orange blossom, toasted caramel, and spiked ginger (newest)). The mattes in CD and SG are buildable and blendable. They are pretty light and will most likely be suitable for fair to light-medium skintones. SG is VERY light. It is also important to note that the shimmer formula in SG is different than all of the other bentos I have. It is more subdued with tinier glitters. I would almost consider it a satin formula. The shimmer formula in the other 3 bentos is chunky and 10x as glittery as SG.   I still really like SG even though the shimmer was different than I was anticipating. It is warm without being too warm. I usually struggle with warm mattes looking too orange on me. This trio has the PERFECT amount of warmth without turning my eyelids into pumpkins.   Overall, I really like how compact these eyeshadows are and I enjoy the color stories that Kaja chooses. I am really tempted to get Mocha Spritz next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very surprised at how small this trio is when it arrived. It would have been PERFECT for travel if it included brow bone/inner corner shade.  I don't see myself picking any of the others up due to the size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cute little eyeshadows!!! They’re the perfect size for traveling or even someone who’s a beginner and eyeshadows. I pick spice ginger because I wanted a neutral I look that I could throw in my travel bag. I can’t attest to the longevity of the eyeshadows but so far the color payoff is great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is GORGEOUS with blue eyes. The formula is fantastic and blends like a dream. The shimmer is beautiful and applies well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really love these shimmers. I find they work best when you apply your matte eye shadows first, then go ahead and place the kaja shimmers right where you want them. I also love wearing them all over the eye with no crease colour. Just a blown out shimmery eye look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how travel friendly this is! It’s small and compact and is all you need for a complete eye look. The shadows are really nice too. TBH it’s all i’ve used on my eyes since i bought it a couple weeks ago. Definitely need to try more from this brand!

reviews.review_title: If you want glitter, this will give you glitter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow is so sparkly that it looks like a filter. I love it! The quality is amazing and the colors are amazing with my olive skin color. There is a lot of fall out like expected. But thats the only issue

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really a pretty trio here and a nice on the go assortment to put a quick look together.. a tad overpriced!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
