reviews.review_text: Blendable and extremely portable! The middle shade is perhaps too close to my skin tone, though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is super cute and very pigmented with lots of shimmer! Perfect for a neutral look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the packaging is so cute. the two matte shades blend lovely. the topper reflects the light and goes on nice and smooth.

reviews.review_title: glittery is a better description than shimmery
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly just okay. I was surprised because most people LOVE these shadows but to me the pigment just isn’t there. These are really just pressed glitters. I don’t know if it’s just this shade trio or across the board but I probably won’t spend the money to find out. If you have the money to spend and like heavily glittery shadows (much more glittery than shimmery) then these are alright

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really compact and good for on the go or travel. Has great shades and good variety of colours. Is really good for the price and definitely would buy more if these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this trio. If I ever see it on sale I will purchase multiple shades.  Absolutely beautiful I am so glad I bought it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and how pigmented it is. I've been looking for this type of shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The size is so convenient! I love how pigmented it is on my skin/skin tone. This may vary depending on your skin tone and shade (light, medium, deep, cool tone, warm tone, neutral). I realized that I never use all the eye shadows within each palate. I usually seen a color or two and use those. I found that to be a waste. With the beauty bento, I only buy them based on which shades I will use and make sure I use all three. I have the spiked ginger, rosewater and mauvy pink. I am looking at getting the coral one next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja’s shimmers are unmatched. I’m almost always pulling one out to use with another palette and complete my look. I love these little trios! They are so easy to use for a quick, simple, but GORGEOUS look. Also the easiest things to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If glitter is your thing, you’ll like these. The packaging idea is really cute, just wasn’t crazy about the formula. Was hoping for more of a shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great colors and amazing blending! The shimmer is beautiful and multidimensional and the mattes are a great pinky/mauve-y tone. I can’t wait to try other colors!!
Loved this product. Soft and beautiful tones can be worn on a daily. Eyeshadow lasts for over 12 hours. Size is also travel friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute packaging, i love it for travel! I use this almost ever day. The formula is super soft, shimmers show up so well and last all day. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite products for sure! It's a cute little package that packs a big punch. The sparkle is beautiful, noticeable, and pigmented. i've used it on its own all over the lid, and also as a topper. For comparison ... it's more sparkly than the Pat McGrath EYEdols eye shadow (celestial).

reviews.review_title: My favorite for a quick look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are the perfect shadows for a running late to class kind of day. Used it almost every day when I was going to college classes; quick to blend and easy colors for me to use as an eyeshadow newbie. The bottom shade is a darker brown, rather than a reddish-pink brown in the photo. The glitter shade is okay but it's a bit much for me personally so I used the middle shade as an all-over and the bottom as a liner shade. Totally worth it for me, I hope I can try more of these trios soon.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not gonna lie I pretty much bought this for the packaging. The formulas good not great. I applied with setting spray and it had some fallout throughout the day but nothing horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Convenient and compact packaging.  Color is natural and lovely but not super pigmented.  The glitter is chunky and does fall out.  Easy finger application.  Overall nice item but I won't be trying the other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the colour, however coz iritation on my sensitive eye lids. To bad, had to returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends beautifully. Can be built up or give a very lite,soft, look. Only downside is the shimmer has a few more glitter like particles than I generally prefer. Nothing that can't be remedied with some glitter blue though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiny but beautiful!!! I just got my first Kaja eyeshadow bento and love it! The shimmer is so stunning! I love wearing it on a Sunny day to catch all the shimmer! There was a bit of fallout when I was applying it but did my foundation afterwards so it wasn't a big deal for me. Stayed on all day too while I was outside! 10/10 will be purchasing more kaja bentos! The only thing I can complain about is that it is very tiny and wish I was getting more product for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite traveling eyeshadow. I love this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These looked so nice in the swatches in store and they are very pretty. I did end up returning them because the glitter was a bit too chunky for me but I think if you like that than these are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a shimmer eyeshadow that has to be cruelty free and vegan and came across Kaja. The beauty artist at Sephora was amazing in telling me about the brand (it’s k-beauty exclusive to Sephora!) and its founder. She swatched some colours for me and I knew right away this was gonna be a new favourite for me! The colours are pigmented, but not overwhelmingly so.   In the pic below, I used 2/3 colours from the rose water trio and the moon crystal sparkling eye pigment in mystical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best shimmer formulas I have used and the colour of the shadows is so flattering for blue/green eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades and very pigmented. Easy to use and easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely sparkly and lasts decently well on the eyes, long enough for an average day of work or school. I use the middle colour most, but love all three. There are definitely many similar eyeshadows that do the same as this, but i do enjoy them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this trio really amazed me. I love how small it is. It is perfect for traveling. The pigmentation is definitely there and it blends well. The formula is nice although I will say that I don’t find these shadows to be creamy. They feel like powder eyeshadows. Idk if they were trying to go for the same texture like colourpop super shock shadows. If you have any of those shadows those do feel creamy almost wet like but they dry down to a powder. These shadows are definitely not that but none the less they are very good and the price is right in my opinion. The shadow with glitter is really beautiful and the shine I get from it is really nice. I do notice a bit of fall out with the glitter shadow but not too much. I’ve tried other glitter shadows that just have tons and tons of fallout surprisingly this shadow had minimal fall out which I love. I definitely recommend this product and I will be picking up a few more. The trio I have is glowing guava. Oh and there is a mirror if that is something that is important to you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shadows and super compact however, lots of fallout and sometimes difficult to open the compact.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this trio more than any other eyeshadow product I own! I love pairing this trio with Hourglass Scattered Light eyeshadow In the shade “Ray”. Perfect everyday look for me. These shadows blend effortlessly. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 2 matte shades are perfect for a subtle everyday look. Creamy, buildable, and great quality for the price.  The palette is on the smaller side - each pan is slightly smaller than a quarter - but it’s more than plenty, especially if you’re just trying the colors out. I’ll definitely repurchase this one.   The shimmer shade is more of a strong, sparkly glitter, with larger flecks than I expected. I prefer a more subtle shimmer, so will probably stick to the mattes for this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. If you typically wear shimmery peach/nude/goldy coloured eyeshadows, you will love this trio. 10 out of 10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This little eyeshadow palette (mocha spritz) is freakin GOOOOOREOUS!!!! ESPECIALLY if you have a deeper skin tone! I think if you are fair this may be a bit intense for you, but medium to deep tones will LOVE this one! The deepest shade is this deep Smokey plum color I have been searching for FOREVER but nobody ever did right, until Kaja. The sparkly shade is a beautiful plummy bronze color that I have very rarely seen anywhere. And on top of everything, the quality is absolutely beautiful too!!! Great job Kaja!!! Now I am off to purchase the new cream blushes too!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great everyday daytime wear as well as travel friendy as the size is just little bit bigger than cdn toonie. the quality is good, pigmented. the downsize is the price. i think this is overpriced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I love the color pay off, didn't  need eye primer, very vibrant, beautiful, easy to apply with fingers, great for quick looks...only problem...? Has TALC! Had to return, please please please remove the talc from this. If you don't care about ingredients so much, this is perfect for everyone honestly. Esp make up newbies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second color trio I purchased.   Very nice color payout and very easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very unexpected color payout.   So glad I tried this product.   Can’t wait to try more looks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The case is cute and handy. The colors are soft and good for daily use. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

However, when it came in, it is definitely darker than what the picture looks like online. All of the eyeshadows are darker and more cool toned in person.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment and easy to blend! However, I think $21 is a little steep for the size of the product so I’m docking a star for the price lol. Otherwise, these are good for cute, every day looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Super compact and easy to pack/travel with, also amazing quality shadows. I love Kaja and I am so happy I bought this! Amazing pigment. Amazing packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have 4 of these & they are seriously AMAZING! please don't ever discontinue them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great colors that apply super easily! The pigments are pretty strong, but you need to apply primer so it’s long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I find these bentos very cute I like how they are small so I am able to bring them with me in my bag and I like how they also include a mirror in them for touch ups later on , I like how they have a variety of shades and textures I’m so in love with these that I have 3 of these and recently purchased another one would for sure grab another one in a different Shade

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Guys, this product is legit! I think the texture is perfect because it’s not super creamy to the point where it will crease on your lid but it does have sort of a matte finish and it goes on so smoothly. I love it, can’t wait to get more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors with a mix of shimmer and matte shadows. The Bento idea is cute, but can be a bit of a pain to open. However the colors and quality of the shadows more then make up for that. I’ll definitely be getting a couple more of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these, the shades go perfectly together and it’s great for travel since the shadows can get kinda thrown around in your makeup bag without getting hurt. The only reason I docked a star is because after an entire day the shadows do crease and fade a little bit. But overall, a nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product so much! the eyeshadows are so pigmented and are easily blendable. it’s so cute but also practical. it would be so easy to travel with because it’s so small. the shimmer shade is my favorite. it is so pretty and pigmented and it’s not chunky glitter which i love! i highly recommend, i will be getting the poppy champagne next :)

reviews.review_title: Very nice and cute bento eyeshodow

reviews.review_text: Its super cute and doesn't take up much space in my makeup bag. Its perfect for an every day use and doesn't bother my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the idea of 3 great colors to make a cute little look and easy to bring around. The texture is great and goes on well. I especially love the middle color. The shiny color I haven't tamed yet. I don't love how it looks, and I find the sparkles end up under my eye...but overall still a very cute product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just the colors you need in your daily life. I love how the colors go so well together. Also the packaging is too cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow set is so pretty! its perfect for doing a peachy eye and its travel size. except it was really small. I know its supposed to be tiny but it was pretty unexpected how small it was for 20 dollars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love. Mini sparkles are very glamorous and magnificent. I love this sooo much. I want to try other Kaja products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice colors are fabulous on my eyes! Easy application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Live the packaging but the shadows are super shimmery.  Will probably only use on special occasions or  evening events.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I knew these were going to be cute and fun but I had no idea how great they would be and how much I would love them! I bought Hella Azalea and Chocolate Delilah and both of them are gorgeous! The formula is like butter and the color is beautiful and very pigmented! The shimmers on both can very easily be made to be blinding! They can be used as a highlighter too. They’re extremely travel friendly and you can create a whole look with just one trio. I seriously want them all now!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute and compact packaging, love the colors, and the product quality is great. Love how this is the perfect product to throw in my bag for a look on the go.

reviews.review_title: Dont let a swatch fool you.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dont let a swatch fool you. I have been seeing these all over for quite a while. I finally caved and bought it online. When It came in I swatched it on my hand, and to say I wasn't impressed is an understatement. I was like f' it, Im just gong to put it on just to see WOW. I was wrong. It is such a beautiful bronze, and the three work really well with each other just for the perfect golden beach look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been opting for a more natural look for my make up these days because sometimes I just dont want to spend a lot of time on it. For a really quick look I ALWAYS reach for this eyeshadow trio.  The shimmer is TO DIE FOR and it just brightens up my inner corners so beautifully. The 2 mattes are nice too! Not super super pigmented but I really enjoy the colours since they're very natural on me.  I'd defs recommend and am dying to purchase other the other eyeshadow trios.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wore it on my wedding because it’s just so blendable long long long lasting even without primer and the colours are fresh pretty & soft formula with really pretty shimmer that comes included.  They usually have a shimmer then two mattes. Perfect for any look or occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The small trio really packs a punch! The pigment is great and it’s been lasting amazingly all day. I have to wear a mask and glasses all day and it seems to melt my makeup off, but at the end of the day my eyeshadow is still perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is one of the best I have tried. It's super pigmented so a little goes a long way. This one also has a nice mix of corals and more brown-toned colours so it's easy to use with different looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Glowing Guava set - mauvy pink tones.  They colors are unlike any mauvy pink tones I have (a lot) - however, they are very beautiful colors and colors I did not have (have at least 20 different palettes).  Goes on smoothly and not patchy.  I wish they had more mat colors (although middle color is a shimmer/glitter) because I'm 64 and matte is more forgiving ; )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice colors. The 3 colors are all very different, so you can use it to do different eye make up, very shiny and pigmented. It stays a long time as well. Cute and tiny, good to take it to travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I saw so many YT influencers chatting these up, but wasn’t really expecting much. I am INCREDIBLY impressed with the stack I purchased (Chocolate Dahlia). It is the perfect stack for an everyday eye and I could see myself actually using up the entire stack in the future. I have other far more expensive eye shadows but I keep reaching for this everyday because it applies so easily and lasts all day. I need to get more colors!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product is a bit smaller than I thought but it'll be great for travelling. Also I find the quality of these eyeshadows to be great and easy to use. The eyeshadows are very buttery and they apply very easily on the eye. Plus you can do an everyday look using any one of these shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WOWWWW... I purchased this from boxy pop up just to try one to see if I would like it.  My expectations have been surpassed for several reasons. These are really cool because you can pretty much do a full look with one of them and that's great for days when you're in a rush or if you're traveling. It was super creamy and buildable as well as very pigmented. The colors turned out so pretty, they look better on the eye than they do in the pan. I used the deep Purple in my crease and it was beautiful. I used the shimmer shade as a highlight and on the lid.  I used the pink color on my brow bone. I'm going to follow up and purchase more of these, they are super convenient and awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who doesn't wear or own much make up or tools, this is perfect. The product is smaller than I thought it would be but it's good for travel or to keep with you on the go. The formula is smooth and very pigmented, easily blends with fingers. I love this and definitely want to get more colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow has become my new day to day look! It’s nice and compact which makes it easy to travel with, the colors are cute and buildable. Absolute 10/10, this is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not usually a pink eye shadow type of person but these colors are so cute and perfect for my everyday work

reviews.review_title: Fun colors to brighten up your makeup this summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I am loving this eyeshadow set! The colors are gorgeous, and they blend really well. It’s the perfect pop of color when you want to play up your eyes, but you can still make it a subtle look too. I will most likely purchase additional colors to try out :) As others have said the set is smaller than you’d expect for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is adorable and would be great for travel. I gave it three stars because in my opinion, it’s just sparkle with a hint of color. Not much pigment at all. Maybe the other color combinations without sparkle are better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is lovely, tiny. The color is brighter than on website, more netraul and brown, not pink like on these pictures. The first impression is fine, soft, color is perfect, easy to apply. Not 5 stars because the size is smaller than I thought and the shade is not pink like on website, but still love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really like how cute the packaging is on these. The mattes are nice and creamy (wouldn't call them particularly bouncy) and the color stories are really cute. The shimmer in this set (Glowing Guava) isn't my favorite. The color is pretty and it looks okay on the eye, BUT it is pretty chunky, has quite a bit of fall out during application with glitter getting all over the cheek, is kind of thin, and seems to emphasize texture. Finger or brush didn't help. Kept it as a travel trio since it's so cute and the mattes are perfect, but probably won't use the shimmer shade. Not sure if it's this specific trio or all the shimmers are similar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to apply with a primer, my fingers, a brush, but the results are all the same. Theres too much fallout and its just a glitter mess on my face. I don’t think its worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a gift.  Beautiful texture.   The gutter is fine and smooth.  Not sandy at all.  The colours can be worn alone or together.  It’s will be great for travelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the shadows are absolutely stunning! although, it is very glittery and not as much shimmers as its mentionned. very beautiful nonetheless

reviews.review_title: Lovely easy to use everyday shadows
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is adorable and versatile. The packaging is small and compact but the shadow pans are nicely sized. The shimmery top shade is more intense than expected, which is nice. The dark brown is nice and pigmented, and the middle shade is a nice transition shade for those with light skin. The colours are neutral, leaning slightly more pink than brown. I made an easy wearable look in five minutes, using the dark brown as liner. I will be using this for work and travel and I'm thinking of picking up another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: these are so beautiful! they have a beautiful shine to them, they give you the glossy lid look without the mess. they also last pretty well and aren't a pain to remove. I recommend a flat concealer type brush to apply them, but fingertip application gives the best look imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have four of these now.  I loved the all shimmer ones, but the trios with the matte shades are perfect! Chocolate Dahlia is my favorite for a quick out of the door look. Very happy with these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice pigment and I really recommend this product! You can also use it as a blush! The packaing is so cute and you can carry it whenever you go!

reviews.review_title: More beautiful in person and on the eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: many shadows look great in the pan or in swatches online but not the same in person/on the eyes; these are even BETTER than the swatches! They are sooo sparkly and last a long time on the lid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing pigment and sparkle. Definitely my favourite pan-style eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! The three colours makes getting ready in the morning super easy. The shimmer on the chocolate dahlia is definitely a bit more glittery than I would’ve expected but I’ll absolutely wear it. Great colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I was not expecting this to be as small as it is, but if I am being honest I have yet to ever hit pan on an eyeshadow so this is probably more worthwhile in terms of waste. I love the colours, they are the perfect browns and the shimmery shade is gorgeous and not too glittery. I do need to wear a primer underneath for staying power but overall I am really happy with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning shimmers, but i wish there was more matte colours in the range and available. It doesn’t look good to have all shimmers on my eyes...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a present for mothers day for my momma- its ADORABLE but beware its really small for the price you pay. however, its really cute and I might get myself one oops :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stack is very beautiful but if you don't like pink and fuchsia on your eyes dont get it. I love pink and purple eyeshadow so I had to get this. These are the most blendable bright matte eyeshadows in my collection. I only gave it 4 stars because I wish it had one more eyeshadow, like a matte light pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried both the mattes and the shimmers. Both options are great. The mattes are super creamy and the shimmers are lightweight and sparkly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite shadows! I wasn't sure if the pink shades would be too bright or Barbie-ish, but they give a beautiful sheer wash of twinkling color that compliment my hazel eyes. Just to test them out, I applied and blended with my finger over bare, slightly oily eyelids. My eyes looked like I spent much more time on them than I did, and the color blended beautifully. I then went to do a sweaty hour-long workout in 90 degrees.  The staying power was great, with NO creasing, and minimal glitter fallout. These can also be applied wet for a more intense, foiled look. The shimmer shades are very similar to Urban Decay Moondust, except you get 3 shades for the price of one UD shadow! I think I'll be back for more ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was on the fence about this trio, but I am SO happy I bought this. The colors, especially the lightest, are so gorgeous. The shimmer gives a more wet look than a glittery look which I like. If you blend it in it gives the most beautiful sheen. I love it so much. Totally worth the buy. Also I've used this every day and still haven't hit pan. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I received these eyeshadows in the mail, they were all completely broken. So disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are AMAZING.. the shades are beautiful, buttery  shimmers and you can literally apply them with your fingers! That is the best part IMO. It’s hard to mess up. I struggle with eyeshadows in general and having hooded eyes makes it even harder, but with these I can finally enjoy having colour on my eyes and not looking stupid. They look great, adding a lovely splash of shimmery colour and the BEST PART is that it’s mistake proof. I recommend this to anyone who struggles with eyeshadow application - this will make you feel like a pro :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the glowing guava and almost immediately bought the poppy champagne as well. Crazy adorable little trios that are fabulous. I love the mattes they're pigmented (juicy grapefruit in poppy champagne IS lighter than it looks. But that didn't surprise me because I understand the intention of Korean makeup) they're beautifully blendable and are so smooth and nice. The glitter shades are quite dramatic and look fantastic. I'm in love with both colors I got and can't wait to mix them to get even more looks. So happy I finally decided to try Kaja and will certainly try more of their products in the future. Love them.

reviews.review_title: Glitter fallout is annoying, colours are pretty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great colours, but the fallout is annoying. It seems like it's the worst during application but I also noticed the glitter fall out through the day. Packaging is super cute and the payoff is great, just need to clean up after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like the orange blossom trio looks much more pink online. That brown shade is quite taupey online, but it's still very pretty. These have a beautiful glittery finish. They're harsher than the Charlotte Tillbury pop shades, but they are still stunning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for on the go makeup! Colors are easy to blend and suitable for everyday makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging! Great color! It’s perfect to use during summer time; also, the first shade can be used either as an eyeshadow glitter or as a highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am by no means a makeup guru and this product made it SO  easy. First time I've ever used eye shadow and it came out beautifully!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite makeup products ever! The adorable compact packaging makes it easy to throw in a makeup bag and bring anywhere.  The palette is great for daytime and nighttime looks because the colors go on smoothly and are buildable -- you can go from subtle shimmer to party glitter in no time!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect thing to use if you need to do your makeup on the go. I love the pigmented colors they are so pretty love this product I will definitely by this brand again,

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are absolutely beautiful! I'm not big into doing crazy eyeshadows and I love just a simple look. Eyeshadow pallettes are so expensive with a lot of colours I just wouldn't use... I was recommended this and it was love at first use! You can create a few looks with just these three shadows, it is compact so it doesn't take up a bunch of room (and perfect for travel), and the shadows last all day. The shimmer/glitter colour is  S T U N N I N G. Highly recommend and this is my new holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are absolutely beautiful.  I’ve picked up 4 in total already and I can’t get over how amazing the shimmers are.  They look like diamonds on your eyelids and the mattes are also very blendable.  They are super easy for travelling because of the small size and are super cute too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly think this is my first review I've ever written of a product, it's that good. I bought the Toasted Caramel trio, and apply it with my fingers, and I can honestly say these three shades are an absolute dream to work with. SO smooth, SO pigmented, and SO beautiful. Online the shades look similar to one another, but in person they're so distinguishable from one another, it's wonderful. I also think the packaging and the size of the pans are perfect, for either everyday or for travel. As someone who has loved makeup for as long as I can remember (and even worked at Sephora on the floor!) I'm genuinely baffled at the few reviews that talk about the size of the eyeshadow pans being small. Like, girl what? Check the weight of the eyeshadow pans you have at home because I can ~assure~ you, the vast majority of them are not 0.9g worth of product per pan like these. These are a really, really good size for an eyeshadow. Get these shadows - you'll look like JLo just getting back from the Bahamas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I use the top shade as my cheek highlighter! It's perfect and I get so many compliments on my highlight when I use this one. I am happily purchasing it again!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a tiny little thing - and that's a good thing! The pan sizes are just the same if not more than your typical eyeshadow but there is not excessive packaging. So easy to travel with or keep in the bathroom for everyday makeup routines. These shadows pack a punch, too! I just barely tap into them and then blend away for a beautiful, soft look. The shimmer is beautiful but has some fallout. I suggest doing your eye makeup first with this one, unless you are just using the mattes. Overall, a unique product idea that proved successful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never hesitate to bring your eyeshadow palette to a sleepover again. The compact size and strong packaging make it easy to travel with. Very impressed with the longlasting color output! I highly recommend glowing guava and chocolate dahlia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this trio. I've never been very good at doing eyeshadow but I am currently trying to learn it at least in some capacity. I have never really worn eye makeup much because of a combination of sensitive eyes and my tendency to lean towards very basic, no makeup-makeup looks, but this stuff is so easy to blend and it doesn't irritate my eyes or skin! It's not a super intense pigment, but not outrageously light either. Reasonably medium, buildable powders!  It doesn't crease too much--I've noticed a few times at the very end of the day I'll see a bit of creasing, but that's after at least about 10-12 hours of wear, and I haven't used eyeshadow primer so I think that's a likely explanation.  The colours in this trio are so beautiful too, I'm getting lots of use out of the middle sparkly shade and a similar amount from the lighter pink. I'm looking forward to trying the darker pinky/mauve for a bolder look one day when I build up the courage! Will definitely repurchase this when the need arises, and I'm looking into other shades already. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this and the orange blossom. I’m super pale with dark hazel eyes. These colors really make the green in my eyes pop without making me too made up or being too dark for my skin. Compared to other glittery shadows, the fallout is non existent. The colors work so well together, I can’t see myself buying another type of shadow other than these. Love them.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these pods! Great color and great for traveling. I want them all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These colors, glitters are ESSENTIAL for easy light 5 minute makeup glow ups, but also a fun pigmented addition to a more complicated night out look. A great alternative for some of the more expensive pigmented glitter colors or a whole palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color, shine and look of these shadows! They look great on my olive skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This little trio is amazing! I want to collect them all so badly if they're as easy to use and as pigmented as the guava trio. The mattes were especially impressive for me. Poppy is next on my list.  If you're new to eyeshadow or have a hard time w/blending, you'll love this trio!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is great, especially in this color. They blend easily and its great for travel if you dont want to take too many products with you or you have limited space. Perfect combo of matte and shimmer shades for an everyday look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect for easy dimensional eyeshadow. the white shimmer is super amazing.

reviews.review_title: Excellent buy, and the price is great.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are great. They looked exactly as I expected. The color lasted for several hours, and the packaging is really cute and easy to manage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEAUTIFUL SHADOW TRIO!  This is by far my favorite eyeshadow for a quick day of makeup to get out the door. They blend themselves. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: IF YOU CAN READ THIS - BUY IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t think I can even express how far my love goes for these eyeshadow trios. I love the colour story for each of these and will definitely be buying more. I have the Chocolate Dahlia and the Rosewater trios and I’m obsessed. I wear them constantly and every time I do, I receive compliments on my eyeshadow! The mattes blend out beautifully just like ND or Viseart shadows and the glitters are so creamy and easy to apply. They give you the perfect wet lid look, which I am obsessed with all year round! The glitters do have fall out but that doesn’t bother me at all and I can easily swipe it away with a clean brush, but just keep that in mind if it is a deal breaker for you. I recommend these to everyone! I feel so weird posting these photos, but these are my only pictures that show the Rosewater (pink) and the Chocolate Dahlia (brown) on my lid really well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So in love. Such beautiful, sparkly, high definition eyeshadow that you can create so many looks. Each shade is just absolutely stunning and I will keep repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE! I am totally obsessed with KAJA products ! But this shadow trio is the icing on the cake! I always get tons of compliments every time i wear it.  Its super glittery so best applied with fingers and looks so stunning,  i even wear the lightest shade for a super popping highlight on my cheek bones!

reviews.review_title: Wow! One of my new favorites!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors and they stay on well. My daughter loves this! It’s the first eye shadow she has had. The colors are so pretty and sparkly I am buying one for myself now too!

reviews.review_title: Compliments EVERY time - Love EVERY color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are STUNNING (they are a little warmer in person than appears on my laptop). I have never in my life worn all the colors in a multi-shadow palette but i love each one of these and wear them all regularly.   I get compliments EVERY time I wear this shadow and I'm not exaggerating. I've had at least 3 people look it up as they were in front of me and taken a screenshot of this page to remember it.  The light color is a warm, sunset pink, the middle is a midd-tone cherry-candy and the dark is a rich bordeaux (i even skip my eyeliner). Seriously, best eyeshadow purchase of my life. They stay on, they shimmer a lot but aren't tacky/chunky glittery and they are my favorite colors. No reactions from my sensitive skin/eyes. I'm a happy girl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of my favorite eyeshadow purchases ever! The formula is very forgiving and the color is great for everyday office makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are SO small, for the price! I was honestly expecting something a little bit bigger. These are pretty, but WAY too small for that price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a set. These are medium chunky glitter eyeshadows, which aren’t my favorite but after a few uses the texture and colors grew on me. The middle color is a beautiful golden orange. They have at least 8-10 hours staying power with a primer. They blend very easily too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the matte shadows because they blend nicely and are pretty colors but the glitter shades (on multiple trios, I tried multiple) are WAY too glittery. And they get everywhere. Cute idea but I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have both rosewater and toasted caramel (the golden brown shimmer one), and I personally love both of them. I can take them with me everywhere, and I feel like they are universally flattering colors.;

reviews.review_title: A Very Soft Pop of Color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The main reason I give this four stars is because the photos are misleading on here for Poppy Champagnes pigmentation.  It shows up as a bold color trio with a good amount of pigmentation, but it just isn't.  I have super pale skin and even I have issues getting the mattes to show up that boldly on me.  It takes a lot of building up to get to the same pigmentation as seen in the swatches.  I wouldn't mind a very subtle korean-inspired eyeshadow trio, but I want it to be advertise like that when its being swatched.  Anyways that is my main problem with this.  I absolutely adore the packaging, its so easy for travel.  I could toss this in my purse and not worry a single bit.  I also adore the mirror it has on top.  I actually do like the subtleness of the color shades of orange and red for a softer, more work appropriate pop of color.  There is no fallout and the shimmer actually does show up quiet well.  I do recommend this, but be aware that it is a softer touch of color and not a super bold pop of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shadows. They looks so pretty on my olive skin and are very shimmery. I want to try more of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmery colors of this eyeshadow trio made me want to try this brand out. It makes for a nice little travel set. And if you're like me and don't want to heavy on the makeup, it does a splendid job for a casual look. The colors are lovely and go on so nicely. I've gotten many compliments on this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The amount of shimmer and glitter this product has. Oh. My. God. This is exactly what I’m looking for. Even when I just wanted to add a quick oomf to my look, this is it. A little goes a long, long way. After my 10hrs at work I can still see them on my eyes, they haven’t fluffed away. And I love the bento style this comes in, really portable too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorites! The shimmer is gorgeous and it goes on so easily when applied with clean finger tips! I’m a teacher so my makeup has to last a long time and this doesn’t budge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect mini palette, glamorous and neutral tones. I  feel confident every time I apply these shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how easy and versatile this little compact is.  Carry it in my bag at all times and touching up is so easy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture, it goes on so beautifully.  Gonna get more colours.  Just don't go overboard cause you may end up with sparkles on your cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Orange Blossom - I was pleasantly surprised by these. The compact design is handy for travel and the colors are so gorgeous! They do have glitter in them and I get a bit of fall out if I use too much at a time, but they are really pretty on the eyes. Great for toned down makeup days when you just want a little bit of shine on your eyes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was great, but after a couple days, the bottom pallet completely fell out, so a bit disappointed, but overall, a great eyeshadow.

reviews.review_title: Reach for it ALL the time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little trio. The colours aren’t groundbreaking but they are just awesome everyday shades, especially the middle one. I find myself reaching for this all the time and recommending it to friends who keep a pretty simple makeup collection cuz it’s just so great and useable. I always pack it when I travel and never worry about it breaking either.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous, neutral colors. This one is worth the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of the best shimmer eyeshadow formulas out there. The glitter is super fine and non irritating, and there's little to no fall out. It spreads beautifully and is buildable. I can spread it out on my eyelids for a super natural glow, or build it up to look intense. I really want to buy the other Bentos! I'm cheering on this brand personally, they really are pushing the boundaries for western makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cute packaging caught my eye but being able to play with the testers is what sold me. Generally a neutral girl when it comes to makeup, but the gorgeous plummy and hot pink matte shadows in this palette sing to my soul! I love using a small angled brush for a soft liner look with either of those for a pop of color in the daytime. The soft pink shimmer is super fun, especially when layered over the matte colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are pretty but they cross the line between shimmery to too glittery. Way too much glitter for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. The quality is amazing, I also have the chocolate Dahlia and the mattes are so soft and buttery and blend like a dream and I use my finger to apply the shimmer and the pay off is amazing and lasts for hours. Really want Kaja to come out with more trios with 2 Mattes 1 shimmer. Absolutely stunning! Such a hidden gem

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shimmer for warm skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have olive/yellow undertone and these warm shades goes well with my skin tone. All three provide a beautiful shimmer and they apply easily with either your fingers or with a brush. I love to use it as a topper and it gives me that subtle shimmer that I love. I'm very much into the minimalistic makeup look so this is perfect to what I was looking for. If you want more of a punch for a more glam eye, you can definitely layer it to add more pigment and glimmer but I personally only like to use a little for a softer look. The lightest shade a pretty champagne shimmer, the middle is an orange and gold shimmer, and the bottom is a brown/mocha shimmer. It lasted me all with the UD setting spray.

reviews.review_title: all shine everywhere all the time. no contrast.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Colours in the trio I bought are so close together there is barely any contrast, which makes having 3 shades redundant. Hyper shimmery, which is fine if you want a hyper shiny face, but the small packaging makes this hard to apply with a blush or highlighter brush. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! I recently just got Orange Blossom #2 in the Shimmer and I'm in love! I wish I got the matte one too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have East Asian skin tone, use this trio now as my default daily eye makeup and have gotten compliments. I apply the first two tones as base with a finger and the darkest as crease colour with a brush, followed by a dark mauve liner. Colour density is very good. It does seem to move a little over the course of the day, even over primer, but the look is smoky rather than precise areas of colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great palette if you are like me and are looking for some basic brown hues (neutral cocoa) and end up not even touching half of the shades in a large palette. It’s definitely not wildly pigmented or my favorite, but it’s fine for every day use and great to have as a backup to a large/your favorite palette. It is tiny and I am not as concerned as I usually am about the eyeshadows breaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful but its super super small and the shimmer is more like glitter! This should cost 1/2 the price for what you get! But it is Great for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in Toasted Caramel and Orange blossom. It's SO beautiful. Very shimmery/glittery but very fine and smooth. Unlike any other shadows I've ever used. I was hesitant because of the price but it's so worth is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my god I love this little trio. it's so so perfect for everyday use. I usually hate putting on eyeshadow because I suck at it, but this is truly fool proof. the colours are beautifully flattering, easy to blend, and pigmented. The shimmer in this set is also so unique and beautiful. i really need to pick up way more of these little trios.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Adds that extra flash to your eyes. With 3 different choices you have a nice range of choices

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but not as good as Rosewater. I wish they would make some with more colors... this color story not as good for me. But a great product, lots of shine but w/o the glitter. Way better than frost shades. Love KAJA Bento.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite eyeshadow set and its my everyday go to. Even though I have a lot of palettes, I find myself reaching for this more. It is so easy to use, all I do is put some on my finger and smear it over my eyelid. I also love how shimmery the colours, they are perfect to use by themselves or on top of a matte shade. Can't get enough of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very cute idea but it was not as pigmented as I'd hoped. Maybe its the shimmer but I wish it applied better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of these! Easy to travel with, on the go options with an adorable mini mirror. The matte shades have hella staying power, not so much the glitter shades. I find that applying the glitter shades with a finger works better than a brush. I’ve tried several of the compacts and the formulas are consistent and blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So, so pretty.  Sparkly, beautiful pink colors that blend well and have very little fallout.  I use the caramel set as well.  So much more convenient than a huge pallette!  Love!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chocolate Dahlia and Glowing Guava are my go-tos for natural neutral looks. The color payoff on the mattes is good and they blend well. I use them with and without primer and the look lasts all day either way. It's a nice bonus that these are very easy to travel with because of the size and built-in mirror. I prefer the matte options over the shimmers, but I thought Orange Blossom was pretty too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I picked up Orange Blossom on a whim and I fell in love with the colors and the pigmentation. I just got Rosewater and it’s just as beautiful! The glitter is really fine so it’s not chunky but it applies smooth and it’s not patchy. It’s so fool proof I can’t wait to get another!

reviews.review_title: Minimalistic and great on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Chocolate Dahlia, Glowing Guava, and Orange Blossom. These are really great minimalist products with three shadows that come in a variety of color schemes to pick from, although not all the sets contain a matte color, such as Orange Blossom.  If you like or need to use a matte shadow to complete your look and you don't want to have to open another eye palette, just double check to make sure the set you're buying has one. The shimmer shades definitely have some reflect, almost seems like a micro glitter, and look beautiful on top of any look. I do notice that there is occasionally some minor fall out with the glitters in the shimmers, but nothing too crazy and it doesn't feel like a chunky glitter. Pigmentation is decent on the matte shades, and they blend fairly well. Might crease a little if you don't wear an eyeshadow primer and have oily eyelids like me. If you own any super shock shadows from colourpop, they're about the same size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was just browsing the store with nothing in mind when I came across this brand. I really liked the packaging and the colors of the shadows. I bought the chocolate dahlia and I am in love ❤️ The colors are wearable and not heavy. I have chocolate brown eyes and a medium skin tone and some brown shadows make me look tired. This brightens my eyes because of the champagne shade and the browns are matte. The colors blend beautifully with little fallout. I’m definitely going back for another color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not much fallout, glitter's not too heavy for daytime. Excellent quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades, very cute and compact packaging! My only problem is the wear, I live in cold climate and it seems to wear off faster when outdoors for some reason.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this. I made two of my friend buy it. Its the best shadow to have it with me in my pouch. The top shimmer is just beautiful. Has some BOOM. Middle colour is just beautiful. Just that colour on my lid is enough for everyday. The third colour is dark but blendable. It blends really well so I can use it to give some more deepness in my eyes or I can draw my liner with small brush as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous sparkle and convenient packaging! Beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty. The colors go on smoothly and last all day. Great buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gorgeous formula and shades! The metallic lightest shade is really special. Pops on the eye. All shades blend well and look beautiful. Innovative packaging and just so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so I have very sensitive skin and yet this shadow goes on like a dream! I plan on buying more when I get payed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: really pigmented and didn’t need to use a lot of product. the colours in the trio go well together or by themselves

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I apply with my fingers, stays well, don’t irritate my eyes and very smooth and shimmery. Minus one star because the colours look the same on me.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, affordable, and easy to apply!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! They are much cheaper in price in comparison to the Stila glitter and glow liquid eye shadows, yet I feel like they preform just as well. The Stila liquid shadows do offer a much wetter looking glitter, however, I use a mac paint pot as a base for this product and the glitter stays on all day and looks absolutely beautiful! I have received so many compliments when I wear this eye shadow all over my lip and I would definitely recommend the Kaja shimmer eye shadow trios to anyone looking for a high quality glitter that is easy to apply and looks great all day! I am wearing the second tiered shadow on my lid in the photo (this was after 7 hours of wear fiy).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice eyeshadows and I like the packaging.  Hardly any fallout. Love the colors.  Pretty expensive for only 3 shades though

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Looks good as an everyday shadow but can be glammed up as well. I just like how versatile the looks you can get with just this set; pretty pigmented too. Also love that it’s compact enough to fit my small makeup pouch especially since I lug around a whole lotta stuff when I travel ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sparkle, fits my make bag, so i take it eveywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful eyeshadows. I would recommend them. they stay on all day and are highly pigmented. my new beauty staple!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful eyeshadows!! they stay on all day and do not transfer. Plus they are highly pigmented. I will continue to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Been reaching for it almost everyday. I have used more pigmented shadows but not many with such a gorgeous reflect. They are gorgeously shimmery / glittery and make amazing lid toppers, or can be worn alone as well!!

reviews.review_title: lovely shimmer, versatile colors, great packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this trio of eyeshadows, especially the shimmer -- it is very pigmented and shimmery but because it is close to my skin color, it doesn't look over the top.  I find it subtle enough to wear to work, but buildable if I want to amp it up on weekends, etc.  The other two colors are great with it to create a neutral tone smoky eye.  I also love how this is packaged in a stack -- anything that saves space in my cabinet is a win in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: le produit glisse bien et tiens bien en général mais on doit l’appliquer au doigt sinon sa tombe

reviews.review_title: Comes out somewhat darker than expected.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this Kaja Eyeshadow Trio. It is very cute and can be useful when on the go. I bought the RoseWater Eyeshadow and noticed that the colors are darker than pictured. I typically use the first color the most and even though it is the lightest it turns out pretty noticeable. This product also contains a mini mirror for the first color. Overall, this product is nice and I recommend it for special events rather than a normal day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never take the time to write reviews, but I just had to review this. I got the shimmer trio in Rosewater. I've never had so many compliments on my eye makeup before. The colors are so sparkly and beautiful. Perfect for a special occasion. There is fallout when applying so definitely do your eyes first and wear a primer.

reviews.review_title: Not bouncy, tons of fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are not bouncy at all. There just regular powder shadows and they're just okay. The glitter shade has SO MUCH fall out. I was hoping for an easy trio that I could apply with fingers. This is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, browns are boring.  But now that I'm a certain age, I guess I want easy and boring.  That being said, this eyeshadow trio makes putting on my eye makeup a breeze.  The packaging is cute and travel friendly.  The only thing I dislike (and it's just a minor point) is that I wish the shimmer shade was more metallic and less sparkly.  The microsparkle fallout can be a drag and also a pain to remove.  I still have microsparkle after a double cleanse and then need to go in with a Q-tip and micellar water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I own four different color sets of this eyeshadow and just love it. Small for travel, super cute packaging, love the pigments. They are so cute and I love this company. I got the heart cheek stamp and lip gloss duo as well and adore them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Color is gorgeous and stays all day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice sparkle, pretty colors on fair skin and green eyes. Not great staying power but may be better with a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have teeny tiny hooded eyes, so I rarely use eyeshadow. But does that stop me from buying it? No, because a makeup goblin lives in me that wants me to buy everything shiny thing I see. I was gifted Chocolate Dahlia as well as Glowing Guava for Christmas, and let me say these are beautiful little things. The mattes are buttery without being too pigmented to blend, the shimmers are out of this world without even having to wet the brush. Now don’t get me wrong, these little things are expensive. But the pans are the same size you normally see in palettes, just in a little compact case that is very easy to store and use. I highly recommend these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Colours are beautiful but not super pigmented. They are beautiful but slightly darker than you think. The packaging is cute and convenient for storage! Powder is a little crumbly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these!  I have bought two more since getting this trio. This toasted caramel set is still my favorite. I always travel with it because you can wear the shadows alone or add as a topper for a nice shine. Can’t wait to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this product is great! Received these for testing via influenster and the colors are beautiful!! 4 stars because if you don’t have a god primer the pigmentation gets lost. Overall a wonderful product! Great natural shades for any skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this stack out because I absolutely love dusty rose/peachy tones on myself. I was not disappointed. The colors are subtle but buildable without a lot of fall out and the shimmery shade does wonders on the inner corner. I've even used the middle shade as a blush and it worked amazingly. Will definitely purchase more from this company in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors and the way they are packaged. For someone that loves more of a natural look I thought this trio was perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to be honest, I bought this primarily for the gimmick - I travel a lot, and the bento idea is really cute and convenient. I'd like the darker colors to be just a smidge more pigmented though, otherwise it's a really good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really beautiful eyeshadows and I love how travel sized they are while still being full sized shadows! Very pigmented and I recommend them to all my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful and pigmented colors. I loved adding this to my routine. I actually used these colors as a blush and highlight. Don’t use without some kind of primer or it faded.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Rosewater trio works perfectly with my pale skin, but there is a ton of fallout. Sometimes I don't mind a little glitter all over my face, but it is rough that it happens often. The trios are also definitely toppers and can't be used as an individual eyeshadow. It can be applied wet or dry, however it is very crumbly and as stated before, the glitter goes everywhere. I do love the trio and plan on trying it in different colors, but just be aware of it's flaws.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice and natural color.  It goes on smoothly and has a practical packaging. great buy for the price. Only wish the shimmering shadow be finer

reviews.review_title: F A L L O U T
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay. I don’t think I know how to use it properly but it has SO much fallout. Colours are pigmented just the fallout isn’t the greatest part.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday eyeshadow stack.  If I don't know what to use on my eyes this is my go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color combinations. I really wish the product had longer wear time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this product! Glowing Guava gives you a beautiful smoky yet wearable look. The eyeshadows blend out like a dream, and they last all day with a primer underneath. This is also perfect for traveling since it’s 3 eyeshadows in one compact package. One thing to note: the eyeshadows in person look a lot more neutral and less pink compared to the pictures on the website. Online the middle shade looks like a champagne color but it’s more like a deep burgundy IRL.  I received this for free in my Influenster Voxbox.
