reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great eyeshadow palette! I love the tones of brown and alittle shimmer. I wear these shades all the time! The colors aren’t so dark , so it gives a soft , light look . Overall , I love it!

Love this product in so many ways. It’s small and efficient very useful for traveling and fitting into makeup bag. The quality of the product is really good and has a gorgeous look over all. Love love love this product would definitely go out and purchase some more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free to try from Influenster. I loved this eyeshadow component! The stacked package is perfect for travel and so unique! The matte shadows themselves are pigmented but the glitter shadows in particular have a lot of fallout. The lightly colored glitter shadows also lack pigment and are mostly just glitter. However I didn't mind any of them!

reviews.review_title: I FREAKING LOVE It. Worth the splurge.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly. *sets down tea* Blends SO beautifully and the color payoff IS AMAZING. I have little to no technical skill with shadows, so this is a really good starter trio for amateurs or must have for pros considering it's so easy to work with and so travel friendly. I can just throw it into my pocket or tiny purse. TAKE THE PLUNGE. I already have this in Chocolate Dahlia and Glowing Guava

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not normally an eyeshadow type of girl, but I tried this out and it looks so great! It stays in place all night and isn’t too over the top. I will be a repeat customer! Five stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this eyeshadow for someone younger just starting out . You have to use primer before and really build the colors . The colors and glitter shimmer are nice but not super bold and you don’t get much out of it using a brush . For a younger sibling , child or cousin I’d buy but not for myself .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really loved this! super pigmented but still blended out very easily! It’s not clunky and very compact which is super nice for travel it’s almost a complete eye only thing missing would be a brow bone color. Also has a little tiny mirror which technically isn’t super ideal but when traveling and in a pinch is very handy. I found that the eyeshadows stayed put from the time applied (with primer) to the moment I washed my Face at the end of the day approximately 8-10 hours of wear.  Also the colors in this compact are super flattering used all together to make a look perfect combination! Obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cute. I like that the three of them can make a completed look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these eyeshadows!! The mattes are so creamy and blendable and the shimmers are so stunning and glittery! These shades are the perfect sultry rose mauves. It also comes in the perfect travel packaging! You get three shadows in a tiny compact rather than a bulky palette. Excited to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is super cute and the pigment is full on! For lazy days, I just use my finger and swipe one or two shades on my lid. Sometimes I use it as a topper with other pallettes.   The best way to apply is using your finger. I noticed a brush gives a soft, fairy-dust effect.   The top peach color is beautiful as a highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shadows! So pretty and give a really glossy look to the eye and easy to use. Keep in mind that you need to use your fingers to make it work, if you just use a brush all you’ll get is glitter and no color. But the colors are beautiful and I love the compact packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are quite pigmented. But I don’t prefer how sparkly one is and how matte the other two are. The colors are a bit bold for my skin tone so they look out of place when I wear them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the pigment of this eyeshadow trio! I think it’s so innovative and cute as well, and I’m a sucker for packaging! Not to mention the product is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is so worth it. If you’re always on the go like I am it is easy for on the go!! They’re very pigmented and blend out really well! Worth the purchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! Love to travel with it and the pigment is just amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these eyeshadow trios. They stay on all day and the pigments are true to color. I always get a lot of compliments when I wear this eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this eyeshadow! Great quality! I dont like how they are stacked but other than that It was amazing. Great formula too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I have never tried pink eye looks before but I received this complimentary to test out and OoooHhhh MYYYYYyyyy GOOOOOSSHHHH I fell in love! The texture. The color. The shimmer. It is is amazing and such perfect little packaging for travel! I have recommended this to so many people and NEED all the colors ASAP.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the slightest touch and it has so much pigment. it's a mess when cleaning but it's so creamy and easy to put on. they each have cute little mirrors. they're great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is super buildable and pretty on a range of skin tones. The only negative is that I feel that I really had to build the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product such a cute design and super portable! The shadow has great staying power and is incredibly pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shadows were pigmented, easy to blend, and overall high quality shadows. I felt like more colors were needed to complete a look (transition shades) but i didnt mind grabbing others from my collection. The mirrors were a clever attempt at making this product perfect for on the go but i found they were too small to use. Again this was a very minor thing since i always have a bigger mirror on me. I hope kaja creates an eye shadow palette because their colors are so unique and beautiful.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for travel and nights out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The long lasting shimmer of this eyeshadow trio is perfectly pigmented and pairs excellently with other Kaja products like Kaja wink stamp.  The eyeshadows range in natural shades that blend together beautifully, my personal favorite being the glittery top rung of the bento set.  I take my 2 kaja beauty bentos everywhere I go, and the mini mirror makes application even easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found that the matte shades were pigmented and easy to blend, but the shimmers didn’t seem to be easy to place. They wanted to stick more to my fingers than my eyes and they wouldn’t adhere to a brush very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow trio is amazing and blendable the shimmer shades are so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this nearly every time I do my eye makeup, highly recommend to those who love soft glam looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chocolate Dahlia is the perfect trio. I gravitate for it all the time when I’m in a rush. The shadow is so glittery and beautiful but the mattes are so easy to work with. This is a beginners dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously the best eyeshadow combo ever. I get compliments everyday on these shades. They’re super versatile and can be used for an everyday look. Best value for your money...who even needs an eyeshadow palette anymore?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, pictures do not to this adorable shadow trio justice.  The mattes are beautifully pigmented and blend flawlessly, and that shimmer is BLINDING and so soft.  Like any glittery substance, there’s fallout so if you do your foundation first, prepare for that but that’s just expected.  What I love is that usually these high shine shadows crease and transfer on my hooded eyes, but not this one, it stayed put all day and looked gorgeous up until I took it off.  I’m a mom with a high energy toddler, so if makeup stays put through my day, it’s a win. On and The packaging is ADORABLE!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the original shimmery eyeshadow from kaja with the trio of only shimmery colours. I was disappointed because it was too much glitter and not enough pigment. BUUUTT...my silent prayers have been answered and they came out with the trio that features 2 matte colours and one shimmery colour. Needless to say, I am simply blown away. The matte shades in this trio are simple, beautiful and sophisticated. When I tried the shimmery colour on top, I literally gasped. It looked so bomb you guys, I can’t even contain my excitement. It is such a cute palette and so travel friendly. So easy to toss in my purse and touch up discreetly. I am absolutely in love. Good job kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous product, sure. But, Second ingredient: glass. What?! I need answers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the matte shades! They blend very nicely and are super pigmented. The shimmer is really nice too. Just not as “everyday” as the mattes are for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this! Very creamy, just a little fallout. The fact that 6 hours later it still looks like I just put it on my 54 year old eyelids is amazing!  I bought the chocolate dahlia version. You can't go wrong with this neutral set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are so pretty and easy to blend. Great for traveling.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is hands down my favorite every day go to eyeshadow trio. They’re fantastic, as far as pigment, you can build it up but you won’t get a PUNCH the first time you dip into a powder but I appreciate that since sometimes I don’t want a ton of color payoff right at the start. The chocolate dahlia is my perfect neutral browns. Not too warm not too cool. And the glitter, yes, tons of fallout and even as the day progresses you will see glitter specks on your cheeks but that doesn’t bother me at all, I actually kind of like it too. It’s not like little kid Barbie makeup, but yes the glitter is there and it’s awesome in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful and easy to work with, compact, quick. The shimmer is so pretty and unique in its finish, mattes are pigmented but very easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for everyday use and travel. It's small, compact and really nice quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Colours are much nicer in person (cooler toned than photo). Perfect for everyday looks and great for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fun colours, great size, works well for day or night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The appealing and convenient packaging is the second best reason this Kaja eyeshadow trio has quickly become one of my favorite products to use on the daily. The number one best thing about this product is  the formula of the eyeshadows. The two mattes are so easily buildable and blendable, both alone and together, and the shimmer is so creamy it can be used dry on the lid. I'm next about to purchase either Hello Azalea or Glowing Guava. I believe for now I will prefer to purchase in the matte category, because it makes it so much easier in the mornings when one may only have 10 minutes or so for makeup appropriate for the workplace.

reviews.review_title: Not what i thought it is
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend to use a sparkle primer before using this product.  I find the sparkles are too big so it needs a primer to hold it. I got this 3 sparkles color pact,  but I cant really make an eye makeup without using other eyeshadow color. A little disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect for travel. no need for brushes as finger application worked well. will be trying additional colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the shimmers in these were more smooth. These are just glitter eyeshadows that literally went all over my face at the end of the day. Actually, not even at the end of the day... more like an hour later. I have glitter glue and it didn’t help. It didn’t feel like a high end brand, kinda felt like it was a Claire’s makeup or something. Meh I don’t know, I just didn’t like these. I even returned the ones with the matte shades because of how much I didn’t like these glitter shadows. I guess I expected different, my bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is right up my ally, I love all of the shades and each of them are extremely shimmery and stunning. The packaging is super compact and adorable, I can't wait to purchase another colour story of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok... I really wanted to try this because I’ve been eyeing it for a while... I’m so glad I did. PERFECT for on the go glam. Pigment is there, buttery consistency and easy blending. LOVE it! I have attached pics with and without flash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all the eyeshadows I own, this little $20 set is the absolute best. Every single shadow is creamy and pigmented.

reviews.review_title: Do you love glitter?! If yes, BUY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE these three eyeshadows! The sparkles stay in place and last all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So blendable and easy to use, very neutral for every day. The shimmer shades from Kaja are so multi-dimensional and always look so reflective and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own the beauty bento eyeshadows in Toasted Caramel, Orange Blossom, and Chocolate Dahlia and love them all equally! Both Toasted Caramel and Chocolate Dahlia create easy work/daytime appropriate looks while Orange Blossom gives a pop of colour that is still suitable for work. Toasted Caramel and Orange Blossom are a shimmery formula so applying with the finger tips is best for avoiding heavy glitter fallout, although using natural hair brushes also reduces fall out. The matte shadows in the Chocolate Dahlia stack blend like a dream and the shimmer shade is the same quality as the other two stacks I own. These stacks are very effortless and are great for when you're in a rush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this eyeshadow trio!!! It has amazing pigment, and has all the colors needed for a quick application. It is super blendable and has the best color selection. Super affordable too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this. I didn’t expect much but I really like it. Pigmented and easily blend-able. A little fallout but nothing drastic or unfixable. I like how they come in a trio so you already have a shadow look picked out. Very good for travel. Has a little mirror too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay! Not only are these SO adorable, the product is so great! They’re easy to take with you and travel with if you are always on the go. But there is no need to re apply because it lasts all day! I absolutely love the shimmer ones, I want it in every color! I received this product complimentary for testing.

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT! Totally Understand the Allure Beauty Win!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the finger eyeshadow trio!! First, i love the convenience. No brush or brush cleaning needed. You can apply on the go. i have Laura Mercier caviar sticks, but Kaja is way easier to apply and blend. Once the caviar sticks dry, and they dry quickly, you can no longer blend (im left rubbing them off). Plus ive already broken 2 of the caviar stick lids carrying them in my purse : ( Not sure if Kaja wont break easily... Second, i love the shimmer. i dont do matte shadows, only shimmer and shines : ) Because i love the rose tones so much, i also bought orange blossom : )

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice and compact. It’s more of a glitter topper and it’s beautiful. Works best tapped on with fingers. I would like to try it in some other shades in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant at first about this because I didn't know the brand and the colors were bright. But the fallout wasnt bad and the pigment was super strong. It blended well and it's easy to carry around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore these colors!!! They were the perfect pigment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these colors are perfect for an emergency last minute eye look, love that it is so tiny because it doesn't take up much space in my bag. the mattes are very soft and pigmented and not chalky at all. the shimmery color looks great on its own for a blinding shimmer or layered on top of the mattes for something more subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very much a fan of this product. I was not expecting much, but the colors are nice and very well pigmented. I think this is great for a little pink tone. I typically stick to browns and neutrals, but with throw a bit of this in as a nice mix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite go-to eyeshadow. I love that it is so compact. It fits in my clutch so I can take it anywhere. Also, the colors are perfect! Exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love these shadows! They stay in place all day without creasing. Great color coverage as well. I received these eyeshadows complimentary for testing purposes, but I loved the shades and would definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so impressed with the smooth formula and the amazing color payoff. The packaging is a little funky, as I’m scared I might have a finger nail slip while I’m trying to open it. It worked very well with my brushes and applied beautifully over my primer. I was very satisfied and will buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this complimentary from Influenster and it is super convenient. It’s a small pallete without the bulk it’s convenient to carry around in case you need a touch up and gives you access to 3 colors in case the occasion changes it even has a glitter one. Which happens to be the one I liked the most. I’m not a fan of the matte and like a little but more glitter but I like that I can mix it up with the other two shades. Used it for a night out in the city and I loved being able to throw it in my small handbag with a small brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I thought these were some super pretty neutrals but they just didn’t show up as well as I wanted on my skin tone. I am mixed and have lighter skin so I just felt like they really blended with my skin when what I was trying to create needed something darker that I could do a smoky eye with. I really enjoyed the shimmer shade I felt like it showed up very well on my lid and could be packed on easily! I used my finger to apply to my lid and brushes to apply my crease colors! I always apply my lid color with my finger to make sure the pigment really pops! One thing I loved about these eyeshadows is that they come stacked so they don’t transfer on one another or break if you drop them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: loved the shimmer i used it with another darker palette and it was super blend my brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the tones of this eyeshadow, and I love how it’s compact and and It’s an excellent trio of shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Where have I been my entire life without this product? It’s so easy to use and very easy to carry around. This is my go to eye shadow to bring with me when I travel because it takes up so little place. I love the different shade that I got. I love the matte look and the shimmer. It’s just gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MY NEW FAVORITE EYE SHADOW!!! can also be used as a blush and highlighter so you really get your money’s worth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loved these eyeshadows they’re so easy to use and blend and also so easy to travel with!! the trio makes it easy to create a simple look but also gives the option to create your own different look. i’d definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily my favorite eyeshadow! The pigments are so bold and blend perfectly together! I’ve never been great with eye shadow application but with the Kaja Bento Bouncy Shimmer the colors are pure, bold, easy to apply and the prefect trip to make my eyes pop when adding the winged eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got Glowing Guava and Rosewater. I am OBSESSED with these. First of all, the packaging is honestly adorable and so easy to store and travel. Second, I love the colors and pigmentation. The matte colors perform really well alone or with the sparkle colors. And the sparkles are blinding - seriously. They are BRIGHT. Both matte and sparkle shades are very long lasting. I haven’t used a primer under any of them and they last all day. I will probably but these as gifts and more for myself! Perhaps my favorite eyeshadow yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shimmer shade in this product. The pigmentation is amazing and all the colors are super blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product free to try from Influenster.  At first when I saw the colors, I thought that they wouldn't work for me.  They were a little brighter and flashier than I wear.  However, they didn't come out as bright and the glitter was fun to wear to a night party.  I have come to love these!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful sparkle and great formula, but docked a star because the top two shades are honestly quite similar outside of the reflect (champagne vs pale pink). Unless you hold them to the light they're pretty indistinguishable when worn and tend to blend together, meaning you can't really create a full eye look with just these shades. When paired with other palettes though they add a ton of pop, and the price point is decent. I also own this in Sparkling Rosé and all three of those shades are pretty different, so the color similarity issue I had is probably just unique to the Rosewater colorway. If you love pinks or lighter shades though I still think this is worth a buy; the glitter is really well-formulated and high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use these as eyeshadows and blush at the same time. The texture is nice and it stays on all day. You can put a little for daytime and add some at nighttime.  It looks really nice for the fall and winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color palette but the shadows are just okay. I wish the shadows were a little bit more buttery and pigmented. I’m also not a huge fan of the packaging! I like to look at all my colors and be able to switch back and forth. Having this packaging that really only allows you to access one shadow at a time is inconvenient for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample, and I actually liked it a lot more than expected. The color payoff was absolutely there in the matte shades, I could have use a little more in the shimmers. They blended beautifully together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I received two shades in a Bento Box from an Influenster campaign along with the wink stamp. The packaging of this roll out is honestly my fave. The little compact containers are fun, and super efficient (easy to throw in your purse etc for makeup on the go). Considering that I often do my makeup on the go (in the car, or in a hotel etc) I really appreciate the size of the product and the fact that there are three colors in one. It is truly pigmented and has a smooth texture. I didn’t have an issue with is moving around at all. Pro tip: be sure to use a priming base. While these aren’t everyday colors, I do find myself using this number more than I imagined.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! I received it complimentary from Influenster and I must say this product is the real Deal! It’s perfect for traveling since it’s so compact and it has your base color as well as highlights and accent colors all for an awesome look! I really like the pigment in the shades too. Needless to say I’ll be purchasing different colors and you should too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! Great packaging and pigment and the color combination is killer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the pigment in this palette. It is subtle yet it pops. I don’t usually wear bright shadows but these are the right amount of fun while still maintaining my natural loom

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these eyeshadow trios!!! The colors are beautiful and so well put together that it makes it so easy to come up with an eyeshadow look! I love this particular set for an everyday makeup look and you can use it with another one of the trios to create an even more dramatic look!  I used this particular color trio with “Hella Azalea” for a fun colorful look!  Great eyeshadows! <3

reviews.review_title: Pretty and easy to work with!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love these trios!! Out of the 2 I’ve tried they blend really nicely and have good colour payoff that’s easy to build up. The shimmers are really pretty too and the shades are all cohesive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging for this eyeshadow, the convenience of having three beautiful shades to create a gorgeous look is awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! Shine so much! The color 1 is like a silver, not pink.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great colors, good payoff and it blends well! I use it quite often, as like a romantic, sparkly pink, smokey liner look. There is a little bit of fallout, depending on how you apply it, and it’s kind of a pain to take this COMPLETELY off. You’ll notice a stray sparkle or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, it’s very easy to carry with you, very easy to apply, no fallout, very pigmented and the shimmer omg the prettiest shimmer I’ve ever used I swear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are soooo cute! Super compact but enough to make a full look. Extremely pigmented and no fall out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a suuuuuuper convenient packaging. It is so easy to carry and great for something quick on the go! The shadows a very nice and have a creamy texture. I would recommend using this with a primer on the lid. I tried it without and still achieved a nice look, but I work with kids and it did not last the whole day. I don't think you can really complain about a product like this. I think it's great I would definitely recommend and think it's great for those trying makeup or who don't wear much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on these are pretty cool. I love that they are colors that create a look but are also compact. I think this set is great for a quick throw on of a color where you can just use finger application. Great fun little set! I feel like the shades are buildable and workable for any intensity you are after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this eyeshadow. Really stand out especially the middle coral color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First impression I loved the packaging. Small and company makes it easy to travel. The colors are strong and very pigmented. Not a fan of the glittery color it’s not very dense but overall the shadows apply well with a brush and provide beautiful, bold colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja Beauty nailed it with their Bento Bouncy Shadow Trios! I have been looking for a high-quality, long-lasting shimmer shadow with decent pigment and minimal fallout. This product meets all those requirements and for a reasonable price. I love the variety of looks you can create using just one trio! The shade Rosewater is 3 gorgeous shades of pinks and purple, each shade beautiful worn alone or mixed together. The stacked trio is so cute and convenient! I love to mix two shades together and layer for intensity. Over primer, these shadows literally look as amazing at the end of my day as when first applied. I love that the shadow is so quick and easy to apply using your finger and does not even require a brush! This product is perfect whether you are a beginner or a professional!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eyeshadow was patchy, It had glitter fallout. Sadly I had to return two of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this trio! It shows up great in my skin, looks very natural and not too much. Great to spice up an everyday look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked these shades when I applied them with my finger, but the pigments were very faint when I applied with a brush. I appreciate the design of the bento, combining 3 shades in a nice cylinder, with fun and pretty packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my beauty bento eyeshadows! They are compact and easy to blend. I am able to use my finger to blend easily. They have a perfect combination of matte and shimmer colors which creates a perfect look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how glittery and pigmented this trio is. Personally, I love sparkle so this is perfect for people looking for a bit of flair.

reviews.review_title: great packaging and even better payoff
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Beauty Bento Eyeshadow Trios are amazing. The color payoff is impressive and super easy to use for traveling. I’ve tried two so far and both have met my expectations. The colors blend so nicely and the shimmers are beautiful to complement any eye color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite on-the-go eyeshadow set! It’s perfect. Pigmentation is great. I love both of the matte cocoa tones, plus the shimmery one which is so flattering! I sometimes use it as a highlighter too. Love that it’s compact size and just the perfect tones to use day and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow trio is gorgeous! The colors are very pigmented and you don’t need to try very hard to get them to show up. The pan sizes are nice and large and the packaging is so cute and compact! I usually have to add in other colors when using this to complete my eye look which is the only reason if got 4 stars instead of 5. Overall this is a nice product and I recommend it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are great if you travel a lot for work. It’s compact and has great neutral colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn’t thrilled with the pink shadow options, but the neutral and shimmer are great as a base or top layer for a holiday or night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far, I have only used two of the three colors, but the pigmentation is good enough and the colors are beautiful. Nothing really distinguishes this as perfectly amazing, but also nothing particularly wrong. I’d consider these eyeshadows quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive these to try out!! I love the colors. So far with a good primer they’ve stated on all night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The mauvy pink tones in this are perfect for a fun but neutral look. My favorite shade in this trio is the shimmer ! It shows up best for me when applied with my finger. The matte shades are gorgeous as well; they are both pigmented and blendable. The packaging is adorable and I will definitely consider getting more of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I. Love. This! It’s so user friendly and so freaking cute. Whether you want to take the time to do a real makeup look or just pat on with your fingers. It’s amazing. Can’t wait to see what else this brand comes out with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooovee the concept of having shades like these in a little trio. It’s super easy to carry around and the shades are beautiful. The reason I’m giving 4 stars however is the lighter colors aren’t as pigmented/don’t show up almost at all! However I still do recommend this for beginners or those looking for something portable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade trios, very pigmented and easy to apply. I also love how compact they are so you can throw them in your bag and take them with you anywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of these eyeshadows, they are perfect! They are more neutral, they apply so smooth and they are more pigmented then I thought they were going to be!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of these eyeshadows! They apply so smoothly and are very pigmented especially the glitter one. The packaging is cute and the colors. I would recommend if you like bright colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these shadows. They're a nice start for a fun, pink smokey eye. I had to add a brow tone and black for a more polished look. The formula on these shadows is very nice, and apply and build well. I left off a star because while the packaging is compact, it's kind of a pain when flipping between colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this in the store and when I first put it on, but after wearing it at night ended up having a looooooot of fall out. Also felt like I had to put a lot on to get it to have color. It reminds me a little of Glossier's eyeliner.  I tried it with primer and without and it was a little better with primer, but I ultimately returned it. I think you're mostly paying for the fun packaging.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar

reviews.review_text: Bought this to use for contouring, the top shade is a little too dark to use as a highlight for my skin tone, but the middle shade is perfect for contouring! All are super blend-able and hyper pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love these colors! Super pigmented and easy to apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are very pretty! I love the color selection in the orange blossom trio. They have a great shine without looking too much. However, only con for me is that I feel like they need glitter glue to prevent fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome for traveling. Perfect shades to create many looks. Pigmented. blends easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It feels like butter when I put it on my eyes with my fingertips, it blends so easily and the colors are a perfect combo and I don’t have to guess. I absolutely would buy this and try other colors because it is so convenient and the color is long lasting and the application is so easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazingg!! They are a bit powdery with some fallout but nothing to crazy. The only problem I had was that they were a tiny bit patchy in my outer corners where they wouldn’t stick but it just takes some practice working with. But they are so cute and definitely very compact and easy to travel with.

reviews.review_title: No mess, great color, easy application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very good color, doesn't take much product to obtain effect.  This is very good quality and does not have fall off like ABH and other popular brands.  Very neat with easy, smooth application.  Just keep in mind that there is a lot of glitter in the shimmery version and it is very noticeable to others.  Also, at least in the Orange Blossom trio,  the three colors are similar so it almost looks like the application is of one color only.  I actually like this as I don't go for the very dark outer lid and excessive blending.  Would buy all the colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these! The packaging is absolutely adorable! The pigment is buildable. I love how they give you three colors that go together perfectly. You have endless possibilities for different eye looks with these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous colors and goes on  easily. A little goes a long way and the colors are bright and show up very easily. Probably the best eyeshadow I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a product by this brand. I received it for free from Influenster. When it comes to makeup, I prefer warm tones such as browns and muavy colors. This eyeshadow trio is beautiful! The colors are very pigmented so a little goes a long way. They last all day—I’ve worn mine for up to 12 hours. I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: This one made the list for my 'go everywhere bag'!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 5 stars!!! 5 stars!! 5 stars!!! I LOVE THIS THING! I received this product as a sample for my honest review, and I couldn't be happier. This one has made it into my purse make up bag- so it's now one of my 'go-to's that I carry with me everywhere in my purse. The pigments are full, and layerable, especially in the mattes. The glitter goes on well and STAYS. Small, compact, intelligent design with quality product inside. Beautiful shades. So in love. Thanks Kaja!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product and it pigmented and has easy application. It's also not to overpowering over other eyeshadows leaving a glossy type look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors and their vibrant tones. Applies very smoothly and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the clean ingredients and neutral shades that aren't boring. Looks baller with the Kaja eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect travel eye shadow! I love these little compacts. Great color payoff and the shadows blend like butter. The glitter shadow on top is the best glitter topper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the compact packaging, and the colors are beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are SO pigmented. I use them all the time now!! They blend so well together too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free via Influencer to review. I loved this eyeshadow. Super shimmery and hardly any fall out! It applies super smooth and easy and you can tell it's professional quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Even though I’m not a usual wearer of bold colored eyeshadow I really liked this one because it is super blendable. By using a light touch I was able to get a sort of sheer coverage that was exactly what I was looking for. Stayed on really well too which is very impressive for me because I have super oily skin including my eyelids. I got this product as a free sample for testing and I’m really glad I got to test it. Would definitely purchase this brand of eyeshadow again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment and easy to blend. Perfect for travel and I use this for my everyday makeup. I received this as a complimentary gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these shades! They are bright, some are shimmery and some matte so you can choose what you’re in the mood for. The only reason I have this 4 stars instead of 5 is because I don’t love the packaging. It’s a pain to open all of the kids individually and the size isn’t compatible with my makeup organizer. I would like the product more if it was in a pallet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the cutest little stacking eyeshadows you’ll ever see. The colors correspond so well together and I love how easy it is to carry with you. This is the perfect product for a traveler. The eyeshadows were pretty easy to blend together, and the color lasted all day for 11  hours. (I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these but the colors just didn’t work that well with my skin tone. That said, the pigment is great and the formula thick. I have oily lids, so of course I have to use with primer - making it even more pigmented. If I had a different trio, I’m sure I’d love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are so cool! Great for travel when you don’t want to bring a whole pallet. Enough shadows to create a full look. Cute packaging and good pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! I initially was in awe of the packaging. So fun and convenient! The colors especially the glitter/shimmer ones are amazing! The pigment is really there. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bento Eyeshadow is the cutest and most convenient product that I own. So far I only have two but I can’t wait to get more. The convenience and versatility is unmatched and the color payoff is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YES YES YES!!! Portable and adorable! Such a fan of these creamy shadows. Not only are you getting a lot of product in each pan, but they are so easily stored and the best travel companion. I do wish that there was more of a darkness differential between the two mattes; however, these shadows are so creamy and buildable that you can usually get the darkest matte to get dark enough for the crease or lash line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It’s perfect for blending to create a smoky eye

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: These are beautiful colors and very buildable shades but you definitely need to use an eyeshadow primer for them to stay all day. I always do anyways but for someone who doesn’t just know it won’t last as long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Love this so much! Very gorgeous bright beautiful colors! Looks very nice and the packaging and design looked very appealing as well very cute and pretty! The colors are very pigmented as well and I put them on with my fingers and it looked great as is! Love them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such cute packaging! Colors are so pretty and buttery feeling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical about this because I got the purple stack which seems a little bold for me but after using it a few times it has quickly become one of my favorites. I use the dark purple just about every day at this point. It does tend to wear off a little but overall the quality is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything you need all in one for the perfect fall look! The colors are super pigmented and the shimmer ones are so pretty! It’s in such a compact packaging, it really comes in handy to travel with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster for free for my unbiased reviews. I love these!! Kaja doesn’t disappoint for me. They apply easily and the color is gorgeous. I didn’t get the colors I usually would buy, and I definitely plan on purchasing more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely the 3 different but matching colors! I could wear each individually or mix two or three together. The colors were bright and long lasting. The packaging is super cute and convient. I don't have to pack multiple eye shadow pallets. One gives me enough colors and variety for a whole trip! I keep my style fairly plain and simple, bit with the bento shadows, I could spice up my look very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I love the stacked packaging and found that each compartment opens very easily- which is nice. The shadows themselves are great too. I found the matte shades to be easily blendable. (I used a primer and neutral/nude colored shadow all over my lid before applying.) The pigmentation of the matte shades is good, but not the best. I had to layer the middle shade in the Hella Azalea trio three times to achieve the true color. The glitter shade is a beautiful, blinding glitter that applies well when packed on the lid with a stiff brush (needs a primer under it for sure) but has a decent amount of fall out. Overall, I would purchase again (or in more combinations) because I love how ease they are to travel with! I recieved this product for free in exchange for a review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these shadows have become my go-to for pageants! the shades are so gorgeous and easy to apply when i need to change my look or refresh my makeup. the shadows are so pigmented and the fall out is minimal. i love how natural the shades are, and the more colorful ones are so fun!

reviews.review_title: LOVE- this is what I call a
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a few shades of pink for quite some time. I don't like to buy full palettes because I always end up only using a few colors and they always expire before I've even hit the pan... wastingso much money & productjust doesn'tseem sensible. This little trio is a MUST HAVE. They are very shimmery and the color payoff is great while still looking very natural. If you're looking for a full coverage eyeshadow- this may not be for you. So far I have applied them with a brush (wet and dry) as well as my finger and both work great. I used the urban decay eyeshadow primer (as I always do) and it stayed without creasing... even on my oily eyelids. Not much fallout either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this the shadows glide on so easily and are blendable and not complicated I recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! I received this from Influenster & was so happy I got the chance to try it. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! The shades have a lot of color pay off and work well together to create a Smokey eye! This tiny pallet is also perfect for travel when you don’t want to bring your full sized pallet along!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

It's not a highlighter which is awesome especially for that fancy pop of sparkle. I like the neat packaging. A little difficult to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture on them super easy to use and great colors! Never would I have tried this but love the result of them! Thanks to #influenster #complimentary #kajawinkstamp

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of this product. The packaging is convenient, the three shades complement each other so well, and it makes for the perfect bold yet subtle makeup look. This product has started to transition into my almost-daily eyeshadow look. The pigments are high quality and application is easy. Couldn’t be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for many reasons, one of them being the small packages. I’ve always been a fan of small eyeshadow palettes because it makes makeup looks so easy. You have the lid color, crease, and highlight all in one! The colors in this specific palette are very pigmented which make for a bold look. We love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one took me by surprise, I received this product free from influenster and Kaja! I am a neutral tone eyeshadow girl and this one would never be a trio of colors I would choose.... and let me tell ya.... I was mind blown! I absolutely LOVE how this looks on my eyes. I was very wrong. I’m officially obsessed and will be restocking this in my makeup collection as long as it’s around! Girls, don’t be afraid to try new things!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My sample also came with these mini trio eyeshadows. I loved the colors and it’s perfect for trips to throw these little guys in your make up bag and you have three colors right there ready to go. I had never used anything from this brand before and wasn’t sure what to expect, however my eyeshadow stayed all day and the colors were so vibrant. Defiantly recommend! Click on the picture on the right to get to the link to purchase. Happy winking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are pretty and have a nice pigment. I layered all three together which made for a beautiful natural eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are absolutely amazing! It makes it so easy for those quick makeup applications or just to add some spice! They don't drag on the lid when applying and stay put for quite a few hours! No fallout and great pigmentation!! I would definitely recommend them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

And the convenience, especially for travel, of having an entire look in one little package is great.

reviews.review_title: I am not really good at doing eyeshadow...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not very good at doing eyeshadow, so I am in love with this Bento Box that has a pink, purple, and a reddish eyeshadow that I could just swipe my finger over, and dab onto my eyes-So easy! And so stinking cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a very nice product very good for on the go, it’s pocket sized and even has a little mirror on it! The first two colors are neutral and the second two have a pop to them. I usually carry them in my purse Incase or just to refresh my makeup.

I would recommend this trip set to anyone that travels a lot. It's the perfect size to pack in your makeup bag. The three colors allowed me to create different makeup looks, one shadow for simple looks or all three of you're feeling fancy. The pigmentation is amazing and I didn't experience any fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mauvy pink eyeshadow. It’s quite pigmented in my opinion. Been using it more often then I would lol not a big fan of the shimmery color. I wish it was more of shimmer when I apply it on my eyelids. I feel like it blends in with the darker color. Overall, I still like this eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved these trios! I received two and both were amazing. The colors are very pigmented and blended beautifully with little to no fall out at all. The shimmer was gorgeous and could be used as a highlighter too. I am very impressed with the brand and their products. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the packaging and pigmentation! It’s travel friendly, because you could create a full look with just one of these. There’s not very much fall out and the colors are buildable. I immediately fell in love with the  sparkling frose color when I swatched it! The color pay off is impressive as well as the packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment I love the colors they stand out so well! Great set of three of your a beginner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite eyeshadows. These shadows are very pigmented and gorgeous. Surprisingly the glitter stuck to the eyelid nicely without fallout which makes me very happy. Quality is amazing. This is by far my favorite trio and definitely makes it easy to travel with. I love using the top shade on the lid, glitter on the inner corner, and the last shade on the crease creates a perfect look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product. I absolutely love how it’s sooooooo compact and how it has 3 different shades. The best thing is that there are so many different colors and how they colors are fabulous. You can make a complete look using just the set and it’s great for people who love neutral colors with some shimmer. I would recommend this product to almost everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging! It's small and compact. The colors go well together and it's a quick look to pick up and put on. The shadows are really nice. I can use a brush or i can just use my fingers for an effortless look. The only bad thing is ive had issues with the sparkly shade having some fall out but it is less noticeable if i use an eyeshadow primer.

reviews.review_text: I love this set! The eyeshadow has great pigmentation. Influenster sent me this set free for testing purposes, so I had to try it out. And I'm so glad I did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two shadow combos, a brush to outline the completion of the eyelid stroke in the 'kitten' finish and another brush to outline that can be used on both the eyelid and eyebrow. All products are amazing and of high quality. The brushes caught my attention for their differential. They are like brushes used at school or for writing on posters, but with specific material for makeup. This makes the product innovative! The practicality is unbelievable. When you are using the brush the stroke does not run down your eyelid. Drying is also fast. You save time on the “kitty” finishing brush because with the shape of the design you just need to pass without worrying about finishing the drawing. The shadows! Wow!! very pigmented. The combination of sensational colors. Who has sensitive skin can use these shadows with ease. They are of great quality and respect for our skin without losing color. These products have a long shelf life as they are very pigmented and you do not need to use large quantities. I am very happy to have the opportunity to test products that are so efficient and thought to save us time on makeup.   #contest #complimentary #KajaWinkStamp @Influenster @kajabeauty

I also just love the packaging because it makes it easy for on the go when you have to do your makeup outside the house.

reviews.review_title: Great for Beginners or Beauty Lovers

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum

My only issue is the shimmer shadow in this set didn’t have the best color pay off. It’s a super pretty color but I felt when I applied it it just looked like a glitter verses being able to tell what the shadow was supposed to look like, this did make a pretty eye look though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It makes it so easy to put together a cute eye look. I also love how I can simply put it in my bag for and use the mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy pigment, Batman! I was absolutely blown away by the formula of these shadows! The color payout is amazing, they blend like a dream, and I got great results applying it with both a brush and my fingers. The shimmer is stunning, and the matte colors are super pigmented and coordinate perfectly. I was able to create a dramatic look with just these three colors, but they would make a great addition to one of their more neutral bento shadows as well. The packaging is really cute and unique, and I love the stacked compartments and matte finish. I could see myself popping these in my purse or a travel bag to amp up my look on the go. I’m definitely going to buy more of the shades of these bentos, I am in love!!

reviews.review_title: Love this trio! The colors are amazing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed with these colors! They're just as vibrant, pigmented, smooth and blendable as the Glowing Guava trio I got, which is more of a neutral everyday trio. Purple is a hard color to get right and Kaja totally nailed it! It's pigmented and blends beautifully! Not patchy at all! I received this free from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are so amazing and so great for travel or just on the go! The colors are so cute and cohesive, they're vibrant, pigmented, and easy to blend! The glitter shade is so stunning! I received this free from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Great daily eyeshadow. The packaging cute! It saves a lot of time from choosing colors every morning. The color is soft and elegant. Would be a great fall eyeshadow color!

reviews.review_text: I’ve been wanting to try out this product for so long and I’m so glad that I finally have! This eye shadow trio has become my go-to look for the fall and has the perfect shades for that dusty rose kind of look. It’s so easy to carry around, can essentially fit in any bag, and even has a small mirror in the first section. Such a cute and practical product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this idea so much; the packaging is compact, cute and functional, the the color stories are very pretty. That being said, I had a little bit of issue with the colors not staying in place at times. This is a product I feel needs an eye primer, preferably something a little tackier for the shimmer shades. However, the shadows blend nicely upon application. My biggest complaint is that both colors I received don’t have a good transition shade, and it’s hard to do a full eye look with just the three colors in any given stack. If you’re looking for something fun to add to your collection or maybe a few extra colors to toss in your travel bag, these are great! If you’re going for a full eye look with one stack, you may struggle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessedddddd with these, i have 2 of the glowing guava ones and poppy champagne i love them, great pigmentations and cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The answer is no. I giving it 3 stars because this pigmentation and blendability with the mattes is insane! It’s actually fabulous and so easy to use, you have a whole look with the 3 colors you get easily, but honestly, those shimmers need a ton of work. They are dry and powdery, they don’t even build up, they are lack luster and the shimmer is not strong at all. I wasn’t impressed with this shimmer formula at all. Now these are easy to pick up and travel with and you can get 3 shadows in a container the size of a lip balm pot, it’s easy and quick, the tiny mirror is useless, it’s the size of a quarter, that really is unnecessary, maybe that would have brought the price down. But it’s cute and functional, I would just want more interesting color combos and a better shimmer formula. The matte formula is perfection though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

The colors are really nicely pigmented and go so great together. I’ve been using this product every day since I got it, so I can’t recommend it highly enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received the Kaja beauty bento eyeshadows as a tester and I can’t even lie I’m not mad at them. This bento has the perfect mauve shades. They’re so cute and perfect for everyday wearing. I love earth and subtle mauve tones so these were seriously perfect for me. However they aren’t very pigmented and I did have to use a lot of the lighter colors and the shimmer but otherwise they are good quality. It’s a cute and unique packing idea with all the shades rather than a regular small palette however if you wanted to know the names of the colors this packaging can’t provide you with them except for the guava color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great colors, go on perfectly, perfect little bento, doesn’t take up much room and colors go great together. #Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had Hella Azalea & Glowing Guava. The packaging on these is obviously adorable & it doesn't feel cheap. I love the little mirror. I did a halo eye with both sets which is my go-to. I found all the mattes easy to work with & pigmented besides the purple in Hella Azalea. Purples are a difficult shade to make so it didn't surprise me that it took some work to build up, but eventually I got it to a place I liked. i applied the mattes with brushes. The shimmers are really pretty, but they do take some building up & don't pack quite as much of a punch as I wish they did. They're still pretty & give a nice glittery effect. I applied them alone & over a layer of concealer but I like it both ways. I preffered them with a finger or a wet brush. All in all super cute I imagine great for traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented, which is probably the goal with these colors. The glitter didn’t go on as well as i hoped but still looked good after a few applications. The shadows stay on very well and the colors are beautiful. If you’re brave enough to rock bright pink and purple shadow, this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BIG FAN OF THIS! The colors are gorgeous and blend so easily in my opinion. It’s so easy to travel with, I also use it as a highlighter and light blush on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

The shades were somewhat patchy and not very pigmented. The shimmer was the best shade in this, and while that's great, it's disappointing that the other two shades just don't hold up like some of the other color options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are so pigmented and pretty ! They are awesome ! I need this I swear I will be buying more

reviews.review_text: Love how you can have 3 different eye shadows in one small compact. Love that it has shimmers and Mattes! Would recommend all these small compacts to anybody!
