reviews.review_text: As soon as I open my package and I saw how cute the product was and how original and creative it looked I got so excited. I have definitely not seen a product that looks like this and not only that but the pigmentation of the shades are just phenomenal. They glide smoothly onto the lid and blend perfectly with all the other shades in the trio. It’s definitely something I would recommend to my friends and for people who want to experiment with something different. There’s definitely quality and creativeness that went into the product and I really appreciate that as a consumer. Also the shades in each trio are just combined perfectly for such a beautiful look. I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looveee this product!! It's so easy to store and great for traveling. All the colors mix well for a whole look or can be used seperately. I was really happy with the quality, so much pigment! The colors are perfect for the fall season!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of these! I never want to take a full pallet with me while traveling, so this is perfect. Won’t break, and colors are curated so perfectly. The color payoff is better of the sparkly ones, one of the darker colors needs a few more strokes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received 2 colors. The pigment is great honestly and holds very well but there is some fallout throughout the day. Also love the trio packaging - it’s great for travel

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free to try from influenster and I love it! It's super convenient to have a whole eye look in one container. It applied very smoothly and lasted most of my night out. The color was decent though I feel it could have had a deeper pigment it wasn't bad enough for me not to use it again which I will use it plenty! I would definitely recommend it for a travel set of shadows!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product packaging is so cute and convenient!  I’m always a fan of products that are small and easy to throw in my bag.  I’m not a huge fan of the color selection, so I honestly wouldn’t purchase these, but if they had more nude type sets I may find myself purchasing them!  I like the “glowing guava” set better than the “hello azalea” set, but that’s just personal preference.  I will say, the colors are very bright but not super pigmented, so it takes a little work to make sure they don’t look “faded.”  Also, their staying power isn’t incredible so you need a really good primer!  This is a product that I feel like is “on the right track.”  Better color selection and pigmentation and I think this product would be perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hella Azalea is a gorgeous little set with a nice set of two mattes and a pretty shimmer shade: there’s a magenta-toned purple matte, a bright pink matte, and a light pink shimmer. (Similar tones to what you might fine in the Colourpop Ooh La La palette, to be honest.) I like the fun/kitschy appeal of the branding and packaging (as a bento) in theory, but I don't love it in practice, as I find it a bit of an extra hassle with which to finagle. (I ended up depotting mine, which was pretty easy, as there's a small hole at the bottom of each pan.) The formula is pretty nice, blendable, and easy to use. But honestly? At a $21 price point for only 3 shadows? I don’t think the value for money is really there, especially you are paying more for the concept and packaging.  If you have a budget and are drawn in by the packaging, I would give this product a go, since it’s a bit of a novelty and has a good formula that performs well; but otherwise, I wouldn’t go rushing out to add this to your makeup stash if you are trying to be more judicious about your spending/adding new things to your current line-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glowing Guava is a gorgeous little set with a nice set of two mattes and a pretty shimmer shade, all in shades of mauvy, dusty pink. I like the fun/kitschy appeal of the branding and packaging (as a bento) in theory, but I don't love it in practice, as I find it a bit of an extra hassle with which to finagle. (I ended up depotting mine, which was pretty easy, as there's a small hole at the bottom of each pan.) The formula is pretty nice, blendable, and easy to use. But honestly? At a $21 price point for only 3 shadows? I don’t think the value for money is really there, especially you are paying more for the concept and packaging.  If you have a budget and are drawn in by the packaging, I would give this product a go, since it’s a bit of a novelty and has a good formula that performs well; but otherwise, I wouldn’t go rushing out to add this to your makeup stash if you are trying to be more judicious about your spending/adding new things to your current line-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product but it didn’t live up to my expectations. I was expecting more color pay off from the shimmer(sparkling frosé 02) and I didn’t like the the darkest shadow(velvety mauve 03) was basically the same shade as the shimmer so I had to darken my outer corner with another color from a different palette. I love the compact design and it would be great for traveling. I just wish the colors were better thought out.

Yet still enough of each shade, so you have a good bit to last. The colors come on exactly as shown and stay on all day. Love the glitter!

Overall, the texture is good and the I created turned out cute so I will probably use it again but I would not pay full price for it.

I could have used all of the guava trio by itself and been happy but I used all 6 shades together from the 2 trios that I have, and came up with an amazing look! Honestly I dont know why these aren't talked about more.  Now that I know how much I love them, I will start getting more colors that I enjoy.

PRO TIP: experiment with the colors before deciding what you do because there are so many ways to just make these colors pop and look amazing on your eyes

reviews.review_text: The packaging for this item is CUTE! It’s a great travel size and u can make an entire look with just the 3 shadows. I had to dip in a few times to get the color payoff. No fallout at all which is nice. They blend really smoothly as well. The shimmers definitely look better and more blinding when u use a damp brush (as do most shimmer shades). I also got the “Hella Azalea” trio and those colors are bright and beautiful as well. The pink shimmer in that one is gorgeous. I think the price is a little much only due to the fact that they aren’t super pigmented, but thankfully I got both of mine as complimentary testers from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received 2 of these in glowing guava and hella azalea complimentary of influenster for review. Today I tried out the hella azalea trio . I used the purple in my crease, blended it out with the pinky shade, and the shimmer on the lid. I think this is an interesting and innovative product, I like how there are 2 mattes and a shimmer, easy and quick for everyday wear. Throw a color on the crease, deepen it up, and put the shimmer on the lid. The mattes are pigmented but not one swipe pigmented. I did have to build the purple a couple times which is typical of purples for me. The shimmer on the other hand is beautiful. So creamy, so reflective, simply goregous. I would recommend these probably for those who don’t do elaborate eye looks and want just a few shades for a quick eye look. There are trios with neutral everyday shades which would be good for more wearable looks. I love pink and purple so I liked the hella azalea trio but I know it’s not for everyone. Overall I really like the product and can’t wait to play with it more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packing is too cute! I absolutely love that they are stackable, making it so much easier to keep things organized.  These are colors that require a little bit of layering to get that really deep shade you might be looking for, but not to the point that it feels caked on. It’s super light and smooth! I tested my shadows out by doing my makeup at 3:30 pm before I went to a rodeo. Picture sweat, dust, dirt, excessive heat, bulls, horses, screaming kids, THE WORKS! I went to take my “after” picture at 3:30 am (12 hours after applying with no eye primer) and it still looked EXACTLY the same. There was no fall out, no smearing, no wearing away of the colors or shimmer. It still looked like I had just put it on. I am super impressed!

reviews.review_text: I have trouble finding eyeshadows that will last all day with my oily lids, but this holds up! Good pigmentation. Easy to throw in a makeup bag or purse. Very compact. Shimmer and mattes all in one case too! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is PERFECT for travel, it's so compact easy to use and create a perfect cohesive look with minimal effort. the shadows a pigmented, easy to blend and beautiful shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! How awesome is this concept? It reminds me of the old school makeup caboodles that all the 90’s kids had but for eye shadow! I received these products for free from influenster and I couldn’t be any happier to review as I’ve been an avid Kaja supporter/fan. #contest #complimentary @Influenster @kajabeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love make up especially foundation, contour, and actual face products. I am VERY bad at doing eye makeup though. I can contour and bake my face all day long, but I can’t apply eyeshadow for crap. So when I opened the box and saw this product, at first I was like oh great...I’m not gonna be able to play with this like it’s meant to. But I was actually wrong, these colors blend together really easily and are also really pigmented. The Glowing Guava set is so much better than the other one I received, Hella Azalea. The colors in Glowing Guava have more pigment to them and blend together much better. They can be used for a day and night look and are very compact. Definitely would recommend for somebody that is traveling or somebody looking to get a full eyeshadow look quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll be completely honest, I’m usually a little critical of makeup. These are adorable. They’re labeled as being made for finger application, so to test that I only used my fingers. They blend like a dream. They’re pigmented and well paired. I’m glad I got to sample these because I had never heard or seen of these before and I can almost guarantee, I’ll be buying more of these once I’m out. They’re the perfect little size to throw down in your purse or leave in the car for when you’re in a rush, which I really appreciate while being in school. Hella Azalea pairs beautifully with a pink lipgloss, Glowing Guava looks beautiful with a nude lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadows are so smooth and creamy! I love this trio and all the colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of my long lost love a limited edition palette Dior released last year. Needless to say, this is my new fave. The box states to apply with fingers, but I used brushes as I wanted a nice blend. I am super satisfied. At $21, this is a steal. Little to no fallout. Gorgeous pigment. And the bento style makes it a travelers DREAM. I will be purchasing more.   This product was provided complimentary by Kaja Beauty and Influenster for an HONEST review. Hi

I also love the concept of having them stacked and connected.. that will save so much room in my make up bag versus trying to shove a huge pallet into it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just purchased my third color of these Bento Bouncy eyeshadow trios. I am really surprised by how well these performed.   They are easy to apply with your finger. I found them much easier than Laura Mercier Caviar pencil or the Bobbi Brown cream stick eyeshadow.   The colors are pretty pigmented and the formula doesn’t crease.  The Kaja bentos are also really long lasting. For the glittery shades, you will have some fall out by the end of the day. But that’s okay by me, and it’s sort of cute to have glitter on top of your cheekbones.   Plus they’re tiny, cute, and only $21 a pop. Low risk to just try them!

The packaging is very innovative and the shadow lasts all day flawlessly on my eyes. I always get compliments when I use these ones. They’re just adorable and the colour selection is beautiful!

reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this trio! If I'm ever travelling for a short trip I just bring this and it's all I need. These shades work well for light-medium skintones but I don't think the mattes would be good for deeper complexions. The shimmer shade can give a lot of fallout so I make sure to use a sticky base and to do my undereye concealer after I do my eyes. All in all a great product :)

These do look beautiful over other shadows or if you WANT a translucent glitter topper, but I was disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow itself was really pretty, but the container it comes in is fragile and I had to return it before I was able to properly use it. The one I received in the mail had a loose snaping connection and if I put it in my bag the bottom pan would open easily :(

reviews.review_title: Love this - and I don't generally like 'sparkle'
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must say, I'm not really much of a glitter/shimmery fan, besides my MAC paint pot in Indianwood. But... oh my, I ADORE this product! I purchased Orange Blossom based on Samantha Ravndahl's review awhile back and I'm not disappointed at all. I had no issues with fall out but did use it on top of my paint pot, and I patted/tapped it on, I did not swipe. Honestly, any more shimmery/glittery product is likely to fall if you swipe it on, so just be gentle and pat it on like you're an Instagram model and you'll be good to go! lol. I might have to pick up another one, I'm loving it so much. I'm curious to see how their matte shades will work out, but the all shimmer ones are a perfect addition to those with more matte collections. Or if you're travelling just put some bronzer in your crease (and over your lid if you're feeling wild) and tap this on, so easy and so beautiful!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the shadows are very compact and travel friendly. It also comes with a little mirror! The only downside of the mirror is that it’s foggy. The eyeshadows look great together and individually on the eyes. I personally like to apply a light wash of the brown shade all over the lid for an everyday look. They can be easily build able as well for a bolder look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little trio! I like to wear this as a one and done product, and it looks so summery and so pretty! I always get so many compliments when i wear this. I need more dudes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought these in 2 color trios and I hope to stock up on all of them over time! There is a bit of fallout but nothing too hard to fix. The glitter effect is amazing, especially without needing a glitter glue. I get the best results using my finger to apply. Whenever I wear these everyone always asks what I used! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite Kaja trio. I love the matte colors very neutral, creamy and pigmented. Great on the go shadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was very shimmery.. not my style but I'm giving it a 3 star because of the pigmentation & texture.

reviews.review_title: Chocolate Dahlia is something everyone should own
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When these first came out, I was such a hater. I was unimpressed by the packaging, but now I’ve tried them and have changed my tune! All I had to do was swatch one in store and I was in love. I now own 3 and plan to own almost all of them eventually. The new matte and shimmer trios are such a phenomenal idea. These are great for beginners and novices. The quality is amazing. Great for travel, every day, or a special occasion. I can’t say enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With small and puffy monolid eyes, I was waiting for Kaja to make a matte bento trio as there’s no way I can finish 3 glitter shadows. And Poppy Champagne didn’t disappoint at all! The two orange and coral matte shades are amazing on my lids, and I can dot the pale yellow glitter shade along my lower lash line and the middle of my upper lid. All done with my fingers! The only down side is that it seems to crease a bit after a few hours, but it can be smoothed out with a finger swipe and I do have oilier lids plus wasn’t wearing primer. None the less big thumbs up for the 2 matte and 1 glitter trio!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a huge fan of eyeshadow palettes and often don't have time to put together well-thought out eyeshadow looks, so when they included mattes in these eyeshadow trios I absolutely had to try them out. How I like to apply this is putting the top shade all over the lid with a fluffy eyeshadow brush, darkening the outer corner with the bottom shade, and using my finger to apply the middle shade across the lid to add dimension. I can achieve a gorgeous, put-together eye look without even having to think about it, which I love. I'd say these shadows blend fairly easily (not effortlessly), the matte shades aren't creamy enough to apply with a finger but as someone with extremely oily eyelids I often prefer a slightly drier shadow formula. Out of all my eyeshadows, this formula definitely creased the least on me, and lasted without fading and with minimal creasing for about 12 hours. The shades are really pretty, but a little more brownish mauve than pink in my opinion. I wish these shadows were a bit lighter and brighter for summer looks, but they are really gorgeous, I just prefer a more illuminated, colorful eye look. Overall, great product, and I would definitely try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have an eye color that its super hard to find eyeshadows for, green eyes with some orange tint as well. No eye shadow ever works for me, as most make me seen super pale and lifeless. However, this is by far the best eyeshadow set I have ever tried ever ever ever the shimmers are gorgeous. I wear this for nights out when I want that extra pop and these are so compact and easy to apply. The colors in the rosewater set are beautiful. PLEASE BUY THIS

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Chocolate Dahlia - crushed pearl (shimmer), cool khaki, brown sugar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, the glitter applies well. The two matte shades are nice. All three compliment well to create one look. Stays on all day...used with a primer and setting spray, so can’t speak is that had anything to do with the wearability...

reviews.review_title: Glossy Lid Effect Using Powder Shadows
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this little stack! The colors enhance my brown eyes and unique formula creates an almost wet looking glossy lid without messy cream shadows. I often just use the middle shade as a wash and get so many compliments.  Definitely grown up glittery powder shadows.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these shadows because they are so beautiful, but they ended being to glittery without enough pigment payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really curious about this product after seeing it online from someone I follow. I had to try it myself and I am so glad that I did. The product has to be built up a bit, but it blends really nicely.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pigmented and great for everyday. This is a great neutral combo and I use it everyday. I love how it doesn’t take up a lot of space in my daily makeup bag. I’m going to buy another color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect trio for travel or quick everyday looks. You get everything you really need (transition, deep shade for depth, and the perfect shade for your lid and inner corner). I love that its not leaning super warm and not leaning super cool. The packaging is perfect. These blend super easily and the shimmer shade is stunning. I can't rave about this enough I'm really happy with it. I would love to see more neutral matte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought i would love it a lot more. Used it for about a week but it’s just too messy to use often. Even with the smallest bit applied there would be glitter all over my face hours later. I tried using my fingers to pat it on, or at least just a small amount but it just never stuck well. Even with primer. It’s beautiful but didn’t perform as well as i would’ve hoped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigmentation of these tiny eyeshadow is incredible! The mattes are smooth and buttery and the shimmery are bright and glittery. If you're into that, you'll love these. The mattes really stand out as exceptional.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for someone on the go. I can just throw it in my bag if I'm in. rush, swipe it on in a bathroom, and be on my way. It's a nice color for medium to dark skin tones. It is a lot of shimmer though, more shimmer than color in my opinion, but I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty but by the end of the day, all the sparkle is on my face instead of my eyes. It moves, it falls...I'm starting to wonder if it migrates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got in toasted caramel.  Gorgeous shimmers, swatch like a dream, buttery soft super pigmented but I think they are so messy when applying on the lid. Def do your eyes first or it’s a glitter mess all over your face. Unfortunately I don’t do my eyes first , it’s just my routine to do foundation and concealer before eyes, so it’s made me not reach for this as often as I’d like but the  colors and shimmer are truly stunning! I’ve used my finger as well as a brush, wet and dry, glitter just falls, and sadly, it doesn’t stay on that long, somehow the glitter migrates above my crease and tops of my cheeks.  I’m going to try a glitter glue and see if that works better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice trio. The colors are very pigmented especially on my dark skin. I was very please with this product

reviews.review_title: quick and easy just need your fingers to apply!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is THE perfect quick and easy eyeshadow palette and the colors are so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its a wonderful eyeshadow. I have many of them. Very cute packaging, my pressed shadows haven’t cracked from dropping. It’s shimmery, smooth, and just the right pigmentation. You get what you see and it sticks and I love that. I picked the colors because I thought they were pretty and transferred perfectly over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty great! Honestly the pale pink middle shade is very blinding I ending up using it as a highlighter as well. Very pretty and lasted a long time. I love the packaging the only thing I would change is maybe making it a little more blendable bit it still is workable and nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These new matte/shimmer combos are incredible!! I bought both Chocolate Dahlia and Glowing Guava, and these are my new go-to eyeshadows for everyday. They're so cute and compact, they don't take up a lot of room in my makeup bag. The mattes are lovely, they have pigment and blend beautifully. I didn't have to spend a lot of time blending in order for them to look good. The shimmers are stunning - colors are great all over the lid or for a pop of highlight in the inner corner. I did get a teensy bit of fallout under my eyes, but I really don't mind. Highly highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to eyeshadow for night and day time looks. you can easily create a full look with this in seconds. I LOVE to use the matte colors for my daily wear/night wear and for festivals I'll use the shimmer! The shimmer literally makes you look like a classy goddess.  It's also super compact and easy to take around with you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I put it on my eyelid,  it started burning a lot and I dont even have sensitive skin. After that,  I had a big allergic réaction...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeshadow, especially the top  pink champagne shade.  Absolutely beautiful.  I like to use it as a topper in the middle of the eyeshadow to give an extra oomph.  Absolutely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this trio! The shimmer shades are so unbelievably pigemented and sparkly - perfect if you're going for a wet look. They glide on smoothe and can easily blend out. There is some fallout so use a primer. Its also perfect for travel. I'm buying one of the matte trios next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is amazing! The packaging is so cute and functional, it will fit anywhere. The colors in this trio are compliment each other perfectly, I used all three on the lid with a matte in the crease and was very pleased with the result. There is no fallout and they are very impactful regardless of the method of application. For the price and quality, these are so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect all in one look palette. The colors are wonderful, and can be work every single day.  I would love one with greys, one with greens too

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very shimmery. Primer seems to reduce the fall out. The bottom palette was completely detached from the base. I expect it will be breaking soon & I'll need to come up with a backup storage solution. that said, I'll still probably purchase the Orange Blossom a little later.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these eyeshadows! I use the lightest one the most since it adds a healthy sheen to my lids without adding too much color. If you like a matte through the crease (or anywhere else), you will need another palette or shadow to go alongside these trios as they are all either glittery or at least satin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is nice and buttery. Really pretty for inner corner highlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure about the product,  but I thought the packaging looked super cute, and I wasn't disapppointed. the shadows were really pigmented,  and the glitters stay all day long

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are some of the best eyeshadows I have in my collection! I really like to use the lightest shade as a topper - it can give an almost wet looking effect to your eye look.

reviews.review_title: You need this if your tan!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors if you are medium to tan complexion! Travel friendly because I don’t need to bring a large palette to have good bronze shimmers! Decently long lasting considering I don’t ever use a primer, just concealer and powder on my eyelids!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are so pretty and shimmery, also very natural! Definitely one of my favorite shimmery eyeshadows I’ve bought.

reviews.review_title: make your eyes POP with finger application
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: makes blending with your fingers not only easy but beautiful to work with. pigmented and goes on like butter!!! only problem is the plastic is weak and ended up breaking when I took them with me to travel. one of my FAVES.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really pretty shimmer glitter, very reflective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The pictures don’t really do the shadows justice, but they are very pigmented and would work very well as a shadow topper. However, the package and product amount are so tiny! Not worth the $21 price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't love this product enough! The packaging is sturdy and space-saving, and it's incredibly easy to pop a shade on your lids before going out! The shadows are super soft, and almost have a jelly-like bounce. They're pigmented and smooth; so easy to blend. No chunky glitter or fallout. Using a finger to apply is probably better than a brush. Stayed put even after 6 hours! Kaja kills it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are super glittery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these are all exactly the same and what they are are clear eyeshadows with some of the best glitter I've ever seen. gives a very Tumblr fairy pressed-flowers-on-your-temples vibe. looks really pretty when you move. unfortunately, I did not purchase a trio in order to get 3 identical shades with no pigment. you might say the bottom one has a sheer raisin wash, but it completely fades within an hour. looks like you put glitter lip gloss on your eyelids. the search for a hg soft pink continues...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The glitter even with glitter glue it goes all over

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do the same eyeshadow every day. I'm sorry. I bought this because it fits my lifestyle perfectly. These 3 shades complement my blue eyes and the packaging is amazing for traveling light and keeping it simple. 1 star off for the way the shadows crease, though I'm sure that could be changed with different application + a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an average product. I got glitter all over my face.  Even with a primer the glitter traveled everywhere. Not a pretty look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It’s so easy to use, and you have the perfect eye colours right there for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I waited around for the sale to buy this and was so excited to try Rose Water and the deeper pink trio. So disappointed....even with using a wet brush the glitter fall out is abundant! What a mess! All over my face and the color payoff isn't great either. The reason for more than 1 star is for the packaging.  It is great for travel and storage. Better off buying a palette for for $30-$50 than $40 on the 6 bad quality shadows!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colors, but lots of fallout.  Even hard to wash off.  Can see glitter on eyelids and around face the next day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect shadow to bring your look from daytime to night time or if you want to add that extra oomph to your look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeshadow trio because I couldn’t resist the super-cute gradient colour mini packaging. The shadows inside exactly match their mini trays in the compact. At first I was afraid the shadows were too sparkly, however the glitter was so fine and subtle that I now regularly wear these colours for daytime. They perk my eyes up with a fresh glow in lovely flattering rose colours ideal for my blue eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a big difference between shimmery and glittery. This is pure glitter. Not at all the shimmer I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are nice. Nothing special that you couldn’t find in a palette though. You have to use a sticky base if you don’t want any fallout!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of this little trio.  So easy to swipe on and go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This irritated my eyelids, so I had to take off stars. It left them feeling dry and puffy, so I returned this item. However, the colors were gorgeous! They were highly reflective, and could easily work as a one-shadow look. They feel smooth in the pan, but did not apply as easily on the eye. I had to go over several times to get the level of pigmentation I wanted and an even layer of color. I think these would be great if you are looking to add some sparkle to your eye, but do not want a fully pigmented eyeshadow. If they didn't bother my skin I would've kept it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw makeup reviewer I follow rave about these and the swatches she posted look pretty nice. When I swatched this in store, I wasn't really impressed but decided to get it anyway and give it a go. HOLY. CRAP. This is unbelievably beautiful in use and even more than pictures can capture! The shimmer and glitter is stunning! It's best when applied with your fingers and it blends out with a blending brush pretty nicely. I can do my eye shadow in under 10 minutes with just my fingers and a blending brush and it looks stunning. I can't complain. I'm all over this brand now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product goes on well with a brush, I have next to no fall out. Colors are true to what you see and the shimmer is gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So on a whim I bought this shadow trio for a going out look and after reading the numerous reviews here, I first used a UD primer and a brush that is specifically for foil shadows and gently patted it on my lids and brow bone and used a matte powder in my crease. I had no fallout or problem with getting the pigmentation to show. I got a shimmer look, not a glitter bomb. I would wear during the day for a lunch date also.  Use a light hand and proper brush over a good primer if you don't want fallout. As for the palette itself, it is small but its mostly all pan not wasteful packaging and easy to travel with-its exactly how it looks in the photo here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: these shadows are BEAUTIFUL. like really special, transformative shadows. My only complaint is that there is a ton of fall out. i used a glitter primer and still got glitter all over my hands and under my eyes but the shadows are so pretty its worth it. Also, i wear the lightest two shades the most as they are the most sparkly. The darkest shade is much less glittery and shiny than the other two but still nice, just something to note though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So impressed, applied morning with finger and stayed all day with so creasing. Colour is absolutely stunning. This is a no fuss but looks like you took the time to do your make up kinda product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I did a sunrise with all of these going from light to dark, can't tell you how amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful color, highly pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It feels like butter and goes on like a dream. I wear it on day I just want a bit of makeup. My daughter also love wearing these too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I should have paid more attention to the description but I thought they would have sheen, but unfortunately too glittery for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Easy to apply (fingertips is fine), very versatile as it blends beautifully, and my favorite aspect is it's not too glittery! It has just the right amount of shine to give your eyes a sun-kissed glow!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadow are beauuuuuuutiful! And full of pigment. I usual apply eyeshadow with a brush but instead I use my finger because the warmthness of it really brings out that punch! I even mix a little bit of oil with the top eyeshadow and use it as highlighter. Such a great little case too to bring for your travels. Definitely worth it even for the price tooooo hello amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all these shadows are not true to colour! They’re all way deeper than pictured. The shadows are nice but not really worth it for me. I was looking for something more vibrant so I’ll be returning these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These colors add some glam to any look! Was a little nervous to buy since it was my first Kaja product but it has quickly become a go-to product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I love this so much. The colors are amazing and the blend like a dream. They are so beautiful and they work perfect for a brow bone highlight. 10/10 would recommend. I will definitely be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Too glittery for my liking. Hard to wash off too. Would love this if it was more shimmery or even if it came in matte. Perfect size for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to give this product a couple of stars for the beautiful colors, but I'm afraid that's where it ends.  I was very excited when I found this, and also thought the packaging was an excellent idea.  However, even with the use of a good eye shadow primer, I had a face full of glitter as soon as I started application.  Sadly, this renders the product nearly useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These mini shadows are packed with super shiny glitter, and the fallout is over the top. These are way too shimmery and glittery, with little actual color pigment. The glitter gets everywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty colors ! There is a little fallout during application, but they blend well. I like the small packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is pretty but it’s not very pigmented and it’s suuuper sparkly and cheap looking on. It’s not creamy either, which is why I bought it, but just a normal sparkly powder shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shadow however makes my eyes red and itchy. Fallout is inevitable, primer doesn't help. Best sparkly shadow ever just very irritating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadows are incredible! They are soft and blendable, and they leave a gorgeous shine and shimmer on the eyelid. With a primer, they last all day without creasing or fallout. Without a primer, they lasted without fallout and minimal creasing. I love to pair the lighter shades with an eye gloss for a wet, glossy look. Even with the beautiful shimmer, they are easy to wear. I want all of the colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Not only is it adorable, but it has good pigment and is perfect for travel! I hope to see more shades in the future!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason to not give 5 stars is the lack of a matte shade. I love how the shimmer perform and the colors are so good. I use my finger over a brush with these.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YES! SO easy. SO pretty. Literally nothing bad to say about this. Buy it.

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but not for sensitive ppl!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was soo cute and I LOVED the sparkly colors! Rosewater was the pretties set imo, and the colors seemed great for topping off looks. HOWEVER, the glittery sparkle kept getting into my eyes throughout the day and they were EXTREMELY hard to remove from my skin—even with an oil cleanser! I definitely had a bad reaction to this product, and it was very upsetting. My eyes turned red and itchy and I don’t know if it was from the glitter itself or trying to remove it all at the end of the day. Such a bummer...I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone who has sensitive skin & sensitive eyes. It’s really pretty and has an amazing packaging design, but I wasn’t solely going to keep it for those reasons. Had to return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best shimmer formulas I’ve tried! The consistency is smooth and the colors are beautiful. The shimmer last very long and won’t migrate to other areas of the face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great quality! Wonderful colors that are so pigmented, yet easy to apply. I can't wait to try the other trios!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this shadow trio! The glitter blends beautiful without being chunky or hard to remove. I love the packaging too because it is easy to travel with. I recommend using a glitter adhesive with this product to reduce fallout. Love these little shadows and I would absolutely recommend them for anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice warm tones with super glitter. This is super unique in colors and formula. I use with my fingers to add a nice pop on the lid. Very smooth. Lasts long but creases over time. Would highly suggest to use with glitter glue if you have super hooded eyes like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very pretty and sparkly. The glitter stays on your eyes as long as the color does. Very dimensional glitters. The darkest one is my favorite because I like pink. It creases a little over time but that is because a have super hooded eyelids. If you have super hooded eyelids like me I would suggest using a glitter glue underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE these. They are so pigmented & beautiful. I have bought 2 so far, I plan on buying another color. They’re so easy to use & buttery. The color pay off is so amazing. I hope they come out with a whole palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this eyeshadow set, I bought it recently and worth all the money spent in it. I have cool toned skin, and these rosy colors are great for that. I  apply it with my fingers for the most stunning shine, and everytime that I use it, people say great things about my makeup. Totally worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I love this little trio! The colors work alone and very well together. Super sparkly. Very bendable. So happy I bought it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Phenomenal! Great pigmentation & shine, easily applied with fingers, practically blends itself & stays put all day even without primer. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful, shimmery, glittery, and actually lasts on the lid. The whole packaging is super cute too. I am totally going to get more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely adore this eyeshadow. The pigment payoff is very pretty and glittery. Absolutely gorgeous for Spring and Summer with its perfect champagne and peachy tones. The product is so easy to apply, just a dab and apply with fingers. Brushes work too. The product is all stacked, allowing to save room in the makeup bag. If you want a simple application process with minimal work but with a beautiful earthy sparkle, get this. Not neessarily for bold bold looks.

reviews.review_title: Like ground-up diamonds in a light wash of color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most beautiful shimmers and such good color combos. I walked by this in Sephora and picked it up because I thought the packaging and name was so cute. I stayed and swatched it for a couple of minutes because the tiny glitters are so beautiful in its wash of color. These colors are beautiful all over the lid with just a bronzer crease color behind it. I want all the colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After purchasing Rosewater, I bought Sparkling Rose - the two palettes are complementary, have a lot of staying power, and all six shades are bright and beautiful. Looking forward to seeing more colours from this great new brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented and glittery. I used the fenty shadow primer and this has stayed on all day. Love these shades- I will definitely be buying the other colors available. Also love their small size:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect for travel. The packaging is cleaver and cute! The formula is amazing, I applied it with my finger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and how easy it is to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are BEAUTIFUL. I recently purchased the Toasted Carmel trio and just went back and got this Orange Blossom trio because I loved the first 3 so much! They are creamy, buildable pigment (which is good for everyday wear but also great to build for a dramatic look), they last all day and I have used the light colors as a highlighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow is GORGEOUS! I passed by the small set up they had on an end cap at Sephora and couldn't resists. I did some swatches on my hand and they felt so creamy and pigmented I purchased. I LOVE them! They stay all day and look beautiful. I honestly have no complaints, other than I wish they had more colors! :D I already went back and purchased the 02 peach-y one. I can't wait to try more products by them. Also, the price point is also fantastic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are AMAZING! I live for having sheer(ish) glitter shadows just to pop on top of a cream eyeshadow on easy makeup days and this fits the bill. I also love you get 3 for only $21!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product applies smoothly without flaking, and the pigments really pack a punch.  The shadows are much more sparkly than I expected.  The Sparkling Rose set was a little darker than I expected, the last color is closer to a brown than a deep purple.  Still gorgeous, am definitely ordering the other color combos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am sooo impressed with this trip. Tremendous pigment and the most flattering colors. Lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sparkling Rose: Very pretty wine/rose colours that can easily transition from day to night. The packaging is adorable and shadow blends easily with a nice amount shimmer. There is some fallout so I would recommend a shadow primer, but for the price point it's a cute little shadow to throw in your makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rosewater: I'm giving this a 3 because I think the colours are beautiful and as usual I love Kaja's packaging but the fallout on this specific Bento is insane. It's high shimmer/sparkle and though the colours are smooth and blend well the fallout is maddening. Even with a primer this ends up getting sparkles all over my under eye and top of cheekbone area. I would not purchase this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute, unique packaging, and a great product! I’m partial to sparkle, but was really taken by the quality of the shadows. They look like a powder, but apply and stay like a cream. The glitter fallout is minimal, and this doesn’t settle into any creases or give you those pockets where the glitter has “worn off”. It stays all day, and into the evening. But when it’s time to take your makeup off before bed, it comes off so easily and without spreading glitter everywhere. Love this, and look forward to exploring Kaja’s brand more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The swatches are great! Very pigmented and sparkly (without the ashy appearance other brands casts) THE MOMENT I get an opportunity to wear it I look forward to smoking it out. Maybe St. Patty's Day?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unique finish to the colors, high pigmentation, overall absolutely beautiful. Perfect on my darker skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

Does have some fall out, your under eyes will be glittery when you wear these. but, I mean...glitter. Really pretty glitter. Just know that when you're purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: not necessarily creme but still good

I actually just use my fingers to apply this and blend and I think it's so easy to create a quick look. there is some fallout. the 3 colors make it easy to create an easy and quick look without being overwhelmed and without the need of brushes. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product!! It is so beautiful as eyeshadow or a highlighter! I wear this every day and I'm in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a neat little package for 3 shimmer shadows that blend well and complete any eye look. If you’re younger with minimal fine lines they can be worn on their own but if you’re older they work well to brighten the eyes. I use matte shades as a base and then add 1 or 2 of these shadows to brighten up just the center of my mobile lid. There is no real glitter here, just shimmer. If you pack it on with your finger there is no fall out. I like that it’s only a trio in each package because having too many choices in one palette can be overwhelming on days when I’m in a hurry. With these I can decide quickly what I want for the day and still look great as if I had spent a lot more time doing my eyes. I have sensitive eyes but these do not bother me at all. Very comfortable wear, long lasting and easily blended. I am looking forward to buying other shades in the near future. These rose tones are pink enough to show up on any skin tone but read more as healthy glow than pink eye infection. Any eye color would look great with this set. It’s very neutral toned, not too cool and still not too warm. Perfect balance in between that can work for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good product it’s so shiny and it looks like compact glitter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: These shadows are incrible! They are three vibrant colors, of excellent quality. I want to buy the rest of the colors!

reviews.review_text: They're incredibly pigmented! Packaging is convenient for travel, no worrying about smashing a palette. The glitter is insanely messy though.

reviews.review_text: Very cute color  combo! Would be more versatile if there was one matte shade in here, then you could throw it in your bag for traveling more easily. I also felt like the middle shade was the most buttery and pigmented by far - the other two, especially the darkest one, was a little dusty and dry feeling to me. The pink trio looks super cute and I would be open to trying that one. I received this product as part of a complimentary package for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this eyeshadow as gift. I love how pigmented and smooth the shadows are! I just love how beautiful they are!

reviews.review_text: The packaging is cute, the colors are pretty and sparkly. They definitely add a pop to any eye look. Would recommend

reviews.review_text: Gorgeous shadows ! Love using them sheered out for a soft look or using on the lid for a cut crease or halo eye look for more special Occasions. I did recieve this product at no coast as part of an Influenster box and I would definitely buy these and restock when I finish them or buy them as a gift for a girlfriend .

reviews.review_text: I loved this! The shimmer and pigmentation is stunning and it applies so easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This packing is so fun! Great shimmer shadows!

reviews.review_text: So I received this eyeshadow trio as part of the Kaja Box. The packing is adorable. I love the fact that it’s called a Beauty Bento. The shadows are all shimmers in pretty shades. These products have horrible fall out. I’m wearing them right now and I’m completely covered in glitter. They blend fairly well. I tried them all together and it doesn’t really work without a matte. I attached a picture of my favorite shade to show the fall out on the product! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, these things pack a punch. A little goes a long way. They’re so packed full of really nice shimmer, it can really compliment any look. Best way I found is to apply with a finger, barely tap it in the eyeshadow, pat of the eye and you’re ready to glow all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What an adorable and smart way to package eyeshadow. I’ve gotten a ton of compliments on how shimmery and beautiful each of these shades are on. I recieved this as a sample and I’ve never seen anything like it before. Creative and cute.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product so much! The packaging is so cute and is travel size! The shimmers are so cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't get enough of the smooth texture this product offers! The cute packaging and the stacked compacts really make a difference in mobility. I'm able easily take it with me without having to worry about getting more than one shade if I'm in a hurry, which is pretty much all the time. The shimmer and pigment payout is decent even without an eyeshadow primer. But I would recommend using one with this product because of the shimmer. The only con I have with this! I love the color combos the most, and hopefully will be able to get more shades soon!

I thought it wouldn’t be pigmented but it was and I was so happy to wear it. I wore it all day to college and not once did it smudge or move around or anything even tho I have oily eyelids

reviews.review_title: Really is more ORANGE than it looks like in pics
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this orange blossom set because the product looked cute, unique, and high quality.   I couldn’t quite decide which color to pick, but eventually chose orange blossom because it looked a little more blush/bronze undertones than the more pink sets.  I was a little surprised and worried when I received it, because it is not only small and extremely sparkly, but ORANGE as well, not blush or bronze.   However, the colors went on lovely together and did end up highlighting my warm skin tone and brown eyes.  This does not look weirdly orange on.   It looks beautiful and natural!   Still, 4/5 because the colors are more orange than in the photos online, and I think I would have rather gone with the more caramel colored set.

I adored them. I apply them with my fingers. Very easy. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

I did use a moisturizing base underneath and per other reviews, that could be the reason this stayed put.  Overall, I felt that this blended really well even using just my fingers and I loved the look on my skin (I am medium brown skin tone).  I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about these shadows! They are so pigmented and glittery! I’ve used these for quite a few looks and they are so versatile. Even using all shades into one look, looks amazing. The packaging is so cute and convenient, I love the idea they had for packaging. All the colors are beautiful and so blendable. I’ve used all shades with and without a brush and fingers works best but can still come out pigmented with a brush. But if you want ultimate pigmentation make sure to use your fingers. Looks lasted all night with very no creasing and wear. The formula is very smooth and buttery. Also not a lot of fall out, but they are all shimmers so you can’t expect to not get fallout. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: I love this cute little trio , it’s great for those quick looks where you want to add extra sparkle the pigment is great can’t go wrong - I received this product for free to try for reviewing purposes thanks to Influenster

NOT THESE ONES... boom bang... literally the most perfect traveling shadows. They are flattering on so many eye colors and match multiple outfits plus come in small and wait for it......... ADORABLE packaging as well. I couldnt reccomend a small shadow palette more than this. The color pay off is great , they blend amazing, and they go on like butter. Although I did receive these through influenster I will continue to be a loyal customer and have already ordered the other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary product for review from Influenster and I like it! The hues are absolutely gorgeous and they look phenomenal when you just swipe your fingers over them. What I really appreciate is that there is very little fallout during application so I didn’t have microscopic littler cracks if shimmery eye shadow under my eyes. On the other hand, the shimmer really didn’t work for me. I have low creases and slightly downturned eyes which make it hads for shadows to show up when I wear them. Shimmery shadows have an especially hard time showing up, and this particular set had larger bits of glitter that wasn’t particularly flattering on my eyelids. I’d recommend for people with larger eyelid real estate. Also because the shimmer is so beautiful, I’d love to try this on as a highlighter.

But I don't have time for that, especially when I could get almost 2 better quailty colourpop palettes for the same price as this...  3 shimmer shadows... thats expensive. I feel like most of that is just paying for the packaging which is almost always breaking nails and theres a mirror.. aint nobody using that tiny, polly pocket mirror.

reviews.review_title: Going in the summer travel bag for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot stress enough how much I love these shadows!! I use them almost every day. Often I’ll take the lightest or middle shade on a fluffy brush and sweep it over my eyeshadow for a sparkly finish, but most of the time I’ll take it with my finger and put it in the inner third of my eye. The sparkle that you get from these shadows is something I’ve only ever seen in k-beauty eyeshadows. I think these shadows are well worth the price as they’re very high quality and quite versatile. While I experience a tad bit of fallout, it’s still relatively minimal and very workable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous sparkly colors! So compact and easy to travel with. LOVE THE COLORS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very pretty. It’s best applied with the finger for a more bold effect. The packaging is convenient and is good for traveling. I received this product complementary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this eyeshadow trio! What really excited me at first was the packaging, it is just so cute, but the formula is just as good! All 3 shades have about the same formula, so it is consistent. They are very pigmented, with a lot of shimmer, and micro glitters. They feel very light on the eyes, not heavy at all. I like all three shades, but the middle shade is my fave. If you are not familiar with Korean makeup, it is more muted and natural than typical American makeup. These shadows are slightly muted in color, but pigmented in that muted color, if that makes sense. Basically, they are easy to blend, apply well with fingers for ease of application, and look very pretty yet natural on the eyes. I definitely want to pick up another shade or two. I just love these for travel bc it is so compact. The only possible downside I could think of is that there are no transition shades, however I don’t think you really need them. You could either use them on their own, or combine with a basic palette, or even a blush or bronzer (that’s what I’ve been doing when traveling). I received this product complimentary for reviewing purposes.
I love these. They have such a cute shine, but are a little heavy on the glitter. Not too much colour, definitely sheer, but nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite Kaja beauty product! I love shimmery eye shadows and this product is a must! It’s so soft and easy to apply. Tip: use a eyeshadow primer first and the sparkles stay all day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum

I also applied it with a brush but I can just imagine how great it'll be with my fingers. I also like the packaging, it's pretty cute!

The quality of the product is there. Its pigmented and soft.  But I have to give 3 stars because the company continues to be vague whether or not this is cruelty free if that's not something you care about then you won't be disappointed  by the product!

reviews.review_text: Colors are super soft and pigmented. I personally just wish one matte color was included in the bento so you could make an easy look on the go other than that they’re pretty good colors.

The middle eyeshadow is my all time favorite but I love the top for an inner corner highlight and the bottom for a more Smokey look. They’re very pigmented and I used my finger for application but they are also brush friendly. I’m the type to do my eyeshadow last so I was originally worried about fall out but it’s minimal if any.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster for review. With that being said these shadows are gorgeous and glittery they feel soft and buttery to the touch. I highly recommend using a glitter glue when applying to the eyes because it does have major fallout of glitter. Now warning for the people with sensitive eyes the glitter flakes in this shadow are chunky and do feel scratchy when your rubbing it on your eye so just be gentle when applying it. In the picture I’m attaching to this review I did use all three of the shadows on my lid the darkest one I used on the outer corner the orange shade I used on the middle of my eyelid and the light peachy shade I used on the inner part of my eyelid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample and I absolutely LOVED IT, I thought the packaging was so smart and cute!! They were so creamy and pigmented I was so surprised!! I kept telling everyone about it when I was wearing it. This product was best applied with your finger, I did not get the same color payoff when I used it with a brush. There was slight fallout but was easily wiped away. I need every color now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was absolutely amazing . I used it as an inner corner highlight and I stacked it with my highlighter it was so beautiful. The pigment was amazing I was a little worried at first because it was so small but I loved it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

I sometimes use my fingers to blend a single shade if I’m not using multiple ones and it goes on beautifully. I just wish it was more pigmented because you need to build up the color to get more pigmented shade so I take of a star. This is perfect if you are looking for a lot of shimmer because all three colors are super shimmery!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this trio!! It is so amazing. Very pigmented, very beautiful, and so so so worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All of these are beautiful and pack a punch! They are an office appropriate glitter shadow when applied dry (with finger) but also look gorgeous and night out appropriate when applied wet! Each shimmer has a beautiful undertone that isn’t overpowering and they blend well once applied. I DO recommend a heavy duty eyeshadow primer! There is fallout! I did receive this product complimentary to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

They’re super creamy, easy to blend, and are perfect for a dressy look OR an every day look. Even though I received this complimentary for testing purposes, I highly recommend and the price is easily affordable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

I would suggest patting this product onto your skin. It doesn’t have much fallout but when it does get on your face, it is really hard to get off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product more— I have tried other products from Kaja and have really enjoyed them, but I was expecting a pigmented shimmer eyeshadow but this seemed to be more of an eyeshadow topper. However, I think this is nice to wear on its own when you want to have a little something on your eyelids without making it obvious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the shimmer shades in this product! Although I have to admit that they were much prettier in the packaging, they are still pretty on the face. I love to use the shades lightly over warm smokey looks or as inner corner highlight. I would recommend this to an artist who prefers more subtle, blended out looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product complimentary for testing purposes and it is absolutely interesting yet beautiful. The product doesn’t create a ton of fallout yet there’s tons of shimmer. One swatch packs a lot of pigment and the application is graceful. I would definitely recommend or a daytime or nighttime look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone who doesn't like super sparkly eyeshadows, these are gorgeous and super pigmented! All the colors have a gold undertone to them, which I think is gorgeous. They apply very nicely with, or without, an eye primer or wetting your brush. These can be worn as a pretty lid color or on top of a matte color, like the one in my picture. I'm wearing baked cinnamon on top of my purple matte and sun-kissed tan all over my lid. My only reasoning for 4 stars is the fallout is crazy with these shadows! Even with tapping off excess, wiping away the fallout, there is still a lot of glittery fallout left underneath my eyes, which I'm not a fan of. Otherwise, lovely product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is pigmented as can be - SUPER shimmery and the best part is that you can wear them ptogether or separately for TONS of different look options - its super compact and ver travel friendly. Lasts well without creasing. This was received as a sample for testing purposes through Influenster and I cannot be happier to reccomend it to my friends. So worth the price! Hoping to try some more of these in other shades

reviews.review_text: This product is ingenious! the packaging is so convenient you can carry it everywhere you go. Every color is so pigmented and applies so well. I will absolutely purchase this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not typically a fan of metallic shades on a daily basis but these shadows have really changed my mind! reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product!! Great application, easy to blend, and soooo much pigment! The colors go well with most of my makeup looks and are so sparkly. I love them they go well for natural looks and fancy looks. Definitely recommend especially if you’re looking for a shiny lid!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
