reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: very pretty colors but my favorite part is the packaging!! it's so pretty and easy to travel with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not big into shimmer eyeshadows but these are amazing! You can still do a natural look or go all out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color payoff is amazing on this! The middle color is my ultimate color and the sparkles pop so much on the eyelid. However you really need to use your fingers to apply (I can't get the same effect using brushes even when wet), and it's impossible to get all the glitter/shimmer off your hands when you wash up otherwise. The colors also don't blend very well in my opinion, you quickly lose the contrast in the three colors when you blend them. But as a one eyelid shade per look this trio is fantastic. Extra plus the packaging is space efficient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I would definitely recommend it to a friend who loved a shimmery eye. I did receive this complementary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This product worked out sooo well for me definitely a staple for a natural glowy look. So creamy and glided ok so effortlessly. Very much completed my natural eye look. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes

reviews.review_text: I loved these shades! They’re absolutely stunning, the finish is super reflective and goes beautifully on the skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Giving it 4 stars bc although the product does what it’s supposed to do, there could be some improvements. I really wish they had included a matte brown shade instead of one of the shimmers bc then I could only carry this around to do a quick eye look when I’m doing my make up on the way or taking it to vacation! Otherwise, this is super beautiful combination of warm tone shimmers that I would use as a topper for my eyes and highlight inner corner and underneath my eyes. I like the idea of putting three in one not as a palette but on top of each other! Feels like they take less space in my beauty bag. I’m definitely including this in my everyday routine from now on. It was long lasting (with Wet n Wild eyelid primer) and I used my finger for a subtle application, but this definitely layers in pigment and saturation of shimmers.

You could literally put it in your jacket pocket and make sure you glitter all day! Definitely a product I’d like to buy some of the other shades in! reviews.review_text: These shadows are very shimmery and pigmented - I had to layer them to get the depth that I wanted. I think these are perfect for folks that don’t wear a lot of makeup or for preteens/teens that want to use a product but don’t want anything dramatic.   The packaging is so cute! Love the compact-ness. Great for the on-the-go user.   I used these shadows by themselves the first time and then used them again over a darker shadow and loved it.   They’re very versatile!   I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

Separate transition, crease, and highlight colors are needed to create a look. Wasn’t long wearing. Glitter does get everywhere. You can get much better shadow at the drugstore. Packaging is cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a cute package. perfect for travel. can get so many cute looks with this. and all of kaja packaging is just the cutest. shadows r creamy. no fallout. and stays put!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are someone who is not really into the messy, glittery pigments, you will love this. I received this as a complimentary gift in Orange Blossom. The colors are absolutely AMAZING! Literally my type of shades. I love right off the bat there is ALOT of pigment when you swatch it and it is not the type of shadow where it is just glitter. I love all the shades but my favorite the the Baked Cinnamon shade. These apply so well and they are super blendable if you are using it with other shadows. I wore this for about 6 hours and they were not a glittery mess—super long-wearing!! Also I got so many compliments wearing these shadows, which is a plus! I’m excited to collect some more! Highly recommend trying these baddies out if you’re looking for some shine for your looks!
amazing glittery eyeshadows! great for travel and adds a pop to any look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very conflicted on this product. I like that it's stacked and compact (makes it nice for travel). It's also very pigmented and the colors are perfect for my green eyes. But the glitter got everywhere. Like literally on things there are no way I could have physically touched with where I swatched them on the back of my hand. Overall, is this a cute little product? yes. but for $21 you could be half way to buying a big palette of colors rather than just purchasing these three that go together. I am not sure if I will purchase the other shades yet. Also, I would like to say that I received this product complimentary of Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Ladies no more gluing loose glitter on you eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Beauty Bento Bouncy Shinmer Eyeshadow Trio in shade Orange Blossom -Gold Tones to try complimentary for review. I honestly have to say I absolutely love this brand as a whole! Every item is soft in texture, great in quality, has unique and super cute packaging, very pigment and safe and gentle on skin! This eyeshadow trio is  very pigmented, I'm use to loading my brush up with Shimmers, glitters and matte eyeshadow colors. So I grab alot to pack on the color and to my surprise I actually had to wipe it off. I put too much on the first time! That really shocked me. A little goes a long way! If you're tired of the mess that comes with loose Shimmers and glitters, tired of using glue to adhere glitter, then get this! This product is also versatile.... I used it as a highlighter too. It's texture is  silky and smooth! Perfect base and finish look. No streaking or looking patchy! Also no fall out either! Must try ! I really enjoyed it! Colors showed up on my beautiful dark brown skin, without me using an eyeshadow base or primer! Eyeshadow stayed on full untill I washed my face! Very easy to remove! No skin breakouts or red, itchy eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The glitter from these three eyeshadow shades was super pigmented. It also lasted all night and didn’t smudge. I totally recommend it because the formula was really good!

Product is so cute!!! Very nice packaging. Love the trio layering of each shadow. Each shade is perfectly pigmented and sparkly enough. Applies smoothly with fingers or eyeshadow brush. Sampled this product for testing purposes courtesy of Influenster

reviews.review_text: I LOVE these. The colorful packaging is a great touch, the formula is awesome as well! They took a typical product and made it super unique in my opinion. Orange blossom is stunning and I highly recommend. All 3 colors are beautiful on the lid and add a gorgeous sparkle that’s super eye catching. I’ve gotten compliments left & right. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the color Orange Blossom and WOW I love it!! I have used every single shade, multiple times, even though this is a relatively new product in my collection. This gives you an intense shimmer all day long on your eyelids. It truly rivals all the other glitter toppers out there right now. This gives you a very pigmented, high sparkle look. I've used this alone, as well as layered over regular powder shadow; both are great. I like it better over another shadow because it doesn't crease as soon (I had about four hours of no creasing, with no shadow, no primer, nothing underneath; with just a powder eyeshadow (no primer) it lasted the entire workday without creasing on me. I have dry eyelids so this obviously might not work for people with oily lids). Truly these are fantastic and I am so glad I was able to try them; this will be a staple in my sparkle routine. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful! Soooo sparkly, packaging is super cute, colors are gorgeous and the price isn’t bad either. Definitely going to get the rest of the colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not really a fan of shimmers but these colors are so beautiful and perfect for using over a dark or light base. I love the top color for an inner corner highlight. The pigmentation is beautiful, they're really smooth with no chunky glitter. A small amount of fall out but that's normal with shimmers received the product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these!!! Beautiful colors! Very easy to apply and blend out! They’re also SUPER pigmented and I love them. You could also use them as a super glossy highlighter! I was sent these complementary for testing purposes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love product each one is so pretty and they are super easy to apply. It feels good on your skin. I definitely would recommend. The colors are just so good and they stay on for along time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are some beautiful shadows! The shimmer is out of this world! The only think I’m not a fan of is the packaging, it is a little bulky! But they do leave a hole that helps you depot them easily! I revived these for free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I love the trio eyeshadow and also includes a mini mirror for on the go! The size is prefect and the texture is great super blendable! Would most definitely recommend to everyone! From the packaging to the price everything about this product is great!

reviews.review_title: Perfect compact for a little shimmer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute and shimmery, not necessarily dense in pigment but using some setting spray on the brush could definitely change that! Love the trio colors and the cute compact it comes in. I got these from influenster as a complimentary product tester!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these! Perfect for holiday looks or if you just want some glitz. They are that perfect shimmer that POPS I can’t get enough of them I usually use my finger to apply it for maximum pigment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Orange Blossom- golden tones through Influenster as a complimentary product to review for testing purposes. I love this eye shadow! It is the perfect mix of glittery and shimmery. I applied this with my finger tip and packed it onto my lid after laying down a matte shade in my crease. I didn’t even apply an eyelid primer and still have no creasing or fallout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color and glitter pigment of these surprised me. They're easily blendable, and the case is super cute. I get lots of compliments when I wear just this on my lids on my in-a-hurry days. Definitely recommend to have in your collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very cute shades! the glitter is very nice and has a shiny finish. the packaging is adorable!!! I received this product free from inflenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and the colors are very pigmented, if you’re not in to shimmery shades all over, this alone isn’t going to be to your liking but if you just add a matte shadow you can tone it down a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these eyeshadow! I use them for apraxia occasion and I love it. It’s sparkly and the kit is really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone needs some shimmer and this trio is so perfect! Each shade hasn’t great pigment with plenty of shimmer. Taking a damp brush really amplifies the color and makes the application even better. I highly recommend this product to anyone! Also the packaging is SUPER cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the package is adorable! What a great idea to have different eyeshadow separated. Second of all the color are amazing. They are easy to apply and they don't let the too much impression , this is very important to me. Love it! Super recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super cute and convenient, and I LOVED the formula! These shadows are SUPER pigmented and super buttery and easy to apply! Definitely worth purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product, I did not wet my brush and the shadow was a little flaky. Wetting my brush helped so much. These glitters are BEAUTIFUL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Its really shine and perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Holy shimmer! I am obsessed with these. I swatched them on my hand and the glitter has not come off. If you like a super shimmery eyeshadow, that goes on light I really recommend these. Super lightweight and easy to apply. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bento was smaller than I thought. It’s a cute concept and great design. However, the pigment isn’t that great, even the darkest color “baked cinnamon” did not show very well. Very glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Supper glittery, definitely a nighttime shadow.  The colors are pretty but can't use it as often as I would like because of the glitter.  Be careful when putting it on or you will end up with a glittery face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the best glitter shadows I own.  Use a fingertip to apply for best results.  Love every shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful glittery shadows! I just use a finger to pat on the lid and it works beautifully. Unique glitter to most of the shadows I own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great quality product, amazing colors,  easy application, also easy to remove

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received multiple compliments when I wore each of these shadows. The sparkle stays all day.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I’d heard
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eh. It’s just ok. Definitely not the nicest shadow formula. It’s actually quite dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this set in Orange Blossom. The colors are gorgeous and the sparkle is intense. Best applied with your finger for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I returned the product; just too glittery for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing colors.. I try them as eyeshadow and they work amazing. For highlighter was crazy. I can’t believe I got this product for free. Thank you. It’s so easy to use, you can use your finger to put it or a brush ether way looks amazing. I received this product as a free sample...  I received the product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty on the eyes! love it!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful shades with the right amount of spakle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this one and the Rose Water. I love these little bentos! They had the perfect amount of spakle and the are very easy to work with. They're great for the beginner. Some on here have complained of a lot of fallout, but I never noticed that much, myself. These are best applied with either a finger or a flat, densely packed brush (they will hold the product better) for optimal pigment and for reducing the fallout. Definitely worth it at their price point :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how they managed to make these shadows sheer AND sparkly.  After just applying the middle color in the Toasted Caramel bento to my lids, a male colleague asked me, How do  you ladies create that sparkly look on your faces? When I looked in a mirror later, I noticed that the center of my face was covered with enough fallout to create the kind of not too subtle sparkle that one might achieve after slapping a huge highligher covered powder puff on your nose and allowing the powder to radiate outward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought them all. Very satisfied. Pigmented. Smooth and soft on the lids. True to the description: Very shimmery, bright shimmers. Even without primer it did not crease after 3hours and I have oily lids. Very minimal fall out even applied with finger. But I do recommend wearing them with a eye primer. However, do I think 26$ CAD justifies the product? Well, hmmmm. Even I bought them with the discount  20% Vib rouge, I still think it is pricey. The product is smaller than you think. The packaging is cute, good quality but bare in mind the trio can’t be twisted on the side in order to use them all. So let’s say you use the 1st color, either you close it or let it still open but can’t see properly the next color you want to use. Which is not practical at all unless you have the patience and have plenty of time to do your make up lol. Overall, yes I recommend them but try to buy them whenever you have a discount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They’re really pretty and the colour pay off is nice but after application there’s a lot of fallout like chunks of glitter under your eyes. This also does not last long at all. There’s no longevity for this product. It comes off really really easily so I returned it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these! Nice little addition to any eye look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an obsession with makeup and especially eye shadow, so I’ve tried almost every brand known. This is by far one of my all time favorite eyeshadows. I have the Orange Blossom. I use glitter primer first, then my finger to apply the shadow. It is SO sparky and blends beautifully. I was actually shocked by how good these are. I’ve had mine a few months and it hasn’t dried out at all. I’ve had a problem in the past with my Natasha Denona and ColourPop drying down to where the shadows no longer have that creamy/ bouncy feeling. It stays on all day long, 8+ hours. Will definitely be buying the other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these in 2 different colors & I’m going to buy a 3rd one. I use these on days that I don’t have the time to put on makeup. I apply them with my fingers. Easy peasy. They’re highly pigmented & last all day (of course it probably helps that I still use an eyeshadow primer). I put one in my purse & the other one in my gym bag so that they get me out of a pickle in situations when I want to look more made up on days that I leave the house with no makeup on. I have used them without a primer at times & the color still lasts. The only downside of using them without an eyeshadow primer is that they’ll crease after a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a beautiful glittery shadow set. Very cute and small, good for travel but you will have to bring some matte shadows coz these are all shimmers. It has a drier formula that’s different from the metallic wet shadows from other brands (ex makeup geek foiled shadows). It’s better as a glitter topper because there’s not much colour payoff, it doesn’t swatch well on hands but they are beautiful on the eyes. Some fall out especially used with dry brushes, would recommend using fingers or wet brush with spray. Overall i still love this. Probably would use for special occasions as it’s very sparkly and glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really really liked these! they apply nicely with the fingers, although I would recommend using a glitter primer or glue, and throughout the day some of the glitter transfers to your under eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was led to believe by the name of the product and the images shown that this would be different than just. More eyeshadow. Maybe a slightly creamy bouncy formula.  No. Just normal eyeshadow.  All the shades swatched very matte brown as well.  Go on patchy and blend out into nothing.  It’s cute but disappointing.  Would return it if I could tbh or at least try the lightest shades but oh well Had high hopes for this brand but it’s just cute packaging which I love but I also love a unique product to match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have 20+ palettes in my makeup kit, and I reach for these more than anything else. The glitter in this product is absolutely beautiful and pigmented without looking overwhelming or tacky. It never creases and lasts all day on me, and I get compliments on it every time I wear it out. The fallout is extremely minimal for a glitter, and if there happens to be any it can easily be brushed away with a powder brush. After trying these shadows for the first time, I immediately ordered all the other shades. I usually apply with my fingers and it blends like a dream, and the lightest shades of each set make the inner corner pop like no other shadow I have tried. Don’t let the darker colors of the sets scare you away, they are so beautiful on the outer edges of the eyes! Also, the packaging is so convenient for traveling, and the pan sizes definitely give you your money’s worth. This product is a must-have in your makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing reviews online showing how gorgeous the shimmer is in these, I bought the Orange Blossom trio and immediately fell in love! The product description is a little off, these are more like pressed glitter topcoats than cream to powder eyeshadows. They are sheer, which I love actually and I use them to add extra dimension to eye looks. The glitter is fine enough that even if there is a bit of fallout, I don't mind as it never looks bad (strange but true). I was only going to buy the orange one but loved it so much I picked up the Rosewater one in-store on a whim and am so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 colours the rose water and orange blossom stacks and both are fabulously sparkly! They last very long and have minimal flaking. Will be using these all the time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is pretty small but it's still a good value. it is some of the creamiest, richest, subtle glitter i have used. it looks so beautiful and is super pigmented. perfect for me since i dont like using straight chunky glitter. this gives more of a natural look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this trio. It’s more glittery than what I would normally find in a palette but still beautiful. Not much fallout and very pigmented and easy to work with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely gorgeous, looks wet on the lids. make sure you pat, don’t swipe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The light wash of color and bold shimmer that these shadows deliver really brighten up my eyes! I love that it has some inner corner highlight and all-over-the-life potential!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of the shades but this one has to be my favorite. These are so easy to put on when your in a hurry and so convenient for travel due to the small size. These are best applied with fingers I find. For a full review and eyes done using these in under 10 minutes check out my YouTube channel - 10 Minute Eye Look Kaja Eyeshadow ll Kimmie B

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful based on web/app photos but a little too shimmery for my taste upon delivery, so back it went.  If you don't mind the bright high shimmer, then by all means, you'll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They are really cute and great for a little bit of color that's not to much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful as lid colors!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought two of these, one in coral and one in pink. They’re highly pigmented, travel-friendly, and uniquely flattering! My mom asked if she could have my coral bento trio when I showed the eyeshadows off.   They’re fun, unlike the majority of the market, long lasting, easy to work with, and perfect to keep with you. I like to keep makeup at my work desk and purse, just in case I need to touch up or apply something on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! The pictures do not do this product justice. They are bright, beautiful glitter shadows. They don’t feel chunky or heavy. Glitter glue is not needed (for me at least). Everytime I look at the shadows I am shocked at the beauty. Purchasing the rest for sure!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for putting in your bag and using when you’re out. Fantastic pigmentation when used with fingers. Beautiful shades.

reviews.review_title: significant amount of fall out. looks muddy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very glittery but it will cause significant amount of fall out. The overall look using all three colors from Rose Water end up looking muddy and low quality. Because the first shade is quite light, it doesn’t complement fair skin. I believe darker skin might find Rose Water to work better.   Suggest to try the color Orange Blossom if you are interested. It looks a lot cleaner if you have fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These have a crazy texture that I’ve never felt with eyeshadows before, and when these are packed onto your finger or a brush they look insanely metallic, which got me excited! But in reality they are hard to build up on the eyes. I really struggled to get the super metallic look that was on the brush to translate onto my eyelid. I even tried to foil it with setting spray and it still was just ok. I have used better metallic shadows but these aren’t the worst. I’ll probably return this because I own better but they’re not awful.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Highly pigmented, stayed on a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow is too sparkly and has too much glitter for my taste, and it always get on my upper cheek. I don't like it personally.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!!! Glitter!!! Looks beautiful on!! Minimal fall out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors! Shimmer is so thin and pretty not chunky like other shimmers I’ve bought. Best if used with a primer under. You can layer it to look darker/stronger but one swipe will give you a great look as well. I loved the packaging/presentation too. It’s 3 in one basically. It’s great to take along for touch ups or for travel! An eye look in one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! To me this is a top coat to all of my eyeshadow looks that makes it complete. It is also small and compact perfect to travel with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love all three colors! Goes on beautifully without much fallout. Not saturated colors but works alone it on top of others colors. I used the middle one on top of Mac’s coral and it was stunning! Looks great on mature eyes unlike other sparkly eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love all these shimmering shadows. I bought the Sparkling Rose one from the store, and ordered the rest since it wasn't available at my sephora. What I love about these, they are build-able shadows with minimum fall out. You can go for a simple wet shimmery look, or go full glam by packing it on some more. Packaging is cute and easy to carry around with you. I wish I could have the whole collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are gorgeous shadows - good pigmentation and buttery.  They ARE sparkly, but it's not chunky glitter. I am not always consistent with eye primer ... on a day I forgot the primer, this did crease on me ... but if I wear a primer or some sort, the look lasts until I take it off at night.   Strongly considering buying Rose Water too ... I opted for Sparkling Rose because I have A LOT of lighter pink eye shadows already, but I love the formula and the packaging is both adorable and convenient.

reviews.review_title: fun but a lot of fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cute little packaging & perfect for travel. The colors are really pretty. Easy to apply & blend w/ your finger. Only draw back is there is a lot of fall out. I don’t enjoy having glitter all over my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a person that uses eyeshadow or glitter a lot in general, but I couldn't resist myself. The shadows were so buttery and a little goes a long way. The shadows make a really great statement!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So good! I now have this in two colors and I am in love. This set is a collection of gorgeous purples and wines. I love the way these apply, especially with a brush. There is a little bit of fallout, but not too much, especially for glitter shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Stopped by a store to check out this product before purchasing and so glad I did. colors are less saturated in person and not very pigmented when swatched. Cute concept, but opportunity with quality. Pass for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you want jaw dropping shimmers, this trio is absolutely perfect. These shades are so stunning and it wore on they eyes beautifully. I bought the Orange Blossom trio and now I want them all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful eyeshadows! For best result apply on glitter primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the rose and bronze and LOVE them!! They aren’t completely opaque pigmented, more of a lid color and highlight shade ... super glittery shimmery though and so easy to apply ... i hope they come out with more shades!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these I also have the orange blossom and I ordered the golden colors, they are sparkling and shimmery which is why I love them and they have a good pop of color. I definitely would use eye primer with this. I'm really impressed with this brand.

reviews.review_title: If full on Glitter lids are your thing..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SOOO much glitter! It’s ridiculously hard create a look with this trio because of the massive amount of glitter..it’s ends up looking like a glitter party on your eyes with no definition whatsoever. I love the concept of the packaging extremely portable and environmentally friendly which is why I gave it two stars but I definitely be passing these onto my 12 year old niece

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great little Stack that lasted all day!  At a Glance: 1. Travel Friendly 2. Glittery but not obnoxious fallout 3. Very Pigmented   I think it's a wonderful addition to my travel and day kit! Well done Kaja!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave the Kaja products a try and I have to say... I am obsessed and hooked. I have gotten more compliments with these eyeshadows than I have in a while. They stay on all day and don’t crease. I’m so happy they’re coming out with more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: tried out this product like i saw it being used in many instagram and short videos, knew immediately that it was not for me!   the glitter is so transferable, does not stay on my lids for more then like, 10 seconds. I was late to work because i had to fix my makeup before I could even leave the house! maybe with tonnes of primer or as a topper this would work better, but even hand swatches disappeared almost immediately after 5 minutes with no rubbing. will be returning today.  loved the colors but such a poor product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I love the colors and the pigment is great,  I also love how you're supposed to use your fingers with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So sparkly, and super fun to use because the packaging is cute. It's quick to blend with fingers and the formula is buildable, so you can make looks that are sheer enough for everyday wear. I hope they make more shades!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are insanely beautiful. I love this product. My only issue is that there is a lot of fall out, but if you use a good glitter primer (I use Too Faced) its not an issue. Really similar result to the Stila Magnificent Metals without the liquid formula. Very dramatic effect, perfect for a special occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to add a classy glitter/ sparkle to your eyes without looking too over the top then this product is for you! No need to use a glitter glue either as they adhere to the eyelid just fine. I definitely plan on purchasing more colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are lovely little eye shadow sets. I got my first set in orange blossom and can't wait to go back and get more. I will say, and maybe this is my inability to put on makeup, that I don't like applying it with my fingers, I find it difficult for it to stay on without using a ton of product. With cheap brushes, it's okay, but there is some fallout. With my new set of nice brushes, goes on smooth and blends lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Toasted Caramel as well and have received so many compliments when I wear both Bento Trios! The colors go on smoothly and last all day. They are really sparkly, but the colors are deep and lovely so they don't look like too much for everyday use. I think the price point is pretty great for 3 colors too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Online the colors looked great, but not in person. Small portion for the price and way tooooooo glittery! Not a little - a lot!

reviews.review_title: A NO - GO for mature eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades, but not for mature skin and eyes.  it's to glittery. it went all over my face.  I had to apply with a shader brush. not as seen in the video with just one swipe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely fell in love with these bento shimmers! I purchased the Orange Blossom and Toasted Caramel trios. They’re so gorgeous on the eyes. Price is affordable. They are glittery- which I love. Gorgeous and worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No color payoff unless you really PRESS it in multiple layers and if you have fairer skin. I have medium warm tone skin and when I swipe the 3 colors on my lid, all I get are gold yellow glitters. There is only a slight difference in the 3 colors unless you really put ALOT of product on in layers or wet the brush and pack it in. Not recommended for quick application which is the original intent for me buying this for travel.   You would actually need a brush, wet it with spray to get a nice color out of this. I will be returning this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: couldn't be happier, it's the cutest set up and most amazing pigments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This little shadow trio is amazing. For reference I rarely use matte shadows so I love me some shimmer/glitter. I used brushes the first time to apply then the second time used my fingers - I much prefered the colour pay off of just using my fingers. This shadow is incredible. You can use it  as a topper or on its own. Cant wait to pick up more!

reviews.review_title: love love I want more shades!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just love the glitter, it stands alone so well no need for fancy eye makeup. I love it formula is creamy the colours are so pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: so I used to hate metallics cuz they just didn't look good on me but these are so smooth and buttery that they don't cling to any texture on my lid they are so beautiful and I am so glad I bought this lol probably gonna be wearing these every day I'm so in love better versitile too they can be a show topper or a stand alone they have amazing shimmer in them my eyes look so shiny and I'm in love might have to get another stack

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These are an amazing find! I love these. Each shade contains either glitter or duochrome glitter. You can get an opaque look if you use a wet brush or as A topper if used dry. I even used the lightest shade over my highlight to give it a nice pop of sparkle. These will be right next to my Stila Glitter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing and beautiful!! I can’t even believe explain how gorgeous this little set is. I wore it to work and everyone kept complimenting my makeup. Definitely recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. Super pigmented, sparkly forever. Love it, very high quality for a great price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this to add to my travel makeup bag, but found it to be way too glittery for me. I was hoping for more of a shimmer effect but I found it to be too glitzy for daytime wear, and very hard to remove like glitter. Will be returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great, travel-friendly eyeshadow trio! The colors all compliment each other and are more pigmented than my more expensive glitter eyeshadows. The easiest application method I have found is to use your fingers for a better, bolder color payoff. The glitter shadow has lasted all day on me on top of a glitter glue and doesn't have any fallout whatsoever. Overall, I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone looking to test out some new glitter shadows without breaking the bank.

reviews.review_title: Definitely Using as a Stocking Stuffer! LOVE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because it is super cute. I thought the colors would be a bit brighter and more pigmented. Overall still really cute, but they are more of a pretty buildable shimmer. They are really blendable though so well worth it. These would be cute I think for stocking stuffers tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this little stack of shimmer shadows! The color payoff is wonderful and it's really fun and different for me, since I usually stick to browns. The warm tones are perfect going into fall.  I love that it takes up only a little space, unlike a giant palette.

reviews.review_title: shimmer, shimmer, shake, make a heart break ;)
reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this little stack of shimmer shadows! The color payoff is wonderful and it's really fun and different for me, since I usually stick to browns. I love that it takes up only a little space, unlike a giant palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The search for the perfect shimmer is over ! These are SO pigmented and litteraly look otherworldly on your lids. I’ve even used the lightest shade as a highlight topper and you could probably see me from outer space ! A little goes a long way, my favorite way to apply is with my finger and just pat it on. I even got orange blossom, they’re just too good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors in this, the pigment is beautiful and it layers beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this eyeshadow as my go-to quick look all the time because it is so pigmented and sparkly that just a quick swipe with your finger looks incredible! I love using these for cut crease lids as well. They have very minimal fallout, and are so beautiful. The color you see in the pot is exactly what you get on your skin.

reviews.review_title: Best glitter eyeshadow I’ve ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So shiny! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is adorable, and the eyeshadows are absolutely gorgeous! They have just the right level of shimmer: I can wear them to my (quite conservative) office and not feel overdone, but they're still glittery enough that I feel sparkly. I want them in every color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: RECIEVED this  neat little shadow set   yesterday  and these colors are awesome   love all threes colors  going to purchase  more of these I am liking this line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product! 1 star is for the packaging because it's very compact, and I like things I can throw in my bag or bring when I'm traveling. The other star is for effort... The description of this product led me to believe that it would be creamier with more pigmentation. I even watched youtube reviews to see how they performed. I bought two trios- Orange Blossom and the darkest pink one. The shadows all performed consistently... bad. They're dry and have insane fallout. They're GLITTERY to a fault because they end up falling all over your cheeks and face by the end of the day. Back to lack of pigmentation- these are sheer. I know, can you believe it? With a brush, they're so sheer. With my finger, I barely can build it up. What a disappointment /:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this after reading all the good reviews, but it just didn’t work for me. It’s not a cream to powder shadow like they describe. It’s a glittery, powdery mess. It feels like they’re not pressed enough and the shadow just crumbles everywhere. It’s impossible not to get the glitter fallout all over your face. The product itself is TINY. The colors look gorgeous in the pan, but they just don’t work well for me on the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love shimmery, glitter shadow, you’ll love these! They’re so smooth and apply well with either your brush or finger. I think the packaging is really cute too and convenient if you’re traveling. Hopefully they come out with more sets that incorporate mattes because you can’t really do a look alone with these since they are so blingy.

reviews.review_title: Glitter Bomb, but not in a good way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe the high ratings this eye shadow is getting. First, the product is so small for how much you pay for it. I was willing to overlook that if it was a quality product, but it’s going straight back to the store. I really liked the shades and they looked beautiful in the pans, but I had to layer on a lot to get any color payoff. It’s really not a cream as they describe it, it’s very powdery and there was a lot of fall out. I used shadow primer and within 3 hours the glitter had traveled all over my face and it had totally creased and was uneven on my lids. Please test this in the store before making the mistake I did.

reviews.review_title: Three power shades in a tiny compact!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just played with the Sparkling Rose Wine trio.  Colors are not only beautiful and glittery, they’re also tones of rose wine I haven’t seen in other similar shaded palettes.  The case is small, fits in your palm, but each eyeshadow is easy to pop open.  The design makes it compact and easy for travel.  All three colors are glittery but pigmented enough to show up, and complement each other well.  They get a little muddy when I layer them, but alone would make nice toppers for shadows you may have in other palettes.  I tried them dry, and without primer, and still got good results.  For the price and the payoff, the Kaja trio is worth it!  Look forward to trying other products from this brand.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought rosewater. It has nice colors and has a nice shimmer. I like the small bento compartment. The price isnt bad either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So beautiful and shimmery! Definitely not a chunky glitter and can look super metallic if you layer them up. The description says cream-to-powder, but they feel like regular powder eyeshadows to me. I definitely want to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so I couldn't help myself, these are so cool and unique I had to buy them all!mMy favourite one is the sparkling rose but they are all very beautiful. Great formula, very sparkly but not glittery per se. One thing that I would have loved to see with these is if they were magnetic and you could stack them... That would be the coolest thing. The only downfall with these as they are not stand-alone eyeshadows, these are great if you are looking for a topper or just to have a splash of sparkle on your lids and keeping it simple. These are very cute though and totally worth the price, would recommend highly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Surprise surprise surprise!!!! Never heard of this brand; so affordable for three different shades. I have the new hourglass shimmering pots; two of them. I find this result of this trio is very comparable to the Hourglass but half of the price. I wish I could buy more colours; I cannot because I already owned too many of other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these are beautiful, they are so pigmented and look gorgeous on the eye. they do have some glitter fallout if you use them dry but if you put a tacky primer or glitter glue down they stay put. I'm so glad I tried these, they are just so pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by this. I didn’t expect I’d be satisfied with it. But it’s really bright and vibrant colors, so pigmented and shimmery. The design is unique and cute, very compact and convenient; a nice variation in an industry that’s running out of creative ideas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these shimmers and the highlighters too. So pigmented and great packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cool looking and fun to use, the pigmentation is great but the colors are simple you can find it everywhere. Easy to carry. They should release more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented and last a long time without creasing. I got compliments everywhere I went when I wore these the other day. Packaging is great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is to die for! I love applying them with my fingers for the best results. You can wear them super saturated or sheered out... Either way they look gorgeous! I can't put this shadow down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigment 5/5 Longevity 5/5 Blendability 5/5  Love this trio. I wore this to work for a 12 hour over night shift and it looked just as fresh and pigmented at the end of the shift as it did when I first put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will change your eyeshadow routine forever! These shadows are metallic and shimmery but don't have any fall out. Apply with your fingers and achieve maximum pigmentation. They are easy to blend out and easy to sheer if you need to with a fluffy blending brush. I loved how long wear they were and they didn't crease. These are a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are STUNNING! I did not expect that when I opened it up at first but wow I was blown away by the pigments! Kaja  sent me the most beautiful influencer Box and the packaging was gorgeous! I’m very impressed with this line and would definitely recommend the eyeshadow and highlight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super shimmery gorgeous color!! Perfect packaging. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on these are the absolute cutest! I am so in love. The colors are super shimmery and wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG THESE SHADES ARE EVERYTHING! I would highly recommend buying this trio! The pink is beautiful with my blue eyes! So dang pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow trio is blindingly shimmery and so gorgeous! I love the coral-toned shades! I recommend using a base on your lid to prevent fallout, and if you do, the shadows are intensely pigmented, super shimmery, and wear all day. I applied them with a firm brush and it worked well, though you could use fingers too. The compact packaging is fantastic and well-constructed. I want all the shades now!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a clever design on the packaging. Three absolutely beautiful shades of pink all conveniently stacked on top of one another. The shimmer is 100! You can put on a small amount for a sheer look or build on it for that extra glam look. I'm obsessed with this brand they seriously know what they are doing. #kajagirl4lyfeeee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows are all incredibly pigmented and INSANELY sparkly! The packaging is adorable and makes it easy to create a variety of looks on the go. I have both shades and love the rosewater for softer looks, and the orange blossom for more drama!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosewater - champagne cream, ballerina pink, & deep plum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually more of a matte eyeshadow girl, I have been converted by this eyeshadow trio! The colors compliment well with the shimmer and go on so smoothly. I am able to apply a light layer for an everyday look that has a little pop of sparkle, or go all out and feel like a shining star! Also, I’m the worst with color pairing, so having three colors that go together makes this trio an easy choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I was not expecting this to be as pigmented as it is! I don’t wear eyeshadow often, and when I do, it’s usually onstage, so it NEEDS to be bright. This ticked all the boxes for me. I wore these colors for a Valentine’s Day-themed pinup photo shoot this afternoon, and the colors just photographed so beautifully. I’m definitely keeping this in my show rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Each every shade is all friendly for every skin tone! Super easy to apply! Highly recommend to use your finger to get full blazing pigment! The shadows lasted for many hours! They do start to simmer down if you plan on wearing it for more than 6+ hours  Cons: Be careful! There will be fall out if you do not have a base for your eyelids! I highly recommend doing your eyelook first if you plan on wearing these shadows! You will have glitter galore if you aren’t careful! Your best bet is to press in the shadow rather than brushing it away with a brush for the eyes!

reviews.review_title: Everything you need for Everyday Glitter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect every day glitter, not too chunky, pigmented throughout with no patchiness or streaking but still incredibly bendable. Whenever i wear the middle orange shade people stop and ask me what i'm wearing. The beauty bento is so easy to wear and use that I could pop it into my bag for any occasion and feel like my eye look is on point.
